original: Wernher's Note to Midea
translation: 沃纳给美狄亚的便条

original:
M.-

Secured a site for the bundle. Have it sent to the shack below the blast furnace in steelyard. Door will be cleared when the fighting starts, and marked with a bright blue light to keep out trogs.

Ashur and his family will get what's coming to them.

-W.
translation:
M.-

我准备了一个地方来保护那重要的东西。把那东西送到钢院高炉下的小屋里。门上的木板会在战斗打响时清除，届时会点亮一盏用以驱散兽化人的蓝灯做记号。

阿舒尔一家很快就会见到他们的末日了。

-W.

original: Ammo Mill Instructions
translation: 弹药轧制机操作说明

original:
The steel mill's ammo press is key to the military might of The Pitt, as it allows the user to repurpose simple ammunition to more convenient calibers. All soldiers, traders, and raiders in the Pitt are expected to be familiar with its use.

Found in the Steel Mill, the ammo press overlooks the hole. Load unused ammo types and raw material into the Materials Bin, and activate the nearby Ammo Press Terminal. Select the new ammo type, press it, and collect your new ammunition from the Materials Bin.

Available Ammo Types:
5mm
5.56mm
10mm
.32 caliber
.308 caliber
.44 magnum
Shotgun shells

Raw Material Types:
Any of the above ammo
Scrap Metal
translation:
轧钢厂的弹药轧制机是匹兹堡军事实力的关键，它可以帮使用者把一般的弹药转换成更合适的口径。所有匹兹堡的战士，商人，掠夺者都应该对使用这种工具很熟悉。
在轧钢厂，弹药轧制机随处可见。把不用的弹药和原材料装进材料箱，然后启动旁边的终端机，选择新的弹药类型，按下按钮，就可以从材料箱中取出转换后的新弹药了。

可用弹药类型：
5毫米弹药
5.56毫米弹药
10毫米弹药
.308英寸弹药
.32英寸弹药
.44马格南弹药
霰弹弹药

原材料：
任何上述弹药
废铁

original: Ammo Mill Instructions
translation: 弹药轧制机操作说明

original:
Step 1: Load ammo or raw metal into Materials Bin.

Step 2: Use terminal to select ammo type to produce.

Step 3: Press ammo.

Step 4: Retrieve newly pressed ammo from Materials Bin.
translation:
第一步：把弹药或原材料装入材料箱里。

第二步：使用终端机选择要生产的弹药类型。

第三步：制造弹药。

第四步：从材料箱中取出新弹药。

original:
Director James,

I am once again writing to encourage you to resign your position following the disastrous reconstruction of the Wabash Bridge. While I understand that it was your desire to unify the city's skyline, we at the Pittsburgh Heritage Society feel that replacing the historical Wabash Bridge with a simple copy of the 10th Street structure was laziness bordering on criminal negligence on the part of the Department of Public Works. As the director of the department, the Society holds you responsible.

I will be addressing this matter at the next meeting of the county administrators.

---
Emily Weise
Pittsburgh Heritage Society
translation:
詹姆斯主任，

我再次写信给您，鼓励您在瓦巴什大桥灾难性的重建之后，辞去您的职务。尽管我明白您统一城市天际线的决心，但我们匹兹堡文化遗产协会认为，用一个简单的第十大街结构的复制品来替代具有深厚历史意义的瓦巴什大桥，这是匹兹堡公共建设局的一种近乎于玩忽职守的懒惰。作为该部门的负责人，我们协会认为你对此负有责任。

我将在下次的全郡行政管理会议上提出这个问题。
---
艾米丽·维泽
匹兹堡文化遗产协会

original: Hadley, come on! You put me next to Jenkins? Seriously? I can't stand that guy. He smells like moldy feet and he chews his damn gum so loud I can't concentrate. I've been here four months longer than Bill. You should switch our desks and make him be near Jenkins.\n\n-Tom
translation: 哈德利，别这样！你把我放到詹金斯旁边了？你是认真的吗？我可没法忍受那个家伙。他闻起来就好像发霉的臭脚，而且他总是把他那该死的口香糖嚼得吱嘎作响，让我没法集中精神。我比比尔早来了四个月。你应该对换我们的桌子好让他挨着詹金斯。\n\n-汤姆

original: I was in your office the other day Hadley and I couldn't help noticing that there's some sort of sound coming from the wall. I think you might have mice. You should get maintenance to check that out.
translation: 有一天我和哈德利在你的办公室里听到墙后面有某种奇怪的声音，我想你那里可能有老鼠。你还是找维护部门检查检查吧。

original: Mr. James,\n\nYour wife called. She wants you to pick up milk and a case of Cram on the way home. Also, Miss Stevens called and thanked you for lunch, and wanted to confirm for the same time next Tuesday.
translation: 詹姆斯先生，\n您太太打电话过来，她想让您回家时捎点牛奶和晚餐肉回去。还有，斯蒂文森小姐打来对与您共进午餐表示感谢，并想在下周二的同一时间再来一次这样的午餐。

original: Patient: M. Cramer\n\nSymptoms: Patient complaining of myalgia as well as swollen and enlarged lymph nodes. In addition, patient reports a feeling of "unease". Suspected asymptomatic herpetic infection. Performed AR series of tests and exams. Samples sent to UMS for analysis.
translation: 患者：M.克莱默\n\n症状：患者抱怨肌肉疼痛以及淋巴结肿胀。此外患者还说他有种“焦虑”的感觉。怀疑是无症状的疱疹病毒感染。已施行AR系列测试。样本已送去UMS接受分析。

original: Patient: R. Jenkins\n\nSymptoms: Patient presents runny nose, fever, swollen feet, bad breath, headache, jaundice, and extreme perspiration. Honestly, I have no clue what's wrong with him, but performing tests seems to make his symptoms lessen.
translation: 患者：R.詹金斯\n\n症状：患者流鼻涕，发烧，双脚肿大，呼吸困难，头痛，黄疸，而且还大量出汗。老实说，我也不知道他到底是怎么了，不过做了几个测试后他的症状似乎缓解了。

original: Dr. Borman asked me to look into new office space. Being this close to the mills is terrible for the patients. But he says that we can afford a new office now. Ever since the Canadian annex, we've had a lot of vets in the office, so the numbers are looking way up. War might be hell, but it's good for some of us!
translation: 伯曼医生让我研究一下新的办公地点。离那些工厂这么近对患者是很不利的。他还说我们现在能付得起换新办公地点的费用了。自从加拿大被吞并以后，我们的办公室里总是有一大堆退伍老兵，我们的收入也因此而增加。战争可能是地狱，但对我们中的某些人来说却是好事！

original: Trog Research
translation: 兽化人研究

original:
Troglodyte Degeneration Contagion
Research by Dr. Sandra Kundanika

An epidemic of the environs around the Pitt, which I have named Troglitic Degeneration Contagion (or simply "TDC") appears to be the result of intensely concentrated radiation, but the unique toxins and pollutants in the Pitt cause it to be far more pervasive.

Anyone living in TDC-active areas experience skin lesions after a few weeks of exposure, which can clear up after a month or more away from infected areas. For many healthy adults, this is the full extent of the effect. TDc also seems to interact with brain chemistry in a manner that produces a number of psychological effects, even if the subject remains physically healthy. I'll need to recover more information about psychosis before attempting to enumerate those effects. 

Approximately 20% of adults will progress further, losing higher reasoning and motor skills over the course of years, until they have degenerated into a bestial "Trog." No subjects have ever been recovered from full degeneration, although wishful rumors persist of Trog retaining memories and recognizing the faces of loved ones.

More tragic, however, is the fact that children born in TDC-active areas have a (virtually) 100% degeneration rate, often becoming feral within weeks of birth.
translation:
兽化退行性传染病
桑德拉·坤塔妮卡博士

一种流行病正在匹兹堡肆虐，我把它命名为兽化退行性传染病（Troglodyte Degeneration Contagion，或简称 “TDC”），它看上去是由高强度的密集辐射引起的，而匹兹堡独一无二的毒素和污染物使这种传染病更加无孔不入。

任何住在TDC疫区的人，在暴露于辐射几周之后，都会出现皮肤损伤，这些损伤可以在离开疫区一个多月后康复。对于很多成年人来说，这种皮肤损伤是TDC的全部症状。TDC看上去也会与大脑中的化学物质发生作用，从而使感染对象产生一些心理问题，即使他们的身体没有异样。我得在做列举这些影响的尝试前多收集一些关于这种精神疾病的信息。

大约20%的成年人病情会继续发展，在几年内逐步失去思维和运动能力，直到退化成凶残的“兽化人”。从没有感染者能从退化状态康复，尽管有一厢情愿的流言声称兽化人仍保留着记忆并能认出它们曾爱过的人。

然而，更加不幸的是，出生在TDC疫区的儿童（几乎是）100%地会退化，经常在出生的几周后就开始了这一过程。

original: Cure Research
translation: 治疗法研究

original:
Cure Development Progress
Research by Dr. Sandra Kundanika

Observational tests on isolated samples suggest the subject has a natural adaptive immunity to the so called "trog mutation." Furthermore, it appears that this immunity carries on to other forms of radiation-induced diseases - from radiation sickness to larger mutations such as the all-too-common development of a sixth toe.

Attempts to isolate these effects have been slow going, due in part to the delicate nature of testing. Prospects exist for duplication, but the unique and delicate nature of the subject requires utmost care in testing.
translation:
治疗法研发进展
桑德拉·坤塔妮卡博士的研究

对分离样本进行的观察测试表明，试验对象对所谓的“兽化突变”具有天然的适应性免疫力。此外，这种免疫力似乎还可用于其他形式的辐射诱发疾病--从辐射病到更大的突变，如常见的长出第六根脚趾。

分离这些效应的尝试进展缓慢，部分原因是测试的脆弱性。复制的可能性是存在地，但这一课题的独特性和脆弱性要求在测试中极为谨慎。

original: Note from Wild Bill
translation: 狂野比尔的遗书

original: I'm not going to make it, Milly...I'm sorry.  I knew everyone thought I could do it, but they don't know what's out here.  It's not just Trogs...but others.  The Wildmen.  Kind of funny considering my nickname 'Wild Bill' back at the mill.  Finding the ingots wasn't the hard part...they're everywhere.  The problem was trying to make my way back to the mill.  My trusty sidearm came in handy more than once, but I soon found myself in more trouble than I could handle.  The gunfire alerted the Wildmen and I assume it's only a matter of time before they find me.  I'm sorry for letting everyone down at the mill.  Let everyone know I tried my hardest.   ...Bye.
translation: 我撑不下去了，米莉……我很抱歉。我知道每个人都觉得我能够做到，但是他们不知道这里是怎么回事。这里不光有兽化人……还有别的东西，野蛮人！真是搞笑，我在工厂的时候外号就叫做狂野比尔。找到钢锭不是什么难事，它们到处都是。问题是我没法回到工厂。我可靠的防身武器不止一次地派上了用场，但是很快我就发现我陷入了更加糟糕的问题。枪声引来了野蛮人，我相信不久他们就会发现我。我很抱歉让大家失望了。让大家知道我尽了最大的努力。……再见。

original: In response to the increased number of Protectron related injuries, I've placed a bunch of generic employee IDs next to the Factory Protectron Pod.  The thing doesn't know the difference anyway so, please, if you've forgot your ID, just use the ones on the table. Remember to return them before you leave for the day, I only have so many.\n\n- Management
translation: 鉴于由保护者造成的受伤事件不断增加，我放了几组普通员工的ID在工厂的保护者舱。反正那些铁家伙分不清它们有什么不同，如果你忘记了你的ID，就用桌子上的这些吧。记得离开的时候把ID放回去，我只剩这么几个了。\n\n- 管理部

original: There have been several complaints in the past couple of weeks regarding the new Factory Protectrons installed throughout the plant. Some of you feel this is the first step in the long process of phasing out the human aspect of the plant. Please be assured that this is not our intention. The new Protectrons are here only to protect you, the workers. Also, please remember to carry your ID with you at all times. The Protectrons are programmed to make sure those present in the plant are valid employees.\n\n- Management
translation: 在过去的几星期里，对于新布置在工厂里的保护者的抱怨层出不穷。你们中的一些人可能认为这是逐步淘汰工厂里的人类的开始。请相信这不是我们的本意。新的保护者只是用来保护你们的，工人们。不要忘记随身携带你们的ID。根据程序设定，保护者要确保只有经许可的员工出现在工厂里。\n\n- 管理部

original: We've ordered three new Protectrons to be installed immediately in the plant. One will take the place of the recent Protectron that was destroyed by our very own employees, who, let me remind you, are now ex-employees. The other two will take their positions working on the assembly line.\n\n- Management
translation: 我们已经下令立刻把三台新的保护者布置在工厂里。其中一台用来替换最近被我们的员工（有必要提醒你，现在已经是前员工了）毁坏的那台保护者。另外的两台将会被安排在流水线上工作。\n\n- 管理部

original: Those employees who recently took it upon themselves to incapacitate a Protectron with a bucket of water and sledgehammer have been dealt with and no longer work at the plant. Let this be a reminder to all employees. Those caught harassing and/or damaging the Factory Protectrons will be dealt with swiftly and severely.\n\n- Management
translation: 最近那些承认用水和大锤破坏保护者使之不能工作的员工已经被处分并将不会再为工厂工作了。让这件事给所有的员工们提个醒。那些被抓到骚扰或者破坏工厂保护者的员工将会受到严肃的处理。\n\n- 管理部

original:
I brought it up with Management today that the men down at the plant aren't taking the new shipment of robots lightly. They fear losing their jobs and I don't blame them. It's my job to make sure morale stays high no matter what happens. It's hard to look each man in the eye and tell him that he has nothing to worry about even though I very well know he'll be unemployed in less than a month. I don't know how long I can continue to lie to these men.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
我今天跟管理部提过，在下面工厂里的员工并没有放松对新运来的机器人的警惕。他们怕失去工作，我并没责怪他们。我的职责是不管发生了什么事都要保持员工的士气高昂。很难看着每个人的眼睛，告诉他们没有什么好担心的，尽管我非常清楚他们不到一个月就会失业。我不知道我还能骗这些人多久。

汤姆·麦克马林
供给厂监工

original:
I've managed to delay a rather large shipment of Protectrons today. I told management that we've been having problems with the previous batch of robots and are not prepared for another batch anytime soon. This is complete bullshit of course, the robots work perfectly. They outperform our best worker by a factor of five. The men continue to lose morale day after day. Some blame me, but they don't understand that this is completely out of my hands. I am doing everything I can to help these men keep their jobs.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
今天我设法推迟了一大批保护者的运送。我告诉管理部，之前一批机器人有很多问题，暂时还没有准备好接受新一批。当然这全都是胡扯。它们的工作做的很完美，比我们最好的工人还好上五倍。员工们的士气一天差过一天。有些人责怪我，但他们不知道这件事我说的完全不算。我正尽我所能保住他们的工作。

汤姆·麦克马林
供给厂监工

original:
Management made a surprise visit to the plant today. I guess they stopped believing what I've been telling them about the robots not performing to standards. They saw first hand the speed and efficiency of the robots. Unfortunately, they also caught two employees in the act of tearing apart a Protectron and smashing it with a sledgehammer. I was to blame of course.  The men are starting to believe I'm working closely with the managers and helping them in every way possible to save my own skin.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
管理部今天突然视察了工厂。我猜他们不再相信我之前告诉他们关于机器人的表现没达标的事。他们亲眼看到了机器人工作的速度和效率。很不幸地，他们还抓到了两个正用大锤破坏保护者的员工。当然，我受到了指责。工人们开始认为我跟管理层是一伙的，并且用尽手段帮助他们以求自保。

汤姆·麦克马林
供给厂监工

original:
News broke out today over the loud speakers that everyone needs to vacate the plant by 1 PM. "Due to budget cuts, this plant is shutting down."  The men knew at once there was no budget cut. They ultimately decided I was to blame, having seniority in this section of the plant. As soon as I heard the news, I grabbed my pistol and made for the exit. It was quickly barricaded. I turned around and ran into this utility closet and locked the door behind me. I'll stay in here until the men go home.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
今天大喇叭突然广播，所有人必须在下午1点前撤出工厂。“由于预算削减，工厂即将关闭。”工人们立刻意识到并没有预算削减这回事。他们最后认为应该找资历最老的我算账。一听到这个消息，我就抓起了手枪奔向出口。但路很快被堵上了。我四处躲藏，最后跑进了这间杂物室并锁上了身后的门。我将呆在这里直到工人们都回家了。

汤姆·麦克马林
供应厂监工

original:
The men won't leave. They're determined to wait until I come out. Probably going to give me one hell of a beating, that I'm sure of. I wish they understood how hard I worked for them, how I used every opportunity to delay the inevitable. They better get going though, it's almost 1 PM. The robots will be here in a half hour, sooner if management hears of what's happening.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
工人们没有离去，他们决定守在这里直到我出去。我敢肯定他们想要狠狠的揍我一顿。我希望他们知道我为了他们付出了多少，我是如何不放过每一个机会为他们推迟着迟早要发生的事情。他们最好快点离开，现在已经下午一点了，机器人会在半小时内到达。如果管理部门听说了这里的情况，他们会来得更早。

汤姆·麦克马林
供给厂监工

original:
I begged them to leave before the robots got here. They laughed and said they'd take care of the robots, it's me they wanted. Then came the familiar rattle of a Protectron. That got their attention. I soon heard laughter, cursing, and screaming down the hall. I opened the door and stepped outside. A couple of the workers burst around the corner screaming for help. A red laser lashed out from down the hall and severed Tim's right arm in two. I panicked and ran back into the closet and shut the door. The men slammed into the door and begged me to open it. I didn't say a word, just sat stunned, listening to their screams of agony as the robot finished them off one by one. Then silence. I put my ear to the door and listened. I heard the clanking of Protectron feet down the hall. I grabbed my pistol and backed away from the door. No way am I opening this door for anyone or anything!  Whoever reads this, let it be known that I did everything in my power to keep everyone's job at the plant.  And let this be an example of how not to replace humans with machines.

Tom McMullin
Supply Plant Supervisor
translation:
我求工人们在机器人到来之前离开。他们哈哈大笑，还说他们会收拾好机器人，他们想要的是我。接着传来了保护者那吱嘎作响的脚步声，这引起了他们的注意。紧接着我听到了从走廊尽头传来了笑声，咒骂声，和尖叫声。我打开了门，走了出去。工人们四散躲在角落里，大声呼救。一道红色激光从走廊尽头射来，把蒂姆的右臂切成了两段。我跑回了储藏室然后重新锁上了门，我吓坏了。工人们捶打着门求我把门打开。我一句话也没说，只是惊恐地坐着，听着他们痛苦的嚎叫，听着机器人一个一个地杀掉他们。接着外面静了下来，我把耳朵贴在门上倾听，听到了走廊里机器人的移动时发出的哐啷声。我紧握着手中的手枪，离门远远地。我绝对不会为任何人或者东西开门！不管是谁读到了这些，告诉人们我做了我所能做的一切来保住每一个人的工作。就当这是一个教训，告诉人们为什么不该用机器来代替人类。

汤姆·麦克马林
供给厂监工

original: Steel for the Mill
translation: 轧钢厂的用钢

original:
For ALL residents of The Pitt:

Mill production means I need all the steel ingots you can find from the steelyard or supply plant. Anyone who brings in 10 ingots gets paid. See Everett in the Steel Mill.

And soldiers: I don't care if you think you're too good to scrounge for the mill. It's a waste sending workers out there to die. All it does is feed the damned trogs.

Mill Foreman Everett
translation:
致所有匹兹堡的居民：

我需要钢院或者供给厂里的钢锭来保证工厂的生产。不管是谁，每弄到10个钢锭，都可到轧钢厂找埃弗雷特换取报酬。

另外，战士们：我不关心你们是不是不屑于为轧钢厂卖命。但是把工人们派去那里简直是送死，他们只会变成那些该死的兽化人的食物。

轧钢厂工长埃弗雷特

original: I'm the badass who'll be running this place once I kill you.

original: I'm the hero who's going to kill you and free the slaves!

original: I'm just here to kill you and reap the rewards.

original: It's complicated. How about we just say I'm new in town and looking for work?
translation: 很复杂。你就当我是个新来的，在城里找工作，如何？

original: I heard The Pitt was building an army. I'm here to join.
translation: 我听说匹兹堡在建立一只军队。我是来报名的。

original: He said you had the key to ruling the city, and I'm here to collect.

original: He said your discovery will free the slaves and cure them. How could I say no?
translation: 他说你的发现能够解放奴隶，并治愈他们。我无法拒绝。

original: He wanted me to steal a valuable cure. I'm just in it for the caps.
translation: 他要我去偷一些高价的药品。我就是为了他的瓶盖。

original: He made me an offer, but now that I know the score, I'm joining your side.
translation: 他曾给过我一个提议，但是现在我明白了，我要加入你这边。

original: Where did you get that powered armor?
translation: 你在哪里搞到那套动力装甲的？

original: Do you ever miss the Brotherhood of Steel?
translation: 你怀念过钢铁兄弟会吗？

original: Tell me about The Pitt.
translation: 跟我说说匹兹堡吧。

original: Can we talk about The Pitt?
translation: 我们能谈谈匹兹堡的事情吗？

original: Tell me more about The Pitt.
translation: 多跟我讲一些匹兹堡的事情吧。

original: Have things gotten better?
translation: 事情有所好转吗？

original: Have things gotten better?

original: How's everything going in The Pitt?
translation: 匹兹堡一切都好吗？

original: Thanks, but I've got other plans.
translation: 谢谢，但是我有其他计划。

original: Sounds like a good deal. I'll track him down.
translation: 听起来是笔好交易。我会找到他的。

original: I need to think about it.
translation: 我需要考虑一下。

original: What do we need to do first?
translation: 我们需要先做些什么？

original: What am I trying to get?
translation: 我要找什么东西？

original: Why can't you do it?
translation: 为什么你不能这么做？

original: What's your goal?
translation: 你的目标是什么？

original: If your people need you, what are you doing here?
translation: 如果你的人民需要你，那你在这里干什么？

original: Did you escape or something?
translation: 你是逃跑了还是怎么了？

original: I remember hearing about The Pitt from a guy in the Citadel.
translation: 我记得在五角大本营里听一个家伙说过有关匹兹堡的事情。

original: The radio message said something about a reward. Let's skip to that part.
translation: 无线电信息提到了奖励。我们直接跳到那一段吧。

original: I came because of the radio message. What's the problem?
translation: 我听到无线电信息而来的。出什么问题了？

original: Gross. I'm not wearing a dead guy's clothes. Give me yours. Now.
translation: 真恶心。我不想穿死人的衣服。把你的给我。现在。

original: Great. Thanks. Be careful out there.
translation: 太好了。谢谢。路上小心。

original: Thanks. Now take off. I'm done with you.
translation: 谢谢。走吧。我跟你没别的事了。

original: Good. Now get out of here before I change my mind.
translation: 很好。在我改变主意之前赶快离开。

original: I need your clothes. Give them to me. Now.
translation: 我需要你的衣服。快给我。现在就给。

original: I need a set of slave clothes. Where can I get some?
translation: 我需要一套奴隶的衣服。我能在哪里搞到？

original: You're free now. But I need your help dressing like a slave.
translation: 你自由了。但是我需要你帮忙把我打扮成奴隶。

original: Just get out of my sight. I don't care where you go.
translation: 我才不管你到哪里去。赶快离开我的视线。

original: I'm not taking you anywhere, but I need your clothes. Now.
translation: 我哪儿也不带你去，但是我需要你的衣服。现在就要。

original: I'm not taking you anywhere. You're free to go.
translation: 我哪儿也不带你去。你自由了。

original: I just wanted to check on you.
translation: 我只是想看看你。

original: I want to buy your slaves.
translation: 我想要买你的奴隶。

original: This is too much work. I'll just kill you.
translation: 这样太费事了。我只要杀掉你就好了。

original: I need to think about it.
translation: 我需要再想想。

original: 600 for all three? You've got a deal.
translation: 三个一共600？成交。

original: I'll leave you to that, then.
translation: 我立刻就离开。

original: Who are you waiting for?
translation: 你在等谁？

original: I'm whoever you want me to be, baby.
translation: 宝贝，你想是谁，我就是谁。

original: Oops. I'm in the wrong place. I'll just be going.
translation: 噢。我走错地方了。我立刻离开。

original: Who, me? No. I'm just here to kill you slaving bastards.
translation: 谁，我？不不。我只是来这里杀掉你们这些奴隶贩子的。

original: What are you doing out here?
translation: 你在这里做什么？

original: Yeah, that's me. I'm here to buy these slaves.
translation: 是我。我来买这些奴隶。

original: Do you really care if I'm a man or not? I'm here to buy these slaves.
translation: 你真的在乎我是不是男的？我是来买奴隶的。

original: DLC01WernherRaiderAmbush4
translation: DLC01WernherRaiderAmbush4

translation: DLC01GateGuardEntry

translation: DLC01GateGuardNoEntry

translation: DLC01WernherRaiderAmbush3

original: DLC01WernherRaiderAmbush1
translation: DLC01WernherRaiderAmbush1

original: I've got your kid. You wouldn't dare shoot at me.
translation: 你的孩子在我手上。你不会向我射击的。

original: Wait, I meant, um, isn't she cute? Here you go.
translation: 等等，我是说，呃，她很可爱，不是吗？就这样。

original: DLC01SpecialOption
translation: DLC01SpecialOption

original: What's going to happen to the baby?
translation: 孩子会怎么样？

original: Remember your little ambush at the gate? Let's settle the score.
translation: 还记得你在门口的埋伏吗？我们来算算账吧。

original: DLC01WernherPathB01B
translation: DLC01WernherPathB01B

original: It's here and safe. How's this going to put me in charge of The Pitt?
translation: 她在这里，很安全。这东西怎么才能让我控制整个匹兹堡？

original: The baby's here, and she's safe. How will this help the slaves?
translation: 孩子在这里，她很安全。这对奴隶们有什么帮助？

original: I've got it here, safe and sound. Now, where's my reward?
translation: 我把它带来了，安然无恙。我的奖赏呢？

original: She's here, but you never told me this meant kidnapping.
translation: 她在这里，但你从没告诉我这意味着绑架。

original: You never told me it meant kidnapping!
translation: 你从来没告诉过我这意味着绑架！

original: Your plans are over, Wernher. Ashur knows everything.
translation: 你的计划完蛋了，沃纳。阿舒尔知道了一切。

original: Did you know the cure is actually a baby?
translation: 你知道解药其实是一个婴儿吗？

original: Seems like an awful lot of fuss over one little baby.
translation: 看起来一大群人都在为一个婴儿操心。

original: I'm not so sure this was the right thing to do.
translation: 我不确定这场战争是否是正确的。

original: I don't feel right about kidnapping. She's going to be safe, right?
translation: 我觉得绑架不妥。她会安全的，对吗？

original: Did you know the cure is actually a baby?
translation: 你知道解药其实是一个婴儿吗？

original: I joined with the winning side. Now shut your mouth, slave.
translation: 我只加入有望获胜的一边。闭嘴，奴隶。

original: You didn't really expect me to steal a baby, did you?
translation: 你不会真的指望我去偷一个婴儿吧？

original: Sorry, but I just couldn't kidnap an innocent baby, even for your freedom.
translation: 抱歉，但是我不能绑架一个无辜的婴儿，就算关系到你的自由也不行。

original: If there's anything I can do to help, just let me know.
translation: 如果有什么我可以帮上忙的事情，请告诉我。

original: You're using your own child as an experiment? You monster!
translation: 你用你自己的孩子做试验品？你这个畜生！

original: Aren't you worried about hurting Marie?
translation: 你担心玛丽会受伤吗？

original: Okay, so the baby's the cure? I'll be taking her, thanks.
translation: 好吧，所以说这个婴儿是解药？那我要带走她，谢谢。

original: You're kidding me. A baby can't be the cure!
translation: 你在逗我玩吧。一个婴儿不可能是解药！

original: What are you talking about? That's a baby, not a vaccine.
translation: 你在说什么？那是个婴儿，不是解药。

original: Wait, you mean she has a natural and transferable immunity of some sort?
translation: 等等，你的意思是她有某种先天且可转移的免疫力？

original: If you want to live, you'll tell me where Wernher is hiding.
translation: 如果你想活下去，就告诉我沃纳藏到哪去了。

original: I can't believe you were going to steal a baby from her loving parents.
translation: 我无法相信你要去把一个孩子从深爱她的父母那里偷出来。

original: That wasn't the deal, Wernher. I'm having second thoughts about all of this.
translation: 这和说好的不一样，沃纳。我在重新考虑这一切。

original: Sounds good. Let's finish this.
translation: 听起来不错。让我们结束这一切吧。

translation: DLC01ArenaAnnouncerFightTwoDone

translation: DLC01ArenaAnnouncerFightOneDone

translation: DLC01ArenaAnnouncerFightOne

original: No, not yet.
translation: 不，还没好。

original: Let's do it!
translation: 让我上场吧！

original: DLC01AshurMarketSpeech01
translation: DLC01AshurMarketSpeech01

original: DLC01SandraMeeting03C
translation: DLC01SandraMeeting03C

original: That means kidnapping this baby is the key to ruling this city. Yoink!
translation: 也就是说绑架这个婴儿是统治这个城市的关键。拿来吧！

original: Sorry, but the slaves don't have time to wait for a cure. I'm taking Marie.
translation: 抱歉，但奴隶们没时间等治疗了。我要带走玛丽。

original: That makes Marie very valuable, doesn't it? And now she's mine!
translation: 那会让玛丽变得很有价值，不是吗？现在她是我的了！

original: DLC01SandraToKidnapper
translation: DLC01SandraToKidnapper

original: Tell me about this cure.
translation: 告诉我关于解药的事情。

original: I want to talk about you.
translation: 我想谈谈关于你的事情。

original: I want you to tell me about you and your people.
translation: 我想你告诉我你和你的人民的事情。

original: Do I have to kill him to get it?
translation: 我得杀掉他才能拿到吗？

original: And he'll just give it to me?
translation: 然后他就会把东西给我了？

original: I want to talk about The Pitt.
translation: 我想谈谈关于匹兹堡的事情。

original: An arena? Interesting. So, that's part of your plan?
translation: 竞技场？有趣。这么说，这就是你的计划的一部分？

original: Arena? Before I go anywhere, you're going to explain this plan to me.
translation: 竞技场？在我去任何地方之前，你最好把这个计划解释给我听。

original: Let me guess, the area is full of Super Mutants.
translation: 让我猜猜，这个地区满是超级变种人。

original: That's not so bad.
translation: 那还不太糟。

original: So, I'm just supposed to strangle them with my bare hands if I meet one?
translation: 这么说的话，我只能指望自己在遇到一个的时候徒手掐死他？

original: So where can I get some weapons?
translation: 我在哪里可以搞到一点武器？

original: What is that, some kind of fish?
translation: 那是什么，某种鱼吗？

original: What the hell is a Trog?
translation: 兽化人是什么鬼东西？

original: And let me guess: the area is full of Super Mutants?
translation: 让我猜猜：这个地区满是超级变种人？

original: Actually, that doesn't sound very dangerous.
translation: 准确来说，那听起来确实很危险。

original: I'm not happy about it, but since I'm stuck here: whatever.
translation: 我对此并不高兴，但既然我被困在这里，那就无所谓了。

original: I see your point. What do you need me to do?
translation: 我明白你的意思了。你需要我做什么？

original: I didn't come here to work, I came to save you all!
translation: 我不是来工作的，我是来救你们的！

original: Sounds dangerous. What will I be doing?
translation: 听起来很危险。我该怎么做？

original: You're right. What can I do so I don't stand out?
translation: 你是对的，我该怎么做才能让自己显得不起眼？

original: Whoa, whoa! Slow down! What's going on here?
translation: 哇，哇哦！慢点儿！这里发生什么事了？

original: One chance, Wernher. Leave now, and never come back.
translation: 给你一个机会，沃纳。现在就离开，别再回来。

original: Wernher, how about saving us both a lot of trouble and leaving quietly?
translation: 沃纳，要不咱俩省点功夫，你安静地离开？

original: Seriously, I don't want to have to kill you.
translation: 说真的，我不想闹到不得不杀掉你的地步。

original: Your riot isn't going to change anything. Except getting the slaves killed...
translation: 你们的暴动改变不了任何事情，只会造成奴隶的死亡……

original: DLC01Radio02
translation: DLC01Radio02

original: Tell me about other slaves who have fought in the Arena.
translation: 和我讲讲其他在这个竞技场里战斗过的奴隶怎么样了。

original: What are the Arena Rules?
translation: 竞技场的规则是什么？

original: Who am I going to be fighting?
translation: 我将会跟谁战斗？

original: I want to fight in the Arena.
translation: 我想到竞技场里战斗。

original: I'm ready to fight.
translation: 我做好战斗的准备了。

original: Not right now.
translation: 现在还不行。

original: Yes. Put me down for a fight.
translation: 是的。让我进去战斗。

original: What goes on down here?
translation: 下面发生什么事情了？

original: Where do I sign up?
translation: 我该到哪里报名？

original: That leaves me as the new Lord of The Pitt.
translation: 这样一来，我就成了新的匹兹堡之主。

original: I expect my reward, now.
translation: 现在，我期待着我的报酬。

original: As long as the slaves are free and Marie is safe.
translation: 只要奴隶自由，玛丽安全。

original: Guess it's time to kick back and live the life of luxury.
translation: 我想也该放松放松享受生活了。

original: So, what do I do now?
translation: 好吧，现在我们该怎么办？

original: Um... It won't happen again?
translation: 唔……这不会再次发生了？

original: I'm sorry, but it was the only way to lure Wernher out of hiding.
translation: 我很抱歉，不过这是引出沃纳的唯一方法了。

original: Nope. I just thought you'd want to say goodbye to your daughter.
translation: 不是的。我只是觉得你应该想跟你的女儿说再见了。

original: I guess, but it sure was fun while it lasted.
translation: 我猜是吧，但过程确实很刺激。

original: Sorry. Here's Marie.
translation: 抱歉。这是玛丽。

original: Here's your daughter, safe and sound. And Wernher's gone, too.
translation: 这是你的女儿，平安无事。并且沃纳也死了。

original: DLC01ConfrontPlayer
translation: DLC01ConfrontPlayer

original: He'd forgive me if I put an end to you. And I intend to.
translation: 如果我解决掉你，他就会原谅我了。并且我正打算这么做。

original: I guess you're right, since I already killed his wife.
translation: 我想你是对的，因为我已经杀了他的妻子。

original: Sure, fine, whatever. Let's get this over with.
translation: 对，好吧，随便了。我们赶紧把这事了。

original: DLC01SandraToLeavingKidnapper
translation: DLC01SandraToLeavingKidnapper

original: Why do you want to know?
translation: 为什么你想要知道？

original: Why should I tell you anything?
translation: 为什么我要告诉你一切？

original: What's with all the questions?
translation: 你问这么多要干嘛？

original: So you're just happy to be where you are?
translation: 所以说你对现在的情况很满意？

original: What does that even mean?
translation: 那到底是什么意思？

original: So you're just happy to be where you are?
translation: 所以说你对现在的情况很满意？

original: What does that even mean?
translation: 那到底是什么意思？

original: Why are you so cheery?
translation: 为什么你如此开心？

original: Family? You're all slaves. You're not family.
translation: 家庭？你们都是奴隶。你们没有家庭。

original: DLC01HavenResponse1A
translation: DLC01HavenResponse1A

original: Not at all. Some of my best friends are Ghouls.
translation: 不全是。我有一些好朋友是尸鬼。

original: What do you mean about Ashur's "keen eyes"?
translation: 你说阿舒尔的“锐眼”是什么意思？

original: Don't be so cold, Vikia. Don't you want a piece of this?
translation: 别这么冷淡嘛，维祺娅。你不想也分一份吗？

original: I assure you, I'm more than your equal. Much more.
translation: 我向你担保，我比你想象的强多了。强太多了。

original: Glad I kept you entertained, then!
translation: 很高兴能够让你开心！

original: Trust me, I know how to work hard.
translation: 相信我，我知道怎么努力做事。

original: How many other soldiers came from the Hole?
translation: 从角斗坑来了多少士兵？

original: That seems like a real risk, considering there are so few safety rails.
translation: 考虑到这里的安全护栏这么少，这看起来真的挺危险的。

original: Oh, that's real appetizing.
translation: 噢，那的确很诱人。

original: I'll leave you to it, then.
translation: 那我就不打扰你了。

original: I need a weapon. Can you help me out?
translation: 我需要一把武器。你能帮我吗？

original: Maybe I'll go tell them anyway.
translation: 也许我还是会去告诉他们。

original: I guess you're right. What are you working on?
translation: 我想你是对的。你在忙什么？

original: And what are you doing?
translation: 你在干什么？

original: Oh yeah? Why shouldn't I just tell them what you're up to?
translation: 哦，是吗？我为什么不干脆告诉他们你在忙啥呢？

original: No, I can handle it.
translation: 不，我可以搞定。

original: Yes. Fix me up.
translation: 是的。治好我。

original: No thanks, I'll pass.
translation: 不，谢谢，我只是路过。

original: Give me some food.
translation: 给我一点食物吧。

original: Nothing. Never mind.
translation: 没什么。别管它了。

original: What are you doing? Shouldn't you be working?
translation: 你在干什么？你不是应该在工作吗？

original: DLC01HavenResponse1B
translation: DLC01HavenResponse1B

original: Whoa. What happened to you?
translation: 哇。你怎么了？

original: I'll tell you what's special about me: I kick ass.
translation: 我来告诉你我有什么特别之处:我很厉害。

original: Why are you such a bitch?
translation: 为什么你这么像个泼妇？

original: Good thing you didn't. I would have shot back.
translation: 还好你没这么做。不然我就还击了。

original: You really think you work harder than the slaves Downtown?
translation: 你真的觉得你比奴隶的下城区工作还要努力？

original: I bet none of you have seen the things I've seen.
translation: 我打赌你们都没见过我所看到的东西。

original: If you don't like it, I hear there's an opening for work Downtown.
translation: 如果你不喜欢这儿，我听说下城区有个空缺。

original: I'm more than just meat. You wait and see.
translation: 我不只是肉而已，等着瞧吧。

original: I have to go.
translation: 我该走了。

original: What do you need me to do?

original: Tell me about your people.

original: Tell me about The Pitt.

original: Weren't you in a hurry? Storytime is over.

original: A cure? You're sick? Agh! Get away!
translation: 解药？你病了？啊！滚开！

original: Wait, slow down. Cure for what?
translation: 等等，慢一点。什么解药？

original: What's wrong with your people?
translation: 你的人都怎么了？

original: Whatever. I've done my part, now where's my reward?
translation: 管它呢。我完成了我的工作，我的奖赏呢？

original: As long as the kid's all right. Take her.
translation: 只要孩子没事就好。带她走。

original: Teddy bear delivery for Marie! Here you go.
translation: 玛丽的泰迪熊快递！给你。

original: Would it help if I brought toys for Marie?
translation: 如果我给玛丽带玩具来会有用吗？

original: Would it help if I brought toys for Marie?
translation: 如果我给玛丽带玩具来会有用吗？

original: Would it help if I brought toys for Marie?
translation: 如果我给玛丽带玩具来会有用吗？

original: How's Marie doing?
translation: 玛丽最近如何？

original: How's Marie?
translation: 玛丽怎么样了？

original: How's Marie?
translation: 玛丽怎么样了？

original: If it's any consolation, Ashur says the cure will be shared with everyone.
translation: 如果说有什么可以拿来慰藉一下的话，那就是阿舒尔说这种解药能够与所有人分享。

original: How's the baby doing?
translation: 婴儿现在如何？

original: How's research coming on the cure?
translation: 治疗方法的研究进展如何？

original: How's research coming on the cure?
translation: 治疗方法的研究进展如何？

original: Let me see what drinks you have.
translation: 让我瞧瞧你都有什么喝的东西。

original: Show me what you've got.
translation: 给我看看你都有些什么。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈谈其他事情。

original: Is there anyone helping you free your people?
translation: 有其他人帮你拯救你的人民吗？

original: Who's in charge of The Pitt?
translation: 匹兹堡谁说了算？

original: Where do your people come from?
translation: 你的人民是从哪来的？

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈谈其他事情吧。

original: Tell me about what the Brotherhood did.
translation: 告诉我兄弟会干了什么。

original: What happens to people who get sick?
translation: 如果人们生病了会怎样？

original: Who lives there?
translation: 谁住在这里？

original: What? It's not my fault you can't shoot straight.
translation: 什么？你无法击中目标可不是我的错。

original: Yeah, fine. I was just kidding.
translation: 好吧。我只是在开玩笑。

original: I'm a better fighter than you, that's who. Can't you handle a couple Raiders?
translation: 我是个比你更能打的战士，就这样。你连几个掠夺者都应付不？

original: How did the city get started?
translation: 这座城市是如何建立的？

original: DLC01WernherAmbushSecondWave
translation: DLC01WernherAmbushSecondWave

original: DLC01RamseyGetEm
translation: DLC01RamseyGetEm

original: Sounds like a plan. How do I kill the lights?
translation: 听起来像个不错的计划。我该如何让灯灭掉？

original: And how am I supposed to get out of there?
translation: 那我该怎么离开那里？

original: Sounds dangerous. How about helping a lady out?
translation: 听起来很危险。帮帮女士的忙如何？

original: Sounds like fun. Let me at 'em!
translation: 听起来很有趣。让我来干掉他们！

translation: 比尔说让你知道他很好，但是他不能马上回来。<撒谎>

original: Bill's dead. I found his body in the Steelyard.  I'm sorry, Milly.
translation: 比尔死了。我在钢院找到了他的尸体。我很抱歉，米莉。

original: Yes, I found him in the Steelyard.
translation: 是的，我在钢院找到他了。

original: I'm just kidding, I found Bill dead in the Steelyard.
translation: 我只是在开玩笑而已，我发现比尔死在钢院里了。

original: And one large concrete block... to the head. <Lie.>
translation: 然后我用一个巨大的砖块……往他头上砸。<撒谎>

original: He's one tough bastard. Took every shot of my pistol... <Lie.>
translation: 他是个坚强的混蛋。我手枪子弹打完了他还没死……<撒谎>

original: Barely. He was calling for you. I had to put him out of his misery... <Lie.>
translation: 他当时已经不行了。他在呼喊着你的名字。我不得不让他从痛苦中解脱……<撒谎>

original: I scared off the Trogs and ran to Bill.  He was still alive... <Lie.>
translation: 我吓走了兽化人，然后跑向比尔。他当时还活着……<撒谎>

original: I saw multiple Trogs clawing, tearing, chewing on his limbs... <Lie.>
translation: 我看到一些兽化人对他的肢体又撕又咬……<撒谎>

original: I heard Bill's blood-curdling screams and I knew I was too late... <Lie.>
translation: 我听见比尔发出令人毛骨悚然的尖叫声，那时我就知道自己来的太晚了……<撒谎>

original: Shotgun shell ammunition selected.\n\nReady to convert material to new ammo type.
translation: 已选择霰弹弹药。\n\n准备将原材料转换为新弹药。
