translation: 现在对你来说将是一段美好的时光，你会亲眼见识到这种解药。让我们回到实验室，桑德拉会解释……

original: Not in the slightest. During the Scourge, we looted The Pitt and left the rest of it to rot. I was just a dumb convert who got stuck here afterwards.
translation: 一点都不怀念。天谴行动期间，我们掠夺了匹兹堡，把它变成了一片狼籍。我只是一个后来被陷在了这儿的愚蠢信徒。

original: See, beneath it all, the Brotherhood's just lazy. It's easier to loot a dying city than work to bring it back to life, so that's what they did.
translation: 瞧，在整个事情的背后，兄弟会真是懒透了。掠夺一座快要死掉的城市总比把它带回生机要容易得多，所以他们就那么做了。

original: They're so obsessed with the technology of the past, they don't care what needs to be done for today and tomorrow.
translation: 他们太迷恋过去的技术，不在乎要为今天和明天做些什么。

original: It takes real work to rebuild and run a city. But there isn't a machine to do it for them, so the Brotherhood ain't interested. Good riddance.
translation: 重建和运作一座城市需要动真格的。但没有机器能帮他们完成，所以兄弟会对此没有兴趣。走得好。

original: This thing? It's a relic from my time with the Brotherhood of Steel, decades ago.
translation: 你说这个东西？它是几十年前我在钢铁兄弟会时的遗物。

original: It's been through so much that they'd hardly recognize it as one of theirs.
translation: 经历了这么多，他们几乎认不出这是他们自己的东西了。

original: A little like me, come to think of it.
translation: 有点像我，我想起来了。

original: Now that everything's quieted down, I guess we've got time for the full story. What do you want to know?
translation: 既然一切都平静下来了，那我想我们有时间来好好谈谈了。你想知道什么？

original: What do you want to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: I'm not the one to ask, really. Between Marie and the research, I hardly have any free time anymore.
translation: 我不是喜欢求别人的那种人，真的。在玛丽和这个研究之外，我几乎再没有任何自由时间。

original: You know how stressful it is, raising a kid and studying her at the same time?
translation: 你知道这是多么大的压力吗，一边喂养孩子，一边还要拿她做研究？

original: But that's what has to be done, for the future of The Pitt.
translation: 但为了匹兹堡的未来，只能这么做。

original: What the hell do you think? We're still brought here against our will, and we still have to work until we fall over.
translation: 你以为呢？我们还违心地呆在这，我们在倒下之前还得不停的工作。

original: Sure, maybe the guards don't shoot us for fun as often. And there's a slim chance that someday we'll stop getting sick and dying. Maybe.
translation: 是啊，也许守卫们没有像平常一样觉得好玩而向我们射击。可能我们还有一线希望在将来的某一天停止患病和死亡。

original: Whoop-tee-fucking-doo. Thank goodness you came here to save us.
translation: 你真是太他妈善良了，真感谢上天派你来拯救我们。

original: You better believe it. No more beatings, no more forced work, no more slaves being brought here in chains. You did some good work.
translation: 你最好相信。再没有鞭打声，再没有强迫式的工作，再没有戴着枷锁的奴隶被送到这来。你积了点德。

original: Of course, we've got all new problems, now that Ashur and the taskmasters are gone. Not enough food getting brought in, for one thing.
translation: 当然，我们碰到了新的麻烦，现在那个阿舒尔和工头们走了。首先，没有足够的食物送到这边来。

original: Wernher said he'll organize scavenging parties, but I think he'd rather stay up in the bar than actually do any leading.
translation: 沃纳说他会组织拾荒队，不过我想他事实上宁可待在酒馆，也不愿做什么领导工作。

original: Whatever. We'll work it out, somehow.
translation: 管他的。我们总会搞定的。

original: Oh, things are fine. Don't let any grumblers tell you differently!
translation: 哦，都很好。别信那些牢骚鬼跟你说的废话。

original: Oh, sure, there are a few problems... We need scavenging teams, people to fight off the Trogs, and overseers for the mill's operation.
translation: 哦，当然，有一些小麻烦……我们需要拾荒人员，能够击退这些兽化人的人手，以及轧钢厂的监工。

original: But it's a small price to pay for seeing the end of Ashur and his bastards, right?
translation: 但只要能让阿舒尔和他那帮狗娘养的完蛋，这代价就不算什么，对吧？

original: Ah, of course. Would these plans happen to involve stealing a precious little something from me?
translation: 噢，当然。这些计划牵扯到从我身上偷取珍贵的小东西吗？

original: Don't look so surprised. Your arrival was too convenient, and even if you never met Wernher, I'm sure he got someone to make you an offer.
translation: 别太吃惊。你来到了这儿也太容易了，即使你从没见过沃纳，我也肯定他派了手下跟你达成交易。

original: It's okay, I get a lot of people trying to betray me. Part of the position, really. You can be honest with me.
translation: 那很好，有些人想背叛我。这个位置上的部分人，真的。你可以对我说实话。

original: That's what I wanted to hear! You've got a bright future ahead of you in The Pitt, new blood.
translation: 那是我想听到的！你为自己在匹兹堡赢得了光明的未来，新兵。

original: In fact, I'd like to let you in on a little secret, and show you the amazing advance that'll secure our place in the Wasteland.
translation: 事实上，我想让你参与一项机密，向你展示令人称奇的技术，那将保障我们在废土上的安全。

original: Now, I think, would be a good time for you to meet the cure for yourself. Let's take a trip back to the lab, where Sandra can explain...
translation: 现在对你来说将是一段美好的时光，你会亲眼见识到这种解药。让我们回到实验室，桑德拉会解释……

original: I have information of great value to anyone willing to help me free my people.
translation: 谁愿意帮助我的人民，我就把这个有重大价值的信息告诉他。

original: Don't hurt me!
translation: 别伤害我！

original: <Cries.>
translation: <哭泣。>

original: Sorry.
translation: 抱歉。

original: It won't happen again.
translation: 不会再犯了。

original: I'm going!
translation: 我走了！

original: Sorry... I'm just so tired. I'll work harder. Don't hurt me.
translation: 抱歉……我太困了……我会卖力干活。别伤害我。

original: Get back to work, maggot!
translation: 回去干活，你这条蛆！

original: You can rest when you're dead. And I'd be happy to help you out with that.
translation: 你死了就可以休息了。我很高兴帮你解脱。

original: You want to keep your brains in your head? Get to it!
translation: 想你的脑髓留在你的脑袋里吗？干活！

original: Nap time's over, asshole. On your feet!
translation: 打盹时间过了，混球。站起来！

original: <Whistles>
translation: <口哨>

original: Now, stay still while mommy takes a few readings. Don't worry, dear, you're perfectly safe!
translation: 妈妈阅读的时候别乱动。别着急，亲爱的，你绝对安全！

original: I missed on purpose. The next one won't. Now back to work!
translation: 我故意没打中，下一枪不会了。回去干活！

original: I won't miss next time!
translation: 下次我不会射偏！

original: You got a death wish?!
translation: 你想死吗？

original: Get up!
translation: 站起来！

original: On your feet, maggot!
translation: 站起来，你这条蛆！

original: You want to die, asshole? Back to it!
translation: 你想死，混球？回去！

original: Well, you might try a disguise. They probably won't let some random armed Waster past the gates.
translation: 也许，你可以想个法子乔装打扮一下。他们估计不会让持枪的外人通过这些门。

original: But if you look like one of the working stiffs, you should be able to slip in with no problem.
translation: 不过你要是看起来像个工人的话，溜进去应该不是什么问题。

original: Lucky for us, a group of Slavers is nearby waiting to make a sale. You should be able to get one off of them.
translation: 我们很走运，附近有一群奴隶贩子在等着做买卖，你去扒一个应该没什么问题。

original: They're off to the west, near the tunnel that leads to The Pitt. That should be our first move.
translation: 他们去了西边，就在通向匹兹堡的隧道附近。那里该是我们的第一个目的地。

original: It looks like you've already got a set of Slave Clothes to disguise yourself with. Good. That'll make things easier.
translation: 你看来像是已经搞到了一套奴隶的衣服。很好，这样事情就好办多了。

original: I'll meet you up by the tunnel that leads to The Pitt. You go get whatever you'll need for the trip.
translation: 我会在通向匹兹堡的隧道附近跟你碰头。你先去准备点路上用得到东西。

original: Make sure you're prepared. It's a long trip and you won't be back here for a while.
translation: 确定你准备好了。这是趟长途旅行，你一时半会回不来了。

original: It's the key to a cure for the mutations. Everyone in The Pitt is mutated in some way. Some are just sick, some are... worse.
translation: 它是治愈变异的关键。匹兹堡的每个人都在一定程度上产生了突变。一些人只是生了病，一些人……更糟。

original: The bosses have the key to the cure. With it, we can take control of the city and free my people.
translation: 这些老板们掌握着这个关键的解药。有了它，我们就可以控制这座城市，解放我的人民。

original: They know that I know about the cure. All of them will be looking for me by now. That's why those guys came all the way here.
translation: 他们知道我对这个解药有所了解，他们所有人现在都在搜捕我。那就是为什么那些家伙一路追到这里来的原因。

original: I came here because I needed an outsider. Someone like you, who has the strength to pull off what I need.
translation: 我来这是因为我需要有一个外来人，就像你一样的人，有能力帮我达成我的目的。

original: The city is controlled by a man named Ashur. He's powerful. No one there dares go against him. No one except me.
translation: 这座城市被一个叫阿舒尔的人控制着。他很强，没有人敢与他作对。除了我。

original: I need you to sneak into The Pitt and find a way to get close enough to him to steal the cure. Nothing to it, right?
translation: 我要你潜入匹兹堡，想法子接近他，偷走解药。没什么大不了的，对吧？

original: I'm on the run from our dead friends over there. As soon as I found out about the cure, they came after me.
translation: 我从我垂死的朋友们那里逃跑了。只要我能找到这个解药，他们就会跟随我。

original: And you can be damn sure they won't be the only ones.
translation: 到时肯定其他人也会跟随。

original: Yeah. That's why these guys were after me. As long as I know about the cure, I'm a threat. So I ran.
translation: 是的。这就是为什么这些家伙们追赶我。只要我知道解药的事，我就是个威胁。所以我跑了。

original: And you can be damn sure there will be more of 'em coming.
translation: 肯定有更多的人正在赶过来。

original: The Citadel, huh? That's the Brotherhood of Steel fortress, right? Yeah, I know about those guys.
translation: 五角大本营吗？那是钢铁兄弟会的老窝，对吧？是的，我对那些家伙略知一二。

original: He must have been part of the attack that cleaned up The Pitt. Well... it didn't so much clean it up as it calmed it down.
translation: 他肯定是匹兹堡那场扫荡行动的一份子。嗯……那场袭击并没有把那儿清洗干净，只是让那儿平静了一会。

original: No way that hellhole could ever be cleaned up without the cure. That's why those guys were after me.
translation: 没有办法，没有解药的话，那个堕落之地不可能被清洗干净，那就是那些家伙为什么追赶我的原因。

original: Well, look at you, Moneybags. Right down to business. Gotta respect that.
translation: 瞧瞧你，大财主。要办正经事，必须尊重那。

original: But before you get anything, what I need you to do is to take a trip with me to a place called The Pitt.
translation: 不过在你有所收获之前，我要你跟我去一个叫匹兹堡的地方走一趟。

original: It's a city to the northwest of here, a long way away. I want you to come with me and help me steal something that will free my people.
translation: 它是西北方向一座遥远的城市。我要你跟我一起去，帮我偷件东西，它可以解放我的人民。

original: Well now, a hero! Look at you.
translation: 来了个英雄！瞧瞧你。

original: I come from a place far to the northwest. It's called The Pitt. It's... well... let's be honest...
translation: 我从西北一个叫匹兹堡的遥远地方来。那地方……嗯……我们开门见山吧……

original: The place is a nightmare... radiation, mutation, disease. But the worst of it: my people, some of the only survivors, are slaves.
translation: 那地方是个噩梦……辐射，变异，疾病。不过最坏的情况是：我的人民，仅有的一些幸存者，都是些奴隶。

original: No big deal, you're thinking? It's a rough world. But I have the chance to free them. All I need is an outsider's help before that chance is gone.
translation: 没什么大不了的，你觉得呢？那是个粗暴的世界。不过我有机会解放他们。在错失那个机会之前，我迫切需要一个外来者的帮忙。

original: My clothes? Off my back? Well... I guess. You did help us. I'm sure... I'm sure I'll make do out there in the wastes.
translation: 我的衣服？从我身上脱下来？那么……我想想。你确实帮了我们的忙。我肯定……我肯定我在废土中是可以将就一下的。

original: I... don't worry about me. I'll find something, I'm sure. Take them, please. Take them.
translation: 我……不为自己担心。我会找到些穿的。我肯定。带上它们，求你了，带上它们。

original: We will. Thank you again, stranger. We owe you our lives.
translation: 我们会的。再次谢谢你，陌生人。我们欠你一条命。

original: Yes... ma'am. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.
translation: 是……女士。是，我们马上就走。再次谢谢你。你心地真好。

original: Yes... sir. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.
translation: 是……先生。是，我们马上就走。再次谢谢你。你心地真好。

original: Yes... ma'am. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.
translation: 是……女士。是，我们马上就走。再次谢谢你。你心地真好。

original: Yes... sir. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.
translation: 是……先生。是，我们马上就走。再次谢谢你。你心地真好。

original: My clothes? Off my back? Well... I guess. You did help us. I'm sure... I'm sure I'll make do out there in the wastes.
translation: 我的衣服？从我身上脱下来？那么……我想想。你确实帮了我们的忙。我肯定……我肯定我在废土中是可以将就一下的。

original: I... don't worry about me. I'll find something, I'm sure. Take them, please. Take them.
translation: 我……不为自己担心。我会找到些穿的。我肯定。带上它们，求你了，带上它们。

original: That guy over there on the mattress died last night. I never did get his name.
translation: 那边那个家伙昨晚死在了床垫上，我到不知道他叫什么。

original: If you don't mind the smell, you can just take his.
translation: 你要是不嫌弃这阵臭味，你可以把他的拿走。

original: Wait... we're free? You're serious? You're just going to let us go? Thank you! Thank you so much!
translation: 等等……我们自由了？你说真的吗？你要让我们走？谢谢你！非常谢谢你！

original: Wait... we're free? You're serious? You killed them and we're just free to go?
translation: 等等……我们自由了？你说真的吗？你杀了他们，而我们可以自由地走了？

original: You're either the kindest person in the world or the dumbest. Either way: thank you. I can help you. It's the least I can do.
translation: 你不是世界上最好的人就是最笨的人。不管怎么说，谢谢你。我可以帮你的忙，这是我能给你的唯一回报。

original: What is it that you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Wait... we're free? You're serious? You just paid money just so you can let us go?
translation: 等等……我们自由了？你说真的？你付钱就是为了让我们走？

original: You're either the kindest person in the world or the dumbest. Either way: thank you. I can help you. It's the least I can do.
translation: 你不是世界上最好的人就是最笨的人。不管怎么说，谢谢你。我可以帮你的忙，这是我能给你的唯一回报。

original: What is it that you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Thank you! Thank you so much!
translation: 谢谢你！实在是太谢谢你了！

original: My clothes? Off my back? Well... I guess. You did help us. I'm sure... I'm sure I'll make do out there in the wastes.
translation: 我的衣服？从我身上脱下来？那么……我想想。你确实帮了我们的忙。我肯定……我肯定我在废土中是可以将就一下的。

original: I... don't worry about me. I'll find something, I'm sure. Take them, please. Take them.
translation: 我……不为自己担心。我会找到些穿的。我肯定。带上它们，求你了，带上它们。

original: You're gonna be checking my foot up your ass if you don't leave us alone.
translation: 你要是不让我们安静地呆着，你就能看到我的脚踢在你的屁股上。

original: This is the last time I'm gonna warn you. Waste my time again, and you're fuckin' dead.
translation: 我最后一次警告你，再浪费我的时间，你他妈的就死定了。

original: That's it! I've had enough of your shit!
translation: 够了！我受够你了！

original: Yeah? Well, like I said: 200 each.
translation: 是吗？那么照我说的，每个200。

original: Yeah? Well, like I said: 200 each. You came an awful long way just to waste my time screwing around.
translation: 是吗？那么照我说的，每个200。你大老远气喘吁吁地跑过来，别只是为了浪费我的时间。

original: Yeah? And I don't want my boss to kick my ass.
translation: 是吗？我可不想我的老板收拾我。

original: So, unless you're the dude from The Pitt, these slaves ain't for sale. Piss off.
translation: 除非你是来自匹兹堡的家伙，否则这些奴隶不卖。滚开。

original: Oh, I knew not to trust you Pitt bastards!
translation: 哦，我就知道不该相信你这个匹兹堡来的杂种！

original: What? Are you serious? You'd better hurry back here. I'd like to sell this meat some time before I'm an old man.
translation: 什么？你开玩笑吧？你最好快回来。我希望在我成为老头子之前卖掉这几块肉。

original: Jesus Christ! Hurry up and make up your damn mind, will you?
translation: 天啊！赶快下你那该死的决心吧，好吗？

original: Finally. Here's the key to the gate. Do whatever you want with 'em. I couldn't care less.
translation: 很好，给你大门钥匙。你可以对他们做你想做的任何事。我不会管的。

original: Oh, hey: Eulogy says to tell your man that we're sorry that we could only get three. We'll get a better roundup next time.
translation: 哦，嗨，尤勒基让我跟你们的人讲，我们很抱歉，这回只抓到了三个奴隶。下一回围捕我们会努力点。

original: Pleasure doing business with you.
translation: 很高兴跟你做生意。

original: Yes. Go. Asshole.
translation: 好，滚吧，混蛋。

original: Not that it's any of your business, but we're waiting for some dudes who live up north.
translation: 告诉你也无妨，我们在等一些北方来的人。

original: They've been buying up all the meat they can get their hands on.
translation: 他们买下了所有他们能买到下的奴隶。

original: No clue why, but they pay good money, so I don't really care.
translation: 我不知道他们买奴隶来做什么，不过他们出手很大方，所以我压根就不关心。

original: Well, that's how it is, huh? Well, right now I want you to be a customer.
translation: 哦，是吗？那你现在就是我的顾客了。

original: Usual price: 200 each. Boss says no trade. Cash only.
translation: 老价格：每个200。不讲价，只收现金。

original: Damn right. Piss off.
translation: 这就对了，快滚。

original: Oh? Is that so? Well then, kill away!
translation: 哦？就那样吗？那好，来吧！

original: Waiting for Santa Claus, what do you think? We're here to do business.
translation: 难道我们在等圣诞老人吗？我们来这是做生意的。

original: So, if you're not who we're waiting for, then I suggest you fuck off before I shove my gun so far up your ass that you start burping lead.
translation: 如果你不是我们要等的人，那我建议你在我把枪插进你屁股之前赶紧滚开。

original: About damn time you showed up. We've been waiting here for-fucking-ever.
translation: 你他妈的早该来了，我们在这里等太久了。

original: Whatever, man. You're here now. I just hope you're ready to do business.
translation: 随便啦，老兄。你既然来了，那我希望你准备好了谈买卖。

original: We've got three. Usual price: 200 each. Boss says no trade so, cash only.
translation: 我们有三个，老价格：每个200。不讲价，只收现金。

original: I really don't. I'm just glad that you finally showed up. We've been waiting here for-fucking-ever.
translation: 我的确不在乎。我只是很高兴你终于来了。我们他妈的都等了好久了。

original: Whatever, man. You're here now. I just hope you're ready to do business.
translation: 随便啦，老兄。你既然来了，那我希望你准备好了谈买卖。

original: We've got three. Usual price: 200 each. Boss says no trade so, cash only.
translation: 我们有三个，老价格：每个200。不讲价。只收现金。

original: No guts? What do you mean-
translation: 没胆？你什么意思——

original: One of 'em is coming back? Dumbass slaves... Open the gate!
translation: 他们有个人回来了？傻瓜奴隶们……开门！

original: Who is that down there? I can't see a fuckin' thing. Open up the gate, it might be one of those slaves.
translation: 谁在那？他妈的我什么都看不见。打开门，可能是那些奴隶中的一个人。

original: Yeah? Well, I guess that's the difference between us. I have a lot of guts. You don't.
translation: 是吗？那好，我想那是我们之间的差别。我有胆量，你却没有。

original: I might ask you the same thing. You got a lot of guts coming back to this place, Wernher.
translation: 我要问你同样的问题。你还真有种回到这个地方来，沃纳。

original: Hang on. Someone's coming. Let me do the talking.
translation: 等等，有人来了。让我来和他说。

original: Hey, hey! What are you guys doing here?
translation: 嗨，嗨！你们这些家伙在这里干什么？

original: No, I wouldn't. But our snipers could pop the eyes out of your head without even ruffling her hair.
translation: 不，我不会的。不过我们的狙击手甚至可以在没有把她的头发弄乱的情况下将你的眼珠子打飞。

original: Marie's going to be using them as playthings when you're long dead, you son of a bitch.
translation: 在你死了以后，玛丽会把它们拿来当玩具玩，你这个狗娘养的。

original: Yeah, that's what I thought, asshole.
translation: 是的，我就是那么想的，混蛋。

original: The last person to try that was Wernher, and you can be damned sure Ashur's going to turn him into a little ball of pain.
translation: 上一个想这么干的人是沃纳，而阿舒尔肯定会让他粉身碎骨。

original: I recommend you get out there and help, and maybe I'll forget you had that little lapse of judgement.
translation: 我建议你赶快离开这里到外面去帮忙，没准我会忘掉你刚才的一时冲动。

original: Oh, it'll be fine. I can take care of extracting the full cure from it, and meanwhile the slaves can raise it as one of their own.
translation: 哦，它没事。我可以从它身上提取完整的解药，这期间奴隶们可以把它当作自己的孩子抚养。

original: Slaves get the cure, and by the time the baby's all grown-up, she won't even remember a thing!
translation: 奴隶们将拿到解药，而等到这个孩子长成大人，她什么都不会想起来！

original: It's a resilient little spud! Don't you worry about it.
translation: 它只是颗有弹性的小土豆！别担心。

original: What, you didn't like our little welcome? Us big kids playing too rough with you?
translation: 什么，你不喜欢我们小小的欢迎仪式？我们这些大孩子对你太粗鲁了？

original: You want a rematch, or are you gonna go cry about it some more?
translation: 你是想重赛，还是想再哭鼻子？

original: Think of it as clearing the stage. The cure in this brat's genes is the only thing worth keeping, and now we can wipe that hellhole clean.
translation: 把它看作是新时代开始的信号吧。这个调皮孩子基因里的解药是唯一值得保存下来的东西，现在我们可以把这个堕落之地清洗掉。

original: And that takes us to the last part of the plan: letting the Trogs overrun Uptown, killing every last bastard in there.
translation: 这样我们就进入到这个计划的最后部分：让兽化人席卷上城区，杀掉那里剩下的每一个狗娘养的。

original: Leaving you to take Ashur's place.
translation: 接下来你去占领阿舒尔的地盘。

original: It means that we can study Ashur's bastard, and once we dig the cure out of it, make sure that we all get the treatment.
translation: 这意味着我们可以研究阿舒尔的私生子，一旦我们找出治疗法，就能确保我们所有人都能得到治疗。

original: But more importantly, it means we're ready for the last part of the plan - letting the Trogs overrun Uptown and wipe out the bosses.
translation: 但更重要的是，这表示我们已经为计划的最后一部分做好了准备——让兽化人席卷上城区，消灭老板们。

original: Leaving the slaves free, and turning the bosses into Trog food!
translation: 让奴隶们自由，把老板们变成兽化人的口粮！

original: Hold on, there. Sure, you brought Ashur's spawn, so the tough part's over. But there's one last bit of housekeeping to take care of.
translation: 别着急。当然，你把阿舒尔的小崽子带来，最难的部分就结束了。不过最后还有一点家务事要处理。

original: We let the Trogs overrun Uptown, and there won't be any bosses left to get in our way.
translation: 我们要让兽化人席卷上城区，这样就不会有任何剩下的老板来挡我们的道了。

original: Leaving you in control of the city, and with the appreciation of many grateful ex-slaves.
translation: 接下来你就能控制这座城市，赢得所有前奴隶的感激。

original: Yeah, because you would have just whined about it. If you aren't getting your hands dirty, you aren't making a difference. Welcome to the world.
translation: 是啊，因为你只会发牢骚。如果你不脏了自己的手，你就不会有所作为。欢迎来到这个世界。

original: What's important is that the kid is here now, and we can move on to the last part of the plan.
translation: 重要的是有了这个孩子，我们可以进行计划的最后一部分。

original: That's just a simple matter of letting the Trogs overrun Haven and take care of the bosses for us.
translation: 让兽化人占领避风港，然后替我们收拾老板们。

original: Oh, boo-fucking-hoo. You don't think bringing those bastards down is worth getting your hands dirty?
translation: 哦，别哭。你不觉得干掉那些狗娘养的值得弄脏你的手吗？

original: No, I guess you're okay with torturing, slaving scum like that, just so long as you don't have to make a decision, huh?
translation: 不，我猜你对折磨和奴役这样的恶心事都感觉，因为决定不是你下的。对吧？

original: And you just went along with him, did you? To hell with everyone else but you, huh?
translation: 你只是和他结伴而行，对吗？除了你，每个人都该死吗？

original: Here, I thought that you of all people would understand that sometimes you have to get your hands dirty to make a difference.
translation: 我还以为你会懂得要想让这地方改变，有时必须弄脏自己的手。

original: But you're just a coward, afraid of making a choice. Afraid of changing the world!
translation: 原来你只是一个胆小鬼，害怕做选择，害怕任何改变！

original: She's not just any baby. She holds the promise of a cure for our own children, and we can ransom her back for our freedom.
translation: 她可不是个平常的孩子。她掌握着治疗我们自己孩子的承诺，我们可以用她赎回我们的自由。

original: Don't think I enjoy this any more than you. But it's the only way we can be free and healthy enough to leave.
translation: 别以为我比你更喜欢干这种事。不过这也是我们得到自由，健健康康离去的没有办法的办法。

original: Of course I knew, but you don't see me blubbering about it. That baby is our only chance of a cure and freedom from this hellhole.
translation: 我当然知道，不过你没见到我为此哭过。那个孩子是我们从这个鬼地方解救出来的唯一机会。

original: But if it makes you feel better, when we're done, she'll be back with her parents, and never needs to know any of this happened. So quit whining.
translation: 不过你要是想觉得好过点，等我们做完了，她会回到她父母身边，永远不必知道出了这么一档子事。所以，你别再哀号了。

original: Of course, she'll be safe. We're just going to do our own research for the cure, and then ransom her back for our freedom.
translation: 当然，她会平安无恙的。我们只是要自己研究出治疗法，然后用她赎回我们的自由。

original: You've seen how Ashur and his people treat us. It's far, far kinder than they deserve.
translation: 你也看到了阿舒尔和他的人是怎么对待我们的。这比让他们得到应有的惩罚不知道要仁慈多少倍。

original: Don't get all sentimental on us now. This child will provide us a cure, and in exchange for our freedom, she can go back to her family.
translation: 我们别再感情用事了。这个孩子将为我们提供解药，交换我们的自由，然后她就可以回家了。

original: And if something happens to her family, I'm sure she'll grow up fine with us. She wouldn't even have to know the monsters her real parents were.
translation: 她的家庭要是出了什么事，我保证我们会把她养大。她甚至无须知道她的亲身父母是这样的一些怪物。

original: Oh, now I see how it is! Think you're going to become Ashur's new lieutenant, do you? Maybe wait until you can take his throne?
translation: 噢，我明白是怎么一回事了！你将成为阿舒尔的新副官，对吗？你或许会取而代之？

original: I've seen your type come and go, and they always leave town face down in the river.
translation: 我总是能见到你这种人，他们最后也总是死在河里的。

original: So, fine. You picked your side, and you made your choice. See where that takes you.
translation: 那么，很好。你选了你的立场。我们等着瞧你会有什么样的归宿。

original: Of course I knew, you dolt. I also know it's the only chance we had of finding a cure and ransoming our freedom.
translation: 我当然知道，你这个傻瓜。我也知道这是我们找到办法，赎回自由的唯一机会。

original: If they ever find a cure, do you think they'll share it with us? Of course not. Why waste medicine on people you'll just work to death, anyway?
translation: 他们要是最终找到办法，你以为他们会和我们分享吗？当然不会。不管怎么说，为什么把药浪费在为劳而死的人身上？

original: We're just supposed to live and die in slavery, and watch our children turn into monsters, all because you don't have the balls to do your job?
translation: 那我们就该老老实实地在奴隶制度下生老病死，眼睁睁的看着我们的孩子变成怪物，一切都是因为你没有闭上嘴干活？

original: Wake up, you simple-headed sap. That baby could do more good for us than all of his mongrel raider family ever did for us combined.
translation: 醒醒吧，你这个头脑简单的傻瓜。那个孩子比他整个杂种掠夺者家族曾给我们的所有一切加起来都有用处。

original: No, we expected you to steal the one thing that was both a cure for our children, and a hostage to earn our freedom.
translation: 不，我们希望你去偷一个东西，那既是我们孩子的解药，也是我们赢得自由的人质。

original: But congratulations, your petty sentimentality has doomed us to continued slavery and pestilence. Thanks.
translation: 不过恭喜，你卑微的多愁善感注定了我们要继续在奴隶制度和瘟疫下苟延残喘。谢谢。

original: You're a dear, but things are well in hand, here.
translation: 谢谢你的热情，不过这里一切都在掌握中。

original: If you really want to help, you should probably go deal with whatever had Ashur rushing off in such a hurry.
translation: 要是真想帮忙，你应该可以帮阿舒尔处理一些让他焦头烂额的事。

original: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got to take care of one last test before Marie's nap-time.
translation: 现在，你要是方便的话……我在玛丽打盹之前要处理最后的一项测试。

original: No, no, nothing like that. Calm down, these are just observational tests, and perfectly safe for Marie.
translation: 不，不，跟那一点都不是一回事，这些只是观察测试，对玛丽来说绝对安全。

original: Ashur and I would never risk her health, and if that means it takes longer to develop a full cure, then, well... everyone else can wait.
translation: 阿舒尔和我是绝对不会拿她的健康冒险的，如果那意味着要花比较长的时间开发完整的解药的话，那么……反正其他人都可以先等着。

original: Oh, no, these tests are perfectly safe. In fact, between the crib and her uncanny health, she's probably the safest child in the world!
translation: 哦，不，这些测试绝对安全。实际上，处在这张摇篮和她超人的健康状况之间，她可能是这个世界上最安全的孩子。

original: Ashur and I would never risk her health, and if that means it takes longer to develop a full cure, then, well... everyone else can wait.
translation: 阿舒尔和我是绝对不会拿她的健康冒险的，如果那意味着要花比较长的时间开发完整的解药的话，那么……反正其他人都可以先等着。

original: Really? You think you're just going to waltz in here and take my daughter? The daughter of the Lord of The Pitt?
translation: 真的吗？你以为光轻轻松松的走进来就可以带走我的女儿？匹兹堡国王的女儿？

original: You'll be shot dead before you reach the bridge, all without so much as spilling a drop of blood on Marie's blankie. And that's if you're lucky.
translation: 你还没走到桥上，就会被乱枪射死，甚至你的血都溅不到玛丽的襁褓上，这还是在你走运的情况下。

original: If they take you in one piece, I'll string you up on the bridge, and keep you alive until Marie's old enough to shoot you, herself.
translation: 他们要是没把你大卸八块，我会把你活活地吊在桥上，等到玛丽长大，让她自己来嘣了你。

original: No really. It's nothing short of a miracle, but Ashur and I couldn't be happier. Our daughter was born with an immunity to The Pitt's mutations.
translation: 不，真的，这完全就是个奇迹，不过阿舒尔和我不能高兴得太早。我们的女儿生来就有一种对匹兹堡生物变异的免疫力。

original: What's more, Marie's miracle should lead us to a vaccine for others. And maybe even protection from other effects of radiation.
translation: 进一步的说，玛丽的奇迹有可能带领我们为其他人找到疫苗，甚至可能保护其他人免遭辐射。

original: Well, this is a nice surprise. Apparently, you and Ashur are the only other people who know anything about science in this place.
translation: 嗯，这真是有点意外。显然，你和阿舒尔是这里唯一懂科学的人了。

original: Yes, it seems that our daughter was born with a naturally acquired immunity to any form of mutation. It's nothing short of a miracle, honestly.
translation: 是的，看来我们的女儿天生就对任何形式的变异有免疫力。老实说，这简直就是个奇迹。

original: I'm still trying to figure out why, but she may just hold the key to stopping The Pitt's Trog problem. Hell, maybe other types of mutations, too!
translation: 我仍在想法子研究出原因，不过她可能正好掌握着阻止匹兹堡兽化人问题的关键。对，也许还有其他类型的变异！

original: Believe it or not, she's both. My daughter appears to have a naturally acquired immunity to any form of mutation.
translation: 信不信由你，她两者都是。我的女儿似乎对任何种类的变异有先天的免疫性。

original: Basically, she won't turn into one of the Trogs. Or a Ghoul, or anything else. And by studying her, we can keep that from happening to others, too.
translation: 基本上，她不会变成兽化人，或是尸鬼，或者其他什么怪东西。通过对她的研究，我们也可以阻止这些变异发生在其他人的头上。

original: It's not like we were going to harm her. We just needed to kidnap her for our freedom. Look, sometimes, these things have to happen!
translation: 我们没打算伤害她，我们只是为了我们的自由所以才这么做。听着，有时候会逼不得已！

original: Okay, okay! Wernher was the one who wanted to steal the baby. I just wanted our freedom. I didn't think about what it would take.
translation: 好吧，好吧！沃纳是想偷这个孩子的人。我只想得到我们的自由，我不考虑后果。

original: Wernher's hiding in the steelyard. Look for a rooftop door in the southwest. There, are you happy? Go! Just stop looking at me like that!
translation: 沃纳的藏身处在钢院，在西南屋顶一扇门后面。高兴了吧？走吧！别再那样子看着我！

original: Fine, if it'll get you out of the way, go check under the blast furnace in the steelyard.
translation: 好了，我告诉你，你快离开吧。去钢院的鼓风炉下面查查看。

original: Look for a rooftop door in the southwest. It's got a blue light, you can't miss it. But Wernher will put you in your place.
translation: 找到西南屋顶上的门，上头有盏蓝色的灯，别走错了。不过沃纳会叫你明白你是谁的。

original: Oh, sure. You'll just march back to Ashur and his venomous little wifey, and say, "Sorry I stole your firstborn. My mistake!"
translation: 哦，没事。你只要回到阿舒尔和他的毒妇跟前，然后说“对不起，我偷了你的大女儿。我的错！”

original: You're in it this far, it's easier to follow through than it is to back out.
translation: 你都干到这份上了，坚持到底比退缩容易多了。

original: That's the spirit. Just stick with the plan, and everything'll work out fine.
translation: 这么说就对了。按计划行事，一切都会顺利的。

original: Only thing that's left is to finally wipe out all the bastards in Uptown. And that honor falls to you.
translation: 现在唯一剩下的事，就是把上城区所有的混蛋一网打尽。这份殊荣就落到你身上了。

original: The Bear Brothers are dead! Amazing! This newcomer is showing promise, my friends!
translation: 贝尔兄弟死了！不敢相信！这个新手前途无量，我的朋友们！

original: They're savage! They're brutal! They're here to keep this worker in his place -- the undefeated Bear Brothers!
translation: 他们野蛮！他们残忍！他们在这让这位工人无法动弹——不败的贝尔兄弟！

original: Let's find out if the newcomer can hold his own against real fighters! Release! Fight!
translation: 让我们瞧瞧这个新手能不能放倒真正的战士！打开！开打！

original: And there is only one left standing! Only one! Oh, my friends! What a fantastic fight! How far will this slave go?
translation: 仅有一个人能挺到最后！仅有一个！哦，我的朋友们！多么美妙的战斗！这个奴隶能走多远？

original: And now, my friends, we have for you a group of slaves willing to kill and slaughter in order to become one of we privileged few!
translation: 那么，我的朋友们，我们给你们这样一群奴隶一个机会，你们当中谁愿意杀戮，谁就有可能跻身成为特权精英的一员。

original: They will fight! They will die! And all for you! All for your entertainment!
translation: 他们将角斗！他们会死去！一切都是为了你们！都是为了愉悦你们！

original: Now, are they ready to die for their chance at freedom? Let's find out! Release the barrels! Fight!
translation: 现在，他们准备好要为争得自由的机会而豁出命去了吗？我们拭目以待！打开这些桶！开打！

original: I'm not surprised. Just don't take too long. And don't get yourself killed anywhere but in here.
translation: 我不奇怪，只是不要耗得太久。还有，你可别在外面给人做掉了。

original: Well all right! That's what I like to hear! Get on in there!
translation: 这就好！这才是我想听到的！进去！

original: Well all right! That's what I like to hear! Get on in there!
translation: 这就好！这才是我想听到的！进去！

original: If you're ready, just step on in.
translation: 你要是准备好了，就直接走进去。

original: Citizens of The Pitt, workers of Downtown, traders of Uptown, and all fierce souls who do what must be done!
translation: 匹兹堡的平民、下城区的工人、上城区的商人和所有坚守着岗位的凶猛灵魂们！

original: I bring you good news! We stand at the dawn of a new golden age. Where others merely survive, we thrive!
translation: 我给你们带来了好消息！我们站在新黄金时代的拂晓。其他地方的人们只能苟延残喘，而我们欣欣向荣！

original: Our industry is the envy of the Commonwealth! Our safety is the envy of the Capital Wastes! Our might is the envy of Ronto!
translation: 我们的工业生产力压联邦！我们的安全保障冠绝首都废土！我们的力量让伦多羡慕不已！

original: And while I have led your efforts, it has been by your own strength that you have earned all of the envy of the world.
translation: 在我的带领下，你们奋发图强，通过自己的力量赢得了世界上所有人的尊敬。

original: They envy the steel shaped by the workers in our mills, and they envy the strength of our traders and raiders who wield that steel for The Pitt.
translation: 他们羡慕我们的工厂中工人们锻造出来的钢铁，他们羡慕我们的商人，羡慕为匹兹堡挥舞着那些钢铁武器的掠夺者的力量。

original: And most of all, they envy our victories in the struggle for freedom. Because, yes, freedom is what we all work towards.
translation: 他们最最羡慕的是，我们在自由的斗争中所获得的成功。因为，是的，自由是我们付出一切努力的方向。

original: Freedom from fear, freedom from disease, freedom to live as once we did before we were shackled by atomic fire!
translation: 免于恐惧，免于疾病，自由地生活，就像我们被原子之火烤焦之前一样！

original: And so, to celebrate this struggle, I ask my loyal workers: who among you is prepared to fight for your freedom?
translation: 因此，为了庆祝这场斗争，我问我忠诚的工人们：你们当中有谁准备为自由而战？

original: Who among you will risk your life in the crucible to create a new life of freedom in Uptown? Who will take this rare chance to thrive?
translation: 你们当中有谁愿意冒着生命危险，在上城区创造自由的新生活？谁将抓住这个难得的机会茁壮成长？

original: Tough shit. Get back down there where you belong!
translation: 臭屎，回你原来的岗位！

original: Anthony's sick. He sent me to take his place.
translation: 安东尼病了，他派我顶替他。

original: You don't belong up here.
translation: 你不该来这。

original: Yes, you'd think that, wouldn't you? But that's because you're an idiot who thinks he can get away with kidnapping Ashur's daughter.
translation: 是的，你是那么想的，不是吗？不过那只因为你是个以为自己可以带着绑架来的阿舒尔女儿逃走的白痴。

original: Our raiders will tear you apart, and when they're done, Marie will be playing with your bones as a rattle.
translation: 我们手下的掠夺者会扒了你的皮，然后玛丽会把你的骨头拿来当玩具玩。

original: And you really think the slaves can develop a cure more efficiently than I can? Don't be an idiot.
translation: 你真觉得奴隶们能比我更有效率地研制出解药吗？别傻了。

original: And if they so much as pluck one hair off her head, I'll be sure to pluck one eye out of each of theirs.
translation: 他们要敢动她一根头发，我保证会挖下他们每个人的一颗眼珠子。

original: So maybe you should just put her back right this instant and tell those miserable bastards that they can wait until their goddamned turn.
translation: 所以你也许该立刻乖乖将她放回去，然后告诉那些可悲的混蛋，他们可以等到轮到他们的时候。

original: You really think so? Because if you ask me, it might not be too clever to kidnap Ashur's daughter, while in the middle of his army.
translation: 你真这么以为？如果你要问我的话，在阿舒尔的军队包围中绑架他的女儿可不是什么明智的举动。

original: Walk out that door with her, and they'll reduce you to a chunky smear on the wall. And all without ruffling a hair on Marie's head.
translation: 只要带着她走出这扇门，他们就会把你的变成黏在这面墙上的块块碎肉，同时还不会弄乱玛丽一根头发。

original: You think you can get away with this? Every raider in this town will be after your head to bring her back.
translation: 你以为你逃得掉？这镇子的每个掠夺者都会跟在你的屁股后头把她夺回来。

original: If you want to live, I suggest you give her back right this instant.
translation: 你要是想活下去，我建议你马上把她放回去。

original: You don't even know how dead you are, do you?
translation: 你甚至不知道你死定了，对吗？

original: The cure is the key to healing the sickness around here. Look at us. We've all got it.
translation: 这个解药是治疗疾病的关键。瞧瞧我们，我们已经彻底搞到它了。

original: And the more they force us to work in this mess, the worse it gets. People are going Trog faster than ever before.
translation: 他们越强迫我们趟这汤浑水就越糟糕，比以往更多的人会变成兽化人。

original: The cure is the first thing in this place that hasn't been infected.
translation: 这个解药是这块还没被感染的地方的第一要务。

original: What about me? I was born here. I'll probably die here. I've lived my whole life under Ashur's boot heel.
translation: 我的感觉？我生在这，也可能死在这。我一辈子都被阿舒尔踩在脚下。

original: The only thing that keeps me alive is the thought that I might be able to turn the tables someday.
translation: 唯一支撑我活下的是将来某一天我有可能转败为胜的想法。

original: We come from all over. Most were born here, but lately, the bosses have been bringing us in from all over.
translation: 我们来自五湖四海，大多人出生在这，不过最近，这些老板们从各地把我们带进来了。

original: I wouldn't shed a tear, but no. Wernher has a... distraction planned. We haven't been making these weapons for nothing, you know.
translation: 我不会掉一滴眼泪，但不用。沃纳有个……分散注意力的计划。你知道，我们还没让那些武器派上用场呢。

original: But, when you're meeting with Ashur, you'll be close enough to grab the cure. Get it, and bring it to me.
translation: 但是，当你和阿舒尔见面时，你会离解药足够近，可以拿到它。拿到它，然后带给我。

original: Now let's get out there and listen to Ashur's speech. There'll be hell to pay if the guards catch us in here.
translation: 现在我们出去听阿舒尔的演说吧。要是守卫发现我们在这里，我们就死定了。

original: Not exactly, no. Wernher has a... distraction planned. We haven't been making these weapons for nothing, you know.
translation: 完全不是，不。沃纳有……分散敌人注意力的计划。你知道，我们还没有让那些武器派上用场呢。

original: But, when you're meeting with Ashur, you'll be close enough to grab the cure. Get it, and bring it to me.
translation: 但是，当你和阿舒尔见面时，你会离解药足够近，可以拿到它。拿到它，然后带给我。

original: Now let's get out there and listen to Ashur's speech. There'll be hell to pay if the guards catch us in here.
translation: 现在我们出去听阿舒尔的演说吧。要是守卫发现我们在这里，我们就死定了。

original: I was born shortly after the Brotherhood Scourge. As bad as it is now, I can't imagine what it was like before Ashur.
translation: 我出生在兄弟会“天谴行动”之后不久。当时就像现在一样糟，我想不出在阿舒尔之前这里是个什么样子。

original: Some of the stories I heard when I was a little girl... about the Trogs and the Wildmen would scare the hell out of you.
translation: 当我是个小女孩的时候，我听过许多故事……是关于这些兽化人和疯人的，那会把你吓个半死。

original: I don't care how tough you were. Honestly, I don't know how anything survived, let alone how Ashur managed to control any of those freaks.
translation: 我不在乎你有多大本事。老实说，我不知道有任何东西可以幸免于难，不管阿舒尔怎样想尽法子控制那些怪物。

original: Sometimes... just sometimes, I think that maybe things are better with him here...
translation: 有时候……只是有时候，当他还在的时候，我觉得事情也许会有好转……

original: It's simple, really. From time to time, Ashur opens up the arena. We call it the Hole. Any slave who wants to can fight against the gladiators.
translation: 很简单，真的。阿舒尔不时会开放这座竞技场。我们称它为角斗坑。只要他们愿意，任何奴隶都可以和角斗士们打斗一番。

original: If you win, you get your freedom. More importantly: you get an audience with Ashur. It's the only way a slave will ever get to talk to him directly.
translation: 你要是赢了，你会得到自由。更重要的是，阿舒尔将会和你交谈。这是奴隶曾有过的可以跟他直接对话的唯一方式。

original: You fight. You win. And when you talk to Ashur, you take the cure.
translation: 你去角斗，赢得胜利。当你和阿舒尔交谈，带走解药。

original: It's simple, really. From time to time, Ashur opens up the arena. Any slave who wants to can fight against the gladiators.
translation: 很简单，真的。阿舒尔不时的会打开这座竞技场。任何奴隶只要他们愿意，都可以和角斗士们打斗一番。

original: If you win, you get your freedom. More importantly: you get an audience with Ashur. It's the only way a slave will ever get to talk to him directly.
translation: 你要是赢了，你会得到自由。更重要的是，阿舒尔将会和你交谈。这是奴隶曾有过的可以跟他直接对话的唯一方式。

original: You fight. You win. And when you talk to Ashur, you take the cure.
translation: 你去角斗，赢得胜利。当你和阿舒尔交谈，带走解药。

original: What in god's name is a Super Mutant? You know what, never mind. Whatever they are, you're wrong.
translation: 超级变种人是他妈的什么东西？你知道些什么，别担心。不管它们是什么了，总之你都说错了。

original: What it is full of are Trogs.
translation: 事实上，遍地都是兽化人。

original: By itself, no. It isn't. But the area is full of Trogs.
translation: 就其本身而言，没。并不坏。但这地区遍地都是兽化人。

original: I can't really help you there. Ask around. Maybe check with Marco in the Mill. He's been making some of our tools into weapons.
translation: 我帮不了你。去四下打听一下，可以问问轧钢厂的马可。他把我们的一些工具做成了武器。

original: You might even be able to find a gun on one of the dead bosses out in the Steelyard. They- what was that?
translation: 你甚至可以在钢院的老板们的尸体上找到枪。他们——那是什么？

original: I can't really help you there. Ask around. Maybe check with Marco in the Mill. He's been making some of our tools into weapons.
translation: 我帮不了你。去四下打听一下，可以问问轧钢厂的马可。他把我们的一些工具做成了武器。

original: You might even be able to find a gun on one of the dead bosses out in the Steelyard. They- what was that?
translation: 你甚至可以在钢院的老板们的尸体上找到枪。他们——那是什么？

original: You're either an idiot or a smartass, either way I don't think it's funny.
translation: 你要么是个白痴，要么是自作聪明的，不管是哪种我都不觉得有趣。

original: They're what most of us hope we never become but, the contamination gets to everyone.
translation: 我们大多数人都希望自己永远不会变成他们那样，但污染会感染每个人。

original: For most people, it's some form of cancer. Sometimes harmless, sometimes not. For others, the contamination drives them insane.
translation: 对大多数人来说，这是某种形式的癌症。有时无害，有时不是。对其他人来说，污染会让他们发疯。

original: If it doesn't kill them, it changes them. They become animals -- deformed and inhuman. It's not pretty. They're everywhere and they kill on sight.
translation: 即使没有杀死他们，也会改变他们。他们变成了动物——畸形而没有人性 。相当的不妙，他们到处都是，见人就杀。

original: They're what most of us hope we never become. The contamination gets to everyone to some degree.
translation: 它们是我们大多数人都希望我们永远不要变成的东西。这种污染物一定程度会感染每个人。

original: For most people, it's some form of cancer. Sometimes harmless, sometimes not. For others, the contamination drives them insane.
translation: 对大多数人来说，这是某种形式的癌症。有时无害，有时不是。对其他人来说，污染会让他们发疯。

original: If it doesn't kill them, it changes them. They become animals -- deformed and inhuman. It's not pretty. They're everywhere and they kill on sight.
translation: 即使没有杀死他们，也会改变他们。他们变成了动物——畸形而没有人性 。相当的不妙，他们到处都是，见人就杀。

original: What in god's name is a Super Mutant? You know what, never mind. Whatever they are, you're wrong.
translation: 超级变种人是他妈的什么东西？你知道些什么，别担心。不管它们是什么了，总之你都说错了。

original: What it is full of are Trogs.
translation: 事实上，遍地都是兽化人。

original: Yeah? Well the area is full of Trogs.
translation: 是吗？这个地区遍地都是兽化人。

original: I assure you, no one is more unhappy about being here than us. But right now, we need you to do a job we call "collecting the trash".
translation: 我向你保证，没有人比我们更不乐意呆在这里。但现在，我们需要你做一件事，我们称之为“捡垃圾”。

original: Outside of the mill, there are a bunch of steel ingots just laying around. Every so often, the Foreman puts out a work order to collect them.
translation: 在轧钢厂外边，有一堆钢锭散落着。每隔一段时间，工头就会推出一位工人去收集这些钢锭。

original: They never assign it to anyone. They make us pick who's going to do it. Bastards.
translation: 他们从不指派给任何人。他们让我们自己选人去做。杂种。

original: Outside of the mill, there are a bunch of steel ingots just laying around. Every so often, the Foreman puts out a work order to collect them.
translation: 在轧钢厂外边，有一堆钢锭散落着。每隔一段时间，工头就会推出一位工人去收集这些钢锭。

original: It's pretty much a death sentence, but they never assign it to anyone. They make us pick who's going to do it. Bastards.
translation: 这几乎是死刑，但他们从不指派给任何人。他们让我们自己选人去做。杂种。

original: Yeah, and right now, this is what you need to do to help us.
translation: 是的，而现在，你需要做的就是帮助我们。

original: You're not really going to be much use if the guards figure out who you are and stake you out for the Trogs, are you?
translation: 如果守卫发现了你的身份，要把你扔去喂兽化人，你就没什么用了，对吧？

original: Outside of the mill, there are a bunch of old steel ingots just lying around. Every so often, the Foreman puts out a work order to collect them.
translation: 在轧钢厂外边，闲放着不少钢锭。有时候，工头会贴出工作告示找人去收集这些钢锭。

original: It's practically a death sentence and they never assign it to anyone. They make us pick who's going to do it. Bastards.
translation: 谁要是接这份工，几乎等于判了死刑。他们从没把这份工作指派给任何人，他们让我们自己挑人。那些杂种。

original: I don't know what you saw on the way in, but the guards don't really take kindly to workers just standing around.
translation: 我不知道你进来的时候都看到了什么，但守卫们是不会对附近傻站的工人友善。

original: You're going to need to look busy, or they'll sniff you out pretty quickly. And if they get too close, you don't look like you belong here.
translation: 你得看起来很忙，否则他们很快就会把你揪出来。要是他们靠得近些，你看起来就会格格不入。

original: So, I'm going to send you out to do a job that will keep you away from the guards.
translation: 所以，我会派给你一项工作，让你离守卫远远的。

original: I don't know what you saw on the way in, but the guards don't really take kindly to workers just standing around.
translation: 我不知道你进来的时候都看到了什么，但守卫们是不会对附近傻站的工人友善。

original: You're going to need to look busy, or they'll sniff you out pretty quickly. And if they get too close, you don't look like you belong here.
translation: 你得看起来很忙，否则他们很快就会把你揪出来。要是他们靠得近些，你看起来就会格格不入。

original: Oh, I see how it is. You signed on with Ashur, and now you're going to stand by your man. Maybe trying to catch his eye and be his queen?
translation: 哦，我明白咋回事了。你投靠了阿舒尔，现在你要支持你地男人。也许想着法子吸引他的注意，成为他的王后？

original: Well, good luck with that, starfucker. I'm sure the two of you will kill each other eventually, even without my help.
translation: 祝你好运，大白痴。我肯定你们俩最终会互相残杀，甚至不需要我插手。

original: You, him, and this whole town can burn for all I care. I'm gone.
translation: 你，他，还有这整个城镇都下地狱吧，我不在乎。我走了。

original: Sure, fine. Obviously, you've joined with Ashur and I think you've got a bright future as a lackey. You really do.
translation: 当然，好的。看来你已经加入阿舒尔一伙了，我想，作为一个奴仆，你得到了光明的前途。你确实得到了。

original: But you know what? Fuck this city, and fuck the raiders, fuck the slaves, and fuck you too, fucker. I'm gone.
translation: 不过你知道吗？操这座城市，操那些掠夺者，操这些奴隶，也操你这个蠢货。我走了。

original: What's the matter? Still afraid of getting your hands dirty?
translation: 有问题吗？还怕把双手弄脏吗？

original: Let's see if you've got any guts at all.
translation: 来瞧瞧你是不真的有种。

original: They'd rather die for freedom than die working for the raiders.
translation: 他们宁可为自由而死，也不愿为掠夺者工作而死。

original: Please... help us.
translation: 请……帮助我们。

original: What's to tell? Most die. One or two have made it out, but that's about it.
translation: 有什么好讲的？大多数人死了。有一两个人成功杀了出来，就这样。

original: It's pretty simple. When the gates open, you fight. The last one standing wins.
translation: 非常简单，门一打开就开始战斗，最后站着的人就是胜利者。

original: Of course, when the gates open, the barrels drop in. So just make sure you kill the other guy before you die of radiation poisoning.
translation: 当然，一旦门打开，废料桶就会掉下去，所以，你务必在因辐射感染死亡之前干掉其他的家伙。

original: You don't wanna spend too much time with whatever is in those barrels.
translation: 你绝对不想和桶里那些鬼东西待在一起太久的。

original: You're going up against Gruber. He's one of the only slaves to win in the Hole. There's only ever been... what? Three?
translation: 你将挑战格鲁伯，他是角斗坑中仅有的几个获胜的奴隶之一。这里的获胜者只有……多少？好像是三个人？

original: I guess he got a taste for blood. But unfortunately for you, he's got a pretty decent gun.
translation: 我想他对鲜血的味道有嗜好。不过你不太走运，他有把很不错的枪。

original: So, odds are, this is the last time you and I will be talking.
translation: 所以嘛，很可能这就是你我最后一次对话。

original: Ashur says he wants to make this one good so he gave you the Bear Brothers. They're a couple of mean bastards.
translation: 阿舒尔说他希望这场比赛精彩点，所以他派贝尔兄弟上场。他们是一对无耻的混蛋。

original: Hell, rumor has it that they're half way to Trog as it is. But I'm sure you'll do fine. Just fine.
translation: 妈的，有传言说他俩已经快变成兽化人了。不过我相信你能搞定。

original: We're gonna throw you in there with a bunch of the other scabs who think they got what it takes.
translation: 我们会把你和其他自以为有本事的渣滓一起扔进去。

original: You're all gonna fight it out and the last one standing gets to move on. Probably won't be you, though.
translation: 你们都会战斗到最后，最后一个站着的人继续前进。不过可能不会是你。

original: Oh yeah? You sure you're ready to die?
translation: 哦，是吗？你准备好去送死了？

original: This'll be your last fight, scab. One more and I don't get to call you that anymore. You ready?
translation: 这将是你最后的战斗，渣滓。你要是能胜出的话我就不再那样叫你了，准备好了吗？

original: I wouldn't count on luck this time. You damn well better be ready.
translation: 这次我可不会指望运气，你最好做足了准备。

original: Are you sure about that? Once I lock the door, there's no going back. Arena rules.
translation: 你确定吗？我一锁上这扇门，你就没有回头路了。这是竞技场的规则。

original: I'm not surprised. Just don't take too long. And don't get yourself killed anywhere but in here.
translation: 我不奇怪，只是不要耗得太久。还有，你可别在外面给人做掉了。

original: Well, all right. I've got one for you right away. Or you can take some time to put your affairs in order. It's up to you.
translation: 那么，好吧。我立马给你安排战斗，你也可以先去处理好你的个人事务，你自己决定。

original: What? One of the boys hit you upside the head a little too hard? This is the arena. You want to fight? You tell me. I'll set it up.
translation: 什么？你的头被门夹了吗？这可是竞技场啊。你要角斗吗？跟我讲一声，我会为你安排。

original: Then you die and we all have a good laugh. So what do you say? C'mon? We haven't had a good bloodbath in a while.
translation: 等你死在里面，我们大家就能找到点乐子。怎么样？你来吗？我们有好长一段时间没看到精彩的大屠杀了。

original: You don't sign up. You tell me that you want to fight. I set up a fight. You die, and I repeat it with the next jackass slave who comes in here.
translation: 你不用报名。你只要跟我讲一声要去角斗，我就来为你安排。你要是死了，我接着安排下一个傻瓜奴隶进去。

original: Sound good? You want in? C'mon, death's got to be better than your life, am I right?
translation: 听起来不错？你要进去吗？来吧，死比活着更好，我说的对吗？

original: Yeah, but it's gonna take work to clean up after the riots. I can take care of the day-to-day stuff - you just reap the benefits, huh?
translation: 是啊，但骚乱后的善后工作得花点功夫，我可以处理日常事务 — 你坐享其成，好吧？

original: We cut a few corners on researching the brat, so we've already got something good to keep down the rads. It's on the house.
translation: 我们在研究那小鬼的时候走了一些捷径，所以我们已经有了降低辐射的好东西。我请客。

original: But the real wealth of the city is in that steel mill. You'll have access to the ammo press in there, so go nuts. You earned it, kid.
translation: 不过这座城市的真正财富在那座轧钢厂中。你将有权使用那的弹药轧制机，所以，去吧，你应得的，孩子。

original: Keep your shirt on, I'm getting to that! And I promise, you're getting plenty!
translation: 沉住气，我马上就说到了！我保证，你会得到很多的！

original: We cut a few corners on researching the brat, so we've already got something good to keep down the rads. It's on the house.
translation: 我们在研究那小鬼的时候走了一些捷径，所以我们已经有了降低辐射的好东西。我请客。

original: But the real wealth of the city is in that steel mill. You'll have access to the ammo press in there, so go nuts. You earned it, kid.
translation: 不过这座城市的真正财富在那座轧钢厂中。你将有权使用那的弹药轧制机，所以，去吧，你应得的，孩子。

original: Yeah, yeah, everybody's happy. Midea says she'll take care of the kid, when she's not too busy with everything else. Don't worry about it.
translation: 是啊，是啊，皆大欢喜。美狄亚说只要她一有空就会照料这个孩子，别担心。

original: We cut a few corners on researching the brat, so we've already got something good to keep down the rads. It's on the house.
translation: 我们在研究那小鬼的时候走了一些捷径，所以我们已经有了降低辐射的好东西。我请客。

original: But the real wealth of the city is in that steel mill. You'll have access to the ammo press in there, so go nuts. You earned it, kid.
translation: 不过这座城市的真正财富在那座轧钢厂中。你将有权使用那的弹药轧制机，所以，去吧，你应得的，孩子。

original: Sure if that's what you want. I'm sure Harris will keep pouring drinks down your throat, as long as you can afford them.
translation: 当然，如果这是你想要的生活的话。我相信哈里斯会不停把酒倒进你的喉管，只要你付得起他们钱。

original: Or you can help out at the mill by collecting metal from the Steelyard. I'm sure the foreman would be glad to repay you for your work.
translation: 当然，你可以从钢院收集金属助轧钢厂一臂之力，我相信工头会很高兴的给你报酬。

original: And if you want to get on Sandra's good side, you can always bring her toys for Marie. It's a little thing, but it'd make a difference.
translation: 你要是想博取桑德拉的好感，可以不停的为玛丽找些玩具来。只是举手之劳，但很有效。

original: That's up to you. We'll keep working on the cure and keep the city running. You're free to come and go as you like.
translation: 随便你。我们会继续把精力放在解药的研究上，维持城市的运转。而我们也随时欢迎你来。

original: Of course, you can help out at the mill by collecting metal from the Steelyard. It'd help lighten the load on the workers.
translation: 当然，你可以从钢院收集金属助轧钢厂一臂之力，这会提升工人们的工作量。

original: And if you want to work on Sandra's good side, you can always bring her toys for Marie. It's a little thing, but it'd make a difference.
translation: 你要是想博取桑德拉的好感，可以为玛丽找些玩具。只是举手之劳，但很有效。

original: You're fucking right, it won't. I ought to have you thrown out of town. In pieces.
translation: 你真他妈的说对了，不会了。我该把你从镇里扔出去。碎尸万段。

original: But my Marie is safe, Wernher's gone, and the city's got a bright future, so I'm feeling unusually forgiving. Consider yourself lucky.
translation: 不过我的玛丽安全了，沃纳走了，这座城市获得了光明的未来，所以我感觉到了从未有过的宽容。算你走运。

original: Clever thinking, but couldn't you have let us in on your little plan?
translation: 聪明的想法，不过难道你就不能让我们参加你的小计划？

original: No matter. Marie's safe now, and that's what really matters.
translation: 不重要了。玛丽现在安全了，那才是最要紧的。

original: The city's got a bright future ahead of it, and I guess you'll have a chance to see it.
translation: 这座城市拥有光明的前景，我想你会有机会见识到这一点。

original: You're fucking insane. But at least my daughter's back safe and sound. That's all that I care about.
translation: 你他妈的神经病。不过至少我女儿平安无恙的回来了。我只在乎这个。

original: I'll let Ashur decide what to do with you. Get out of my sight.
translation: 我会让阿舒尔决定怎么处置你。从我眼前滚开。

original: You're a goddamned dead man.
translation: 你是个该死的废物。

original: You're a goddamned dead woman.
translation: 你是个该死的废物。

original: I still ought to slice you open. You're lucky my daughter's still safe.
translation: 我仍该把你剁成两半。算你走运，我的女儿平安无恙。

original: I'll let Ashur decide what to do with you. Get out of my sight.
translation: 我会让阿舒尔决定怎么处置你。从我眼前滚开。

original: That's better. Now, I recommend you go hunt down Wernher before I cut off your fingers and give them to Marie as pacifiers.
translation: 很好。在我砍下你的手指，把它们给玛丽当橡皮奶头吸之前，我建议你去搜捕沃纳。

original: I should have gunned you down long ag... what the hell is that?!
translation: 我早该一枪嘣了你……那是什么鬼东西？！

original: This is for Marie, you bastard!
translation: 这是为了玛丽，你这杂种！

original: See? You're stuck on this path, pal. Might as well see it through to the end.
translation: 瞧见没？你回不了头了，伙计。不妨坚持到底。

original: In fact, now comes the fun part: we wipe out all of those bastards in Uptown!
translation: 事实上，现在最有趣的部分来了：我们要把上城区那些狗娘养的消灭干净！

original: You cowardly little shit! You're afraid to get your hands dirty, so you'll go crawling back to Ashur for forgiveness?
translation: 你是一粒胆小的老鼠屎！你害怕把手弄脏，所以你想爬回去求阿舒尔宽恕？

original: And after all this work, you're going to turn around and betray me?
translation: 在所有这些事情之后，你要跟我玩过河拆桥的游戏吗？

original: You know, I already have everything I need from you. So, you're expendable.
translation: 你知道，我已经从你那里搞到了我所要的一切，所以你可以去死了。

original: That's the spirit. Nobody likes a quitter.
translation: 就是这种精神，没人喜欢半途而废的人。

original: In fact, now comes the fun part: we wipe out all of those bastards in Uptown!
translation: 事实上，现在最有趣的部分来了：我们要把上城区那些狗娘养的消灭干净！

original: Bring her back, or you're dead, bastard!
translation: 把她放回去，要不然你死定了，混蛋！

original: Well, since you might be able to help me, I'll let you in on a little secret: the slaves are always planning all sorts of things.
translation: 既然你可能帮的上忙，那我就让你知道一些机密：这些奴隶总在盘算各种各样的事情。

original: I find out what's going on and let the bosses know and they let me shrug off some of the work detail.
translation: 我发现出了什么事，然后告诉老板们，而他们则减少我的工作量。

original: Good deal, huh? If you hear anything, you should let me know.
translation: 是笔好买卖吧？你要是听到什么风吹草动，你该让我知道。

original: Hey now, why so angry? I'm just asking some questions, no reason to jump down my throat. Never mind, then.
translation: 嗨，干嘛这么生气？我只是问了些问题，没必要冲我发火吧。好吧，当我没问。

original: Oh, no reason. Just asking. I haven't seen you before, that's all.
translation: 哦，没有原因。只是问问，我以前从没见过你，就是这样。

original: Never mind, then.
translation: 那算了。

original: I'd like to be free, but I'm not. And the harder I cling to that idea, the more miserable I'll be that I'm stuck here.
translation: 我越想得到自由，我越是得不到。我的愿望越强烈，我的下场就越悲惨。

original: And this work is hard enough without extra misery. Speaking of which, I should get back to it.
translation: 即使没有这些虐待，这工作也很艰苦。说到工作，我该回去干活了。

original: It means that I'd like to be free, but I'm not. And the harder I cling to that desire, the more miserable I'll be that I'm stuck here.
translation: 这话的意思是说，我越想得到自由，我越是得不到。我的愿望越强烈，我的下场就越悲惨。

original: And this work is hard enough without extra misery. Speaking of which, I should get back to it.
translation: 即使没有这些虐待，这工作也很艰苦。说到工作，我该回去干活了。

original: I'd like to be free, but I'm not. And the harder I cling to that idea, the more miserable I'll be that I'm stuck here.
translation: 我越想得到自由，我越是得不到。我的愿望越强烈，我的下场就越悲惨。

original: And this work is hard enough without extra misery. Speaking of which, I should get back to it.
translation: 即使没有这些虐待，这工作也很艰苦。说到工作，我该回去干活了。

original: It means that I'd like to be free, but I'm not. And the harder I cling to that desire, the more miserable I'll be that I'm stuck here.
translation: 这话的意思是说，我越想得到自由，我越是得不到。我的愿望越强烈，我的下场就越悲惨。

original: And this work is hard enough without extra misery. Speaking of which, I should get back to it.
translation: 即使没有这些虐待，这工作也很艰苦。说到工作，我该回去干活了。

original: I'm not cheery, really. I've just accepted my role here. I found a book once. Midea read part of it to me.
translation: 我不快乐，真的。我在这只是扮演我的角色。我曾找到这本书，美狄亚为我读了一部分。

original: It said: "The Master doesn't try to be powerful; he is powerful. An ordinary man keeps reaching for power and thus never has enough."
translation: 书上说：“圣人不绞尽脑汁变得强大，所以他强大。平常人要是得到了权力，就永远不会满足。（译注：语出老子《道德经》第二十二章“夫唯不争，故天下莫能与之争。”）”

original: We are what we wish to be. I found this book once, over by the library. Midea read part of it to me.
translation: 我们现在已经得到我们所想的了。我曾在图书馆找到这本书，美狄亚为我读了一部分。

original: It said: "A good traveler has no fixed plan and is not intent on arriving."
translation: 书上说：“善于旅行的人没有固定的旅行计划，没有抱定决心要达到的目标。（译注：语出老子《道德经》第二十七章“善行无辙迹，善言无瑕谪，善数不用筹策。”）”

original: Ghoul? Who're you calling a Ghoul? Get lost before I dump you in the river!
translation: 尸鬼？你说谁是尸鬼？在我把你倒进河里前滚吧！

original: The Lord of The Pitt knows all, and his eyes see promise where others see rubble.
translation: 匹兹堡之王无所不知，他的眼睛能看到希望，而凡人只能看到碎石残渣。

original: What does he see in you? A cure? A scourge? Or maybe nothing more than a plaything?
translation: 他看中你什么了？解药？痛苦？或者什么都不是，只把你当成个玩具？

original: Soon, Lulu will see what lies inside you! But first, perhaps Ashur's pet needs to be fed?
translation: 鲁璐很快会见到你体内有什么！不过首先，阿舒尔的宠物要喂食了？

original: Perhaps your "assets" appeal to the degenerate women you're used to, but I'm quite immune.
translation: 你的“资产”也许对你过去中意的这个荡妇有吸引力，不过对我却完全免疫。

original: I would never lay with a beast of burden, no matter how impressive it is.
translation: 我从不跟驮畜混在一起，不管它多么美丽动人。

original: I'm sure you think so. The delusion of equality is part of what makes your kind so pitiful.
translation: 我肯定你这么认为。平等的错觉是使得你的本性如此可憎的部分原因。

original: That worked out well for all of us, didn't it?
translation: 那对我们所有的人来说都有好处，不是吗？

original: And don't worry, I'm sure I'll find some excuse to take a potshot at you later. So we can all look forward to that!
translation: 别着急，我肯定稍后会找一些借口朝你放两枪，所以我们都等着瞧好了！

original: I hope so, for your sake. You screw up down in the Mill, you just get a beating. It's harsh, but it heals.
translation: 看在你的份上，我希望如此。你在轧钢厂搞砸了，你只是挨顿打。很严酷，但分歧消除了。

original: But if you screw up when raiding a caravan, you get gutshot and bleed out in the dirt. So you better be as tough as you think you are.
translation: 不过袭击商队时你要是搞砸了，你会吃枪子，血流进沙子。所以，你最好像你所认为的那样有本事。

original: But I do what I can to keep our mistakes from being too fatal. If you need to drop some rads, I'm here to help.
translation: 不过我做了力所能及的事情避免我们的错误太过致命。你要是想减少身体的辐射量，就来这找我。

original: You'd be surprised how many of us worked our way up - even if we don't like to admit it.
translation: 你会觉得吃惊，居然有那么多人这样做——即使我们不想承认这一点。

original: The rest are just toughs from the Wasteland who decided to join the biggest gang around.
translation: 来自废土的其他人很强悍，他们决定加入附近最大的帮派。

original: Either way, watch your back around here. Nobody got to Uptown by playing nice.
translation: 不管怎样，在这附近要当心你的背后。没有人可以悠哉游哉地到达上城区。

original: Oh, you're definitely looking at a lot of risk, up here.
translation: 哦，你在这里绝对有很大的风险。

original: Watch out, or you'll get fed to the Trogs. They just love eating trash.
translation: 当心，不然会被兽化人吃掉。他们就喜欢吃垃圾。

original: Hey, it's not pretty, but it's the truth. We're all just meat in the grinder out here. Today's hotshot is tomorrow's Trog-chow.
translation: 嘿，虽然叫人不爽，但这就是事实。我们在这里都只是磨床上的肉。今天的红人明天就可能是兽化人的盘中餐。

original: Nothing to it but to be the best, and eat our fill before we're next on the plate.
translation: 别无他法，只能努力做到最好，在被端上餐桌之前尽情享用。

original: Work hard and you might just be a grade-A cut like me!
translation: 努力干活，你会像我一样成为A等肉片！

original: Right. Back to work.
translation: 好的。回去工作吧。

original: Sorry I can't help you out.
translation: 抱歉我帮不了你。

original: I don't know you, stranger. I need these for the boys I know are dedicated to the cause.
translation: 我不认识你，陌生人。我需要这些给我认识的致力于这项事业的孩子们。

original: Sorry I can't help you out.
translation: 抱歉我帮不了你。

original: Yeah... you're the one Midea told me about. Wernher sent you, right? I can help you out.
translation: 是的……美狄亚跟我提起过你。沃纳派你来的，对吧？我可以帮你。

original: Take this. It's called an Auto Axe. Nice, huh? I make 'em out of the old car parts the breakers drag in from the city.
translation: 拿上这个，它叫自动斧。很妙吧，嘿？我用那些拆卸工从城里搞来的那台老式汽车的原件做的。

original: Do what you can with it, just be careful around the bosses. Make a wrong move and you're done.
translation: 你随便用，只是小心周围的老板们，走错一步你就完了。

original: Why would you? They'll probably thank you for the information with a bullet to the head. They don't give two shits about you.
translation: 你为什么这么做？他们会一颗子弹爆你的头，来感谢你的情报。他们屌都不屌你。

original: Does ratting me out still sound like a good idea? If so, go squeal to Brand. That little rodent will be happy to hear what you have to say.
translation: 出卖我还是个好主意吗？如果是的话，去告诉布兰德。那只耗子会很高兴听到你要说的话。

original: Now, get the fuck out of my face. I got work to do.
translation: 现在，你他妈的给我滚远点。我要干活了。

original: Weapons. Lot's of 'em. There's something coming... and soon.
translation: 武器，许多武器。有事要发生了……很快。

original: So, I take the crap we find out in the yard and some of the tools we use, and I make them into stuff we can fight the bosses with.
translation: 所以，我把我们在场地里找到的垃圾，以及一些我们用过的工具，都做成可以用来跟老板战斗的东西。

original: Making weapons. Lot's of 'em. There's something coming... and soon.
translation: 造武器，许多武器。要出事了……很快。

original: So, I take the crap we find out in the yard and some of the tools we use, and I make them into stuff we can fight the bosses with.
translation: 所以，我把我们在场地里找到的垃圾，以及一些我们用过的工具，都做成可以用来跟老板战斗的东西。

original: Why would you? They'll probably thank you for the information with a bullet to the head. They don't give a rat's ass about you.
translation: 你为什么这么做？他们会一颗子弹爆你的头，来感谢你的情报。他们才不在乎你呢。

original: If you say so. Just be careful out there. We need everyone healthy.
translation: 你要是这么说的话，只是到那边要小心点。我们要每个人都健健康康。

original: All right. Let's do this fast before the bosses notice.
translation: 好吧，在老板们注意到之前我们快点干吧。

original: I'm not sure if this stuff will kill you faster than starvation or not.
translation: 我不能肯定这些东西是不是会比饥饿更快的杀掉你。

original: Good move.
translation: 正确的决定。

original: That's probably for the best.
translation: 那也许是最好的主意。

original: It's your funeral. Here you go.
translation: 它是你的葬礼。给你。

original: It's your funeral. Here you go.
translation: 它是你的葬礼。给你。

original: Sorry. I'm all out. Check back tomorrow.
translation: 抱歉，我给完了，明天再来吧。

original: Sure. Whatever. Let me know if you need some food.
translation: 当然，随你的便。你要吃的就跟我讲一声。

original: I am working. You must be new here.
translation: 我在干活。你肯定是新来的。

original: I serve the slop to the other slaves. You want food, let me know. The good news is that this crap is nearly unlimited.
translation: 我为其他的奴隶提供肉汤。你要吃的就跟我说。好消息是，这些垃圾几乎无限。

original: But it's mostly radiated water and Trog meat, anyway. You want some or not?
translation: 但不管怎么说，主要是些被辐射过的水和兽化人肉。你要不要来点？

original: Go take a swim in the river. You'll find out for yourself, asshole.
translation: 去河里游泳，你会明白的，混蛋。

original: Ha! That rules out your wit. It must be something else that makes you so interesting to our lord.
translation: 哈！你不聪明。肯定有其他的重要事，让你对我们的王这么有兴趣。

original: Lulu will see soon enough. Oh yes. But first, perhaps Ashur's pet needs to be fed?
translation: 鲁璐一眨眼就会见到的。噢，是的，不过首先，阿舒尔的宠物要喂食了？

original: It's the price I pay for perfection.
translation: 这是我的完美出价。

original: And a fair price it is, if it means I can avoid things like you.
translation: 我要是能躲开像你这样的人，那么这个价钱很公道。

original: I should hope so! That's what I did when I was fighting down there.
translation: 我希望如此！那就是我在那边战斗时所做的。

original: And it really gets the crowd going when they see you've got some fight in you!
translation: 当人们看见你斗志昂扬，他们也会群情激荡！

original: Fuck yes, we do. Those lazy workers get food and board, and all they have to do is work the Mill and complain.
translation: 去他的，没错。那些懒惰的工人有吃有住，他们只需要轧钢厂工作和抱怨。

original: But we're the ones who go out on raids to get that food, and we're the ones getting shot at for their lazy asses.
translation: 不过，是我们去抢食物，是我们因为他们的懒惰而挨枪子。

original: So don't you get all weepy for those scabs Downtown. They don't know how easy they got it.
translation: 所以你别为那些下城区的渣滓眼泪汪汪，他们不懂他们得到的东西来自不易。

original: But I do what I can to keep us all standing upright. If you need to drop some rads, I'm here to help.
translation: 但我会尽我所能，让大家都能挺起腰背。如果你需要降辐射，我可以帮你。

original: That's a pissing match you don't want to start around here. We've got people from every blasted-out crater on this coast.
translation: 这种吹嘘是附近常有的狗屁比赛，你不想参加的。在这片海岸，我们让人们远离每一处诅咒的核弹坑。

original: Don't mistake us for those drugged-up idiot Raiders out in the wild. They're an embarrassment to the profession.
translation: 别因为野外那些磕药的白痴掠夺者就误解我们，他们是这个行业的耻辱。

original: You just go out there and prove yourself to Ashur. We'll all be watching.
translation: 你只是跑到那边去，向阿舒尔证明你自己。我们所有人都会盯着你。

original: I already fought my way outta there once. There ain't no force in The Pitt that could make me go back there again.
translation: 我已经从那边出来了。匹兹堡再没有什么力量能让我再回去。

original: Not you, not Ashur, not anything. Got it?
translation: 你不行，阿舒尔不行，什么人都不行。明白？

original: Not hardly. Deep down, we're all meat, and even the best of us is just gonna be Trog-chow someday.
translation: 强不到哪里去。事实上，我们都是肉，即便我们最能干的人也会在将来某一天成为兽化人的口粮

original: No shame in it -- just the way life goes. It's all meat, baby.
translation: 这没什么值得羞愧的——只是一种生存方式，所有的一切都是肉，宝贝。

original: Go! Get him! Get the traitor!
translation: 上！抓住他！抓住这个叛徒！

original: Man, what is wrong with you? There's a window opening, and we've got to jump through while we still can. I'm disappointed...
translation: 老兄，你哪根筋不对了？有一扇窗正在打开，我们得趁现在跳过去。我很失望……

original: Fine. But this IS happening, and when it does, you'd better stay the fuck out of my way, or I may just forget which side you're on.
translation: 好吧。但这事已经发生了，到那时候，你最好别挡我的路，否则我可能会忘了你是站哪一边的。

original: Okay, sure. Pussy out if you want. But when it's all over, when me and the others are on the outside... just remember you had your chance.
translation: 好的，没问题。如果你想的话，缩卵去吧。不过当一切都结束后，当我和其他人到了外面……请记住，你有过这样的机会。

original: What? Man, come on! This is our chance! This is YOUR chance! But you want to stay in the fucking Pitt? What... what happened to you?
translation: 什么？老兄，来吧！这是我们的机会！这是你的机会！但你要留在这该死的匹兹堡？你……你怎么了？

original: Fuckin' A! I knew you had it in you! Okay, well, just do... what you normally do. You'll know when it's time.
translation: 他妈的！我就知道你行！好吧，做……做你平常做的事就好。当时候到了，你会知道的。

original: You're making the right decision here, man. Okay, just stay ready. I'm not sure exactly when. Today, tomorrow, next week, I dunno. But soon.
translation: 你做了正确的决定，老兄。好吧，随时待命就好。我不确定是什么时候，今天，明天，下周，我不知道。不过就快了。

original: Ha! All right! I knew you'd come around! I'll let the others know, and someone will give you the details. We'll hit 'em fast and hard.
translation: 哈！好吧！我就知道你会回心转意！我会通知其他人，有人会来跟你谈细节。我们会既快又狠地揍他们。

original: Perfect. Just hang tight a little while longer, while everything comes together. We'll probably have a meeting soon. I'll let you know.
translation: 非常好。一切就绪前，只要再稍稍坚持一会。我们不久将开个会，到时我会通知你。

original: Okay, I'll do it. But I'm not killing anybody. You understand me? Enough blood's been spilled in this place already.
translation: 好吧，我干。不过我不杀生，你明白我的意思吗？这地方已经流了太多的血。

original: I... <sigh> All right, I'm in. Whatever you need, whenever you need... I'll be ready.
translation: 我……<叹息>好吧，我加入。不管你怎么干，什么时候动手……我都会严阵以待。

original: Fine, fine. I'm with you. What's the worst that could happen? I get myself killed? That's really not much of a deterrent at this point, is it...
translation: 好吧，好吧。我支持你。最坏又能怎样呢？我会害死自己吗？在这一点上，真的没什么威慑力，是吧……

original: Oh, I'm in. Just promise me one thing -- when this shit goes down, you put a weapon in my hand and give me my due.
translation: 哦，算我一个。只要答应我一件事——这破事结束后，你放一把武器在我手里，并给我应得的。

original: No. No! I'm sorry, I... I can't. It's just too risky. We fuck up, and we're Trog food. You want to be lunch for your own brother? Cause I sure don't.
translation: 不，不！对不起，我……我做不到。这太冒险了。我们搞砸了，就成了兽化人的口粮。你想成为自己兄弟的午餐吗？我可不想。

original: You're fucking crazy, you know that? There's no way I'm getting involved in any half-assed escape plan.
translation: 你他妈疯了，你知道吗？我绝对不会参与任何半吊子的逃跑计划。

original: Well. I thought about it and... no. I'm sorry. Better to live a slave than die a free man. It's just not worth it.
translation: 好吧。我想了一下……不行。对不起。宁做奴隶生，不为自由死。这不值得。

original: Not going to happen. You're in over your head. I want no part of whatever craziness you guys are cookin' up. Okay?
translation: 不可能。你自不量力啊。我不想参与你们搞的疯狂计划。好吗？

original: Look, I just want to know if you gave it any thought. You know... what we talked about yesterday. We can't wait forever.
translation: 听着，我只想知道你能不能给点意见。你知道……我们昨天说的事。我们不能一直等下去了。

original: You can't avoid me forever. And I need your decision. You in or out?
translation: 你不可能永远回避我，我要你做决定，干还是不干？

original: Fuck them. Those assholes will be a bad memory once we pull this off. Assuming you're in...
translation: 他妈的，一旦我们成功，那些混蛋将化为糟糕的记忆。你要是加入的话……

original: Just shut up and listen to me. You want to get out of this shithole or not? Look, I need your decision. You with us?
translation: 闭上嘴听我说。你还想不想离开这个狗屎地方？听着，我要你做决定。你跟我们一起吗？

original: There's been talk. An uprising. Happening soon. It can work, but only if we stick together. It's all of us or none of us, man.
translation: 话已经放出去了，一场暴动即将发生。我们团结一致就可以成功。老兄，要么不干，要干就所有人一起干。

original: There's been talk. An uprising. Happening soon. It can work, but only if we stick together. It's all of us or none of us, girl.
translation: 话已经放出去了，一场暴动即将发生。我们团结一致就可以成功。女孩，要么不干，要干就所有人一起干。

original: Revolt is in the air, my friend. It's going to happen with or without you. But I'd like it to happen WITH you. What do you say?
translation: 起义的流言已经传开了，我的朋友，有没有你，都会发生。不过我希望有你。你怎么说？

original: Yeah? Keep it quick... the bosses are watching.
translation: 是吗？快点……老板们在监视。

original: What? You trying to get us both shot?
translation: 干什么？你想我们俩吃子弹吗？

original: What do you want? Come on, hurry up, they'll hear!
translation: 你要什么？来吧，快点，他们会听到的！

original: Not now! They'll see us!
translation: 现在不行！他们会瞧见我们的！

original: Are you crazy? If they see us talking...
translation: 你疯了吗？他们要是看见我们交谈……

original: Can't you see I'm busy?
translation: 没看见我在忙？

original: Not now.
translation: 现在不行。

original: Okay, break's over.
translation: 好吧，休息时间结束。

original: Yes, sir!
translation: 是，长官！

original: Now, I've got a very important meeting with our new friend, so if anything big comes up, you use the intercom.
translation: 现在，我要和我们的新朋友进行一次非常重要的会面，所以要是出了什么大事，你就用对讲机通知我。

original: And keep a watch on Midea at all times - anything big happens, it's bound to go through her.
translation: 时刻监视美狄亚——出任何大事都和她脱不了干系。

original: All right, all right. Put your guards on alert, tell them to be on the lookout for anyone loitering too long downtown.
translation: 好吧，好吧。让你的守卫保持警惕，告诉他们注意任何在下城区游荡太久的人。

original: Whatever we call them, they've been gathering makeshift weapons.
translation: 不管我们称他们什么，他们都已经准备好了临时用的武器。

original: We call them "workers." Helps with morale, reminds them they might earn their freedom, someday.
translation: 我们称他们“工人”，帮助鼓舞士气，提醒他们有一天他们可能会获得自由。

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: "Workers."
translation: “工人。”

original: Sir, we've had sightings of Wernher back in the city, and there's been an increase in chatter between slaves.
translation: 长官，我们在城里发现了沃纳的踪迹，奴隶之间的对话也越来越多了。

original: No, but I may heal the infirm later in the week. Time permitting, of course.
translation: 不，但我可以在本周晚些时候治疗体弱者。当然，时间允许的话。

original: And I suppose you'll follow that up by raising the dead?
translation: 我猜你还会让死人复活吧？

original: I'll be with you, right after I maintain some order and dispense a little justice.
translation: 等我维持好秩序，伸张一下正义之后，我会和你站一起的。

original: And I'm telling you, I've got it covered.
translation: 我告诉你，我能搞定。

original: I'm telling you, they're planning something!
translation: 我告诉你，他们正计划着什么！

original: Good.
translation: 不错。

original: I need to you find a Slave Outfit so we can sneak you into The Pitt. I had to ditch mine whenever I ran for it.
translation: 我需要你找到奴隶服 ，好让我们可以帮你潜进匹兹堡。每次我逃跑，我都避开地雷。

original: I spied on a group of Slavers nearby. They're waiting to make a sale to some guys from The Pitt.
translation: 我侦查到一群奴隶贩子就在附近。他们正等着出售一些来自匹兹堡的家伙。

original: Do whatever you have to, but get a Slave Outfit from them. We don't have much time.
translation: 不管你采用什么法子，都要从他们那里搞到奴隶服。我们没时间了。

original: Gather what supplies you'll need and meet me at the first tunnel to The Pitt. You'll never find your way there without me to guide you.
translation: 收集你要的补给，然后在通向匹兹堡的第一个隧道跟我碰头。要是我不给你当向导，你永远都认不清那边的路。

original: The city is built on the backs of slaves. We're diseased, and suffering. What else do you want to know?
translation: 这座城市建造在奴隶们的脊梁上。我们倍受折磨。你还要知道些什么？

original: What else do you want to know?
translation: 你还想知道其他什么事吗？

original: What do you want to know about it?
translation: 你想了解它什么？

original: Fine. Well, everyone is sick. All of us. The bosses too. Everyone who lives in The Pitt is sick. It's the city it... changes you.
translation: 很好。嗯，每个人都有病。我们所有人，也包括这些老板。每个住在匹兹堡的人都有病。它就是这样的城市，它……改变你。

original: The guys in charge have found something that can cure the disease. And that something is very VERY valuable.
translation: 那些掌管着城市的家伙已经找到的可以治疗这个疾病的东西。那东西非常非常有价值。

original: With it, I can control the city, and we can be free from the bosses. But I need an outsider to help me get it.
translation: 有了它，我就可以控制这座城市，这样我们就可以从这些老板手下解放。不过我需要一个外来者帮我搞到它。

original: It's not like that. You can't catch it from me. The Pitt... it gets to you. It's the water, and the air. You can't escape it.
translation: 它不是那样的。你不会从我身上传染到。在匹兹堡……你会接触到它。它是水，是空气。你逃不掉它。

original: You stay there a few years, and no matter what, it'll get to you. But the bastards who have my people, they've found a way to fight it off.
translation: 你只要在那里待上几年，不管怎样，它都会粘上你。不过那些奴役我们的混蛋已经找到了治疗它的办法。

original: And once they have it perfected, we don't stand a chance.
translation: 一旦他们完善了它，我们就没有机会了。

original: So, I need you to come with me and help me get the cure. With it, we can turn the tables on them.
translation: 所以，我要你跟我一起来，帮我搞到这个解药。有了它，我们可以对他们转败为胜。

original: Once we control the cure, Ashur will have no choice but to free the slaves.
translation: 一旦我们控制了这个解药，阿舒尔别无选择，只能放了这些奴隶。

original: The Pitt is a mess. Nearly everyone who lives there is either sick, dying, or... worse. It's the water. And the air. You can't escape it.
translation: 匹兹堡一团糟。那里的每个活人几乎都处在病态和垂死中，甚至……更糟。它是水，是空气，你逃不掉它。

original: You stay there a few years, and no matter what, it'll get you. But the bastards who have my people, they've found a way to a cure it.
translation: 你只要在那里待上几年，不管怎样，它都会粘上你。不过那些奴役我们的混蛋已经找到了治疗它的办法。

original: And once they have that cure perfected, we don't stand a chance. So, we need the cure to bargain for our freedom.
translation: 一旦他们完善了那个解药，我们就没有机会了。所以我们要拿这个解药来换取我们的自由。

original: The Pitt is a mess. Nearly everyone who lives there is either sick, dying, or... worse. It's the water. And the air. You can't escape it.
translation: 匹兹堡一团糟。那里的每个活人几乎都处在病态和垂死中，甚至……更糟。它是水，是空气，你逃不掉它。

original: You stay there a few years, and no matter what it'll get to you. But the bastards who have my people, they've found the way to cure it.
translation: 你只要在那里待上几年，不管怎样，它都会粘上你。不过那些奴役我们的混蛋已经找到了治疗它的办法。

original: And once they have the cure perfected, we stand no chance. So, we get the cure. With it, we turn the tables on them.
translation: 一旦他们完善了那个解药，我们就没有机会了。所以，我们要搞到这个解药，有了它，我们可以对他们转败为胜。

original: To put it simply: we're slaves. We're some of the only healthy survivors, but we're forced to work like animals.
translation: 简单的说，我们是奴隶。我们是仅有的一些健康存活的人，不过我们被逼着像牲畜一样干活。

original: Not yet, hotshot. Ashur's got people watching me, and I can't keep a baby hidden in this dump.
translation: 还不行，高手。阿舒尔派人监视着我，我不能把孩子藏在这鬼地方。

original: Wernher sent me word that he's hiding out in the Steelyard. He's got everything there to take care of the cure.
translation: 沃纳给我的消息说，他藏在钢院。他已经准备好了一切，来照顾这解药。

original: Take it to him, and he'll handle the rest. Now get going!
translation: 把它给他带过去，剩下的就交给他吧。行动吧！

original: She'll be all right - just not with me. Ashur's guards are always watching me. They'd find her right away.
translation: 她会没事的——只是不能和我在一起。阿舒尔的守卫一直在监视我，他们会马上找到她的。

original: Wernher sent me word that he's hiding out in the Steelyard. He's got everything there to take care of the cure.
translation: 沃纳给我的消息说，他藏在钢院。他已经准备好了一切，来照顾这解药。

original: Take it to him, and he'll handle the rest. Now get going!
translation: 把它给他带过去，剩下的就交给他吧。行动吧！

original: Hey! Wake up, you fucks!
translation: 嗨！醒醒，你他妈的！

original: Hey... meat! Meat meat meat! Look alive, meat!
translation: 嗨……肉！肉肉肉！快点，肉！

original: C'mon! Can't sell you if you don't look healthy! Walk around or something!
translation: 快点！你要是病怏怏的是卖不出去的！来回转圈圈走动！

original: Hey! No dying! I'll kick your ass if you die on me! Dead meat isn't worth a thing!
translation: 嗨！别死！你要是快死了我就宰了你！死肉是值不了钱的！

original: C'mon! Dance or something! You're boring!
translation: 快点！跳个舞！你这个无趣的家伙！

original: Stupid meat! C'mon! Amuse me!
translation: 蠢肉！过来！逗我玩玩！

original: Don't make me come in there...
translation: 别让我过去……

original: Hold it right there, grinder. Inspection.
translation: 待在那别动，磨工。检查。

original: Hold it right there, Waster. Inspection.
translation: 呆在那别动，废物。检查。

original: Come on, we're almost there. It's just past this gate.
translation: 来吧，我们快到了，穿过这扇门就是。

original: Tell you what. You arrange for the two of us to have some fun, and then let me know. Until then... it's back to work.
translation: 跟你讲吧，你为我们俩准备些乐子，然后通知我。在那之前……回去干活。

original: Yeah, well, we'll see. Anyway, I got to get back to my shift.
translation: 是的，很好，我们走着瞧。不管怎么说，我要回去交班了。

original: Yeah! Yeah, that's a good idea. You get the ball rollin', and I'll check back with you tomorrow. Gotta get back to work now.
translation: 是的！是的，那是个好点子。你让这个球滚起来了，我明天再和你联系。现在回去干活。

original: I like the way you think. Tell you what. I'll see what I can get stirrin' on my end too, and we'll catch up later. Now... back to the grind.
translation: 我喜欢你的点子。跟你讲，我会看看我最终也能激起什么灵感。现在……回去干活。

original: I'll do anything at this point. Another day of screamin' at scrubs and I'm gonna go fuckin' nuts. Speaking of which... duty calls.
translation: 在这点上，我会全力以赴。那些朝渣滓们大喊大叫的日子，我他妈的要疯了。说到这……职责所在嘛。

original: Know what we should do? Me and you? Get some leave time and get out of The Pitt for a few days. Head south into Paradise Falls. Somethin'...
translation: 知道我们该干嘛吗？我和你？抽点时间，离开匹兹堡一些天，去南边的堕落天堂，做些……

original: Maybe I'll talk to Zubrowski or Diehl, get a card game going. Not exactly exciting, but it beats sitting around with our thumbs up our asses, right?
translation: 也许我会跟祖布罗斯基或者迪尔聊聊天，玩玩纸牌游戏。不算有趣，不过总比我们无所事事的坐着用手指抠屁股强，对吧？

original: I was thinkin', maybe we could convince the boss man to have regular fights in the Hole. Shit, I'd go in, see what I'm made of. We could both do it.
translation: 我在想，也许我们可以说服老板大人定期的在角斗坑举行角斗。妈的，我想进去证实一下我的战斗力。我们俩都可以试试。

original: Okay, how's this for a plan? I get hold of some of the Lord's private stash, and the two of us get wasted beyond all fuckin' belief. Yeah?
translation: 好吧，把这作为计划怎么样？我找到领主的私人珍藏，我们俩喝他个烂嘴，把所有他妈的信仰抛之脑后。怎么样？

original: Hmmm... I'm getting an idea. Picture this... a Trog, three scabs, two live grenades... and a Brahmin. We take 'em out to the bridge, right? And...
translation: 嗯……我有个主意。想象一下……一只兽化人、三个渣滓、两颗还没引爆的手榴弹……和一只双头牛。我们把它们带到桥那边去，对吧？并且……

original: Man, me and you need to get one of those uninfected scab whores, get her shitfaced, and just see what happens.
translation: 老兄，我和你得抓一个那些没被感染的渣滓妓女，把她灌个烂醉，再瞧瞧会出什么娄子。

original: Hey, you remember that time you and me made that scab take off his clothes and run into the Steel Yard? Fucking Trogs tore him apart! Ha ha ha ha!
translation: 嗨，还记得那次你和我让那个渣滓脱掉他的衣服，跑进钢材堆放场吗？她妈的兽化人把他撕成了碎片！哈哈哈哈！

original: Ashur needs to send us out on a good old fashioned raid. Like March of '73? Me, you and that strung-out Ghoul chick? Ha ha ha ha!
translation: 阿舒尔要派我们来一场漂亮又老式的抢劫，就像73年的3月？我，你和那个有毒瘾的尸鬼骚货？哈哈哈哈！

original: What I wouldn't give for a random Radscorpion attack. Those fuckers make for some good target practice...
translation: 我不会随便和辐射蝎以命相搏，那些傻瓜有利于练习射击……

original: Don't get me wrong - beatin' on the scabs is okay some days, but there's got to be more to life. Any ideas?
translation: 别让我犯错——每天揍揍这些渣滓确实还不错，但是生活不只有这些乐子。有什么好点子吗？

original: Sometimes I miss the early days, ya know? Shit was so unpredictable. Uprisings, Ghoul attacks. Kept a motherfucker on his toes. Now? Pfft.
translation: 有时候我会怀念那些以前的日子，你知道吗？倒霉事总是这么不可预见的。奴隶造反或是尸鬼袭击。

original: Tell me about it.
