translation: 跟我讲讲。

original: Yeah, no shit, huh?
translation: 是的，狗屁都没，对吧？

original: I hear that, man.
translation: 我听到了，老兄。

original: I hear that, girl.
translation: 我听到了，女孩。

original: He he he. Damn, man, you're starting to sound like me. Old and bitter.
translation: 他他他。该死，老兄，你说话越来越像我了，老练而刻薄。

original: He he he. Damn, girl, you're starting to sound like me. Old and bitter.
translation: 他他他。该死，女孩，你说话越来越像我了，老练而刻薄。

original: I'd tell you to shut up and everything's great, but that'd make me a hypocrite. And I might be a lot of things, but I ain't no fuckin' hypocrite.
translation: 我想跟你说，闭上你的嘴然后就一切都好了，但那我就成了伪君子。我可能是有点吊儿郎当，但我不是他妈的伪君子。

original: Well then, I hope you also said goodbye! HAHAHAHA! Alright, play time's over. Get to work, grinders.
translation: 那么，我希望你也说声再见！哈哈哈哈！好吧，放风时间结束。去干活，磨工。

original: Yes sir. I told him what he needs to do. He knows. 10 ingots. As fast as he can.
translation: 是的，长官。我跟他讲了要做的事情。他知道了，10块钢锭，越快越好。

original: Yes sir. I told her what she needs to do. She knows. 10 ingots. As fast as she can.
translation: 是的，长官。我跟她讲了要做的事情。她知道了，10块钢锭，越快越好。

original: Oh yeah? So he's the one that's going out to the Steelyard, huh?
translation: 噢，是吗？那么他就是要去钢院的人吗，嘿？

original: Oh yeah? So she's the one that's going out to the Steelyard, huh?
translation: 噢，是吗？那么她就是要去钢院的人吗，嘿？

original: Uhm... nothing. Nothing... uh... sir. I was just telling this new worker about the job the Foreman posted.
translation: 嗯……没什么。没事……嗯……长官。我只是在跟这个新来的工人说说工头布置的工作。

original: Very well, then. Good luck on your path.
translation: 很好，那么，祝你一路顺风。

original: He's in the Mill. He tried to keep out of sight of the bosses, so look around where they can't see.
translation: 他在轧钢厂。他想避开老板们的视线，所以要找到他的话，去老板们看不见的地方四下瞧瞧吧。

original: You're looking for Marco, hrm? What's he up to?
translation: 你在找马可，嗯？他是做什么的？

original: He's over in the old control room, near the gate to Uptown. I'll... I'll let him know you're coming.
translation: 他在上城区大门附近的旧控制室。我会……我会让告诉他你来了。

original: He's over in the Mill. I don't see him except for meals.
translation: 他在轧钢厂，除了进餐时间，我没见过他。

original: I tried. Really I did. This is your own fault.
translation: 我试过了，真的。这是你自己的错。

original: Your friends are dead. You're next if you don't talk!
translation: 你朋友死了，你要是不说的话就是下一个！

original: You helped them escape. I know it.
translation: 你帮他们逃跑了，我知道。

original: We can do this the easy way, or the "I break you in fucking half" way. Your choice.
translation: 我们可以用简单的方式了结，或者采用我把你打成两截的方式。由你选。

original: Fine, have it your way. Fucking talk, you piece of shit!
translation: 很好，成全你。他妈的给我说话，你这砣屎。

original: Very well, Midea. If that is the will of the workers, then this man shall be their champion!
translation: 非常好，美狄亚。如果那是工人们的意愿，那么这位勇士就是他们的冠军。

original: Very well, Midea. If that is the will of the workers, then this woman shall be their champion!
translation: 非常好，美狄亚。如果那是工人们的意愿，那么这位女士就是他们的冠军。

original: Sir, you carry not only the dream that workers can become free, but that we may all someday become truly free from the threats of our world.
translation: 先生，你不仅承载工人们获得自由的梦想，也肩负着我们有朝一日能真正摆脱世界威胁的重任。

original: Madam, you carry not only the dream that workers can become free, but that we may all someday become truly free from the threats of our world.
translation: 女士，你不仅承载工人们获得自由的梦想，也肩负着我们有朝一日能真正摆脱世界威胁的重任。

original: Prepare yourself, sir. And when you are ready to be forged anew, report to Faydra in the Steel Mill.
translation: 好好准备，先生。当你准备好被重新锻造时，到轧钢厂的费德拉那里报到。

original: Prepare yourself, Madam. And when you are ready to be forged anew, report to Faydra in the Steel Mill.
translation: 好好准备，女士。当你准备好被重新锻造时，到轧钢厂的费德拉那里报到。

original: The rest of you are dismissed.
translation: 其他人解散。

original: Right here! We have one! This woman here will fight in the Hole!
translation: 在这儿！我们有一个！这个女人将进入角斗坑战斗！

original: Right here! We have one! This man here will fight in the Hole!
translation: 在这儿！我们有一个！这个男人将进入角斗坑战斗！

original: C'mon, Ashur! Will you send someone to the Hole who actually stands a chance?
translation: 来呀，阿舒尔！你能派一个真正有实力一战的人进到角斗坑里面去吗？

original: All workers report to the Square. All workers report to the Square.
translation: 所有的工人到广场报到。所有的工人到广场报到。

original: And Gruber falls! Gruber falls! The champion is toppled! A new slave rises from the gutter to join us! Welcome him! He's earned it!
translation: 格鲁伯倒下了！格鲁伯倒下了！冠军被打倒了！一个新的奴隶从贱民中冲出来加入我们了！欢迎他！他当之无愧！

original: And Gruber falls! Gruber falls! The champion is toppled! A new slave rises from the gutter to join us! Welcome her! She's earned it!
translation: 格鲁伯倒下了！格鲁伯倒下了！冠军被打倒了！一个新的奴隶从贱民中冲出来加入我们了！欢迎她！她当之无愧！

original: And now, this slave has proven willing to kill and die for his freedom! But how will he fare against the last man who made it all the way: Gruber!
translation: 那么，这个奴隶已经证实他愿意为了他的自由而搏命！不过当他遭遇到最后的这位所向披靡的对手：格鲁伯，他会怎么样呢！

original: And now, this slave has proven willing to kill and die for her freedom! But how will she fare against the man who made it all the way: Gruber!
translation: 那么，这个奴隶已经证实她愿意为了她的自由而搏命！不过当她遭遇到最后的这位所向披靡的对手：格鲁伯，她会怎么样呢！

original: Undefeated in the Hole, Gruber has yet to meet his match.
translation: 格鲁伯在角斗坑中没被击败过，他还没遇见过敌手。

original: Only one will walk out with their freedom! Only one will walk out alive! Release the barrels! GO!
translation: 仅有一个人将带着他们的自由走出去！仅有一个人活着走出去！打开这些桶！上！

original: C'mon! C'mon you bastard!
translation: 来啊！来啊！杂种！

original: Think you got what it takes? C'mon!
translation: 以为你能赢？来啊！

original: Get out here and fight, scab!
translation: 出去战斗，渣滓！

original: Let's go!
translation: 我们干吧！

original: C'mon, coward!
translation: 来啊，胆小鬼！

original: I know I shouldn't trust you, but if it'll make Marie happy, it means I can get some sleep. So, okay.
translation: 我知道我不该相信你，但如果这能让玛丽开心，我就能睡个好觉了。那么，好吧。

original: She seems to really enjoy teddy bears. She just can't seem to get enough of them.
translation: 她好像蛮喜欢泰迪熊。只是她对这些玩具像是不知足一样。

original: Bring as many as you can, and I'll even pay you... Once I make sure they aren't filled with razor blades.
translation: 你尽可能多带些来，我甚至可以付钱给你……只要我确定它们没有装刀片就行。

original: Oh, you'd be such a life-saver! A happy Marie means I can get some sleep once in a while.
translation: 哦，你真是我的救世主！玛丽高兴，那我就有机会好好地睡上一觉了。

original: She seems to really enjoy teddy bears. She just can't seem to get enough of them!
translation: 她好像蛮喜欢泰迪熊。只是她对这些玩具像是不知足一样。

original: Bring as many as you can, and I'll make sure you're well paid for the effort!
translation: 尽可能的多帮我搞些来，我保证会付你钱。

original: Thanks! And Marie says thanks too!
translation: 谢谢！玛丽也谢谢你！

original: Thanks, but don't think this makes up for what you did. Here's your pay, I guess.
translation: 谢谢，但别以为这能弥补你做过的事。我想这是你的报酬。

original: That sure would help me out. Happier Marie is, the more likely I can get a full night's sleep for once in my life.
translation: 那无疑帮了我的忙。玛丽越高兴，我就越有可能睡上我这辈子的第一次完整觉。

original: She seems to really enjoy teddy bears. Creepy little things, but I guess she doesn't know any better.
translation: 她好像蛮喜欢泰迪熊这种怪模怪样的小玩意，不过我猜她也就知道这么多事了。

original: Bring as many as you can, and you'll get paid plenty for it. I promise.
translation: 尽可能的多帮我搞些来，我保证会付你大笔钱。

original: Thanks, you have no idea how much this will help. Here's your pay.
translation: 谢谢，你绝对想不到这帮了我多大的忙，给你工钱。

original: My little Marie is the very picture of health. And eventually, she'll make it possible for a new generation of healthy babies in The Pitt.
translation: 我的小玛丽是健康的化身。最终她可能会代表匹兹堡新一代的孩子们一起健健康康地成长。

original: You know, I always wanted to make The Pitt a strong city, but that was because I wanted to make my mark on the world.
translation: 你知道，我总想把匹兹堡变成一座强大的城市，不过那是因为我想在世上留名。

original: But when Marie was born, that changed. Now she's my reason to make The Pitt succeed. Because she's depending on it.
translation: 但是玛丽出生后，我的想法变了。现在她是我要重建匹兹堡的动因，因为她要在这里安身立命。

original: It's just something a parent has to do for their child, you understand?
translation: 这是身为父母为孩子应该做的事情，你能理解吗？

original: My little angel is just the healthiest baby in the world! She just couldn't be doing better.
translation: 我的小天使是世界上最健康的孩子！她好得不能再好了。

original: Wish I could say the same about the research for a cure. But that can't be rushed, now can it?
translation: 我多么希望解药的研发也是如此的顺利。不过这种事是急不来的，不是吗？

original: Honestly, it'd help us all if she got some new toys to play with. The happier she is, the easier it is for me to do research.
translation: 老实说，她要是有一些新玩具玩，那就是帮了我们大家的大忙了。她越快乐，我就越容易做研究。

original: Oh, so now you care about her well-being? Well, she's fine.
translation: 哦，这么说你也关心起她的健康来了？她很好。

original: Wish I could say the same about the research for a cure. But I can't risk rushing that.
translation: 但愿我也能对疗法的研究说同样的话。但我不能冒险急于求成。

original: Honestly, it'd help us all if she got some new toys to play with. The happier she is, the easier it is for me to do research.
translation: 老实说，她要是有一些新玩具玩，那就是帮了我们大家的大忙了。她越快乐，我就越容易做研究。

original: Oh sure, someday. Meanwhile, they keep bringing in more slaves to die.
translation: 哦，当然，将来有一天会的。而在这期间，他们继续把更多的奴隶带进来，让他们死在这里。

original: Be obedient and subservient because someday the god-king's only child will make everything better? Who'd fall for that one?
translation: 只要惟命是从，低声下气，因为将来有一天，上帝唯一的孩子会下凡来，把一切变得更美好？谁信这些鬼话？

original: She's a handful, is what she is. I mean, I'm glad she's healthy, and I take care of her like she's my own, but it's a full-time job.
translation: 她很麻烦，她就是这个样子。我是说，看到她健健康康我很高兴，我把她当成自己的孩子，不过光照看她我就没时间做其他工作了。

original: And I hardly have any time to work on finding a cure from her. People help out here and there, but she's just such a handful!
translation: 为了照顾她，我几乎没有任何时间继续研究解药。人们时不时的会来帮帮忙，不过她真是个大麻烦。

original: I got folks working on it, 24/7. It'd go faster if they didn't keep fussing about not hurting the little squirt.
translation: 我手头有一群人在干这事，全天候轮班。要是他们别老嚷嚷着不能伤害小屁孩的话，会进展得更快些。

original: Midea's the worst of them. Keeps asking people to bring the kid toys or some sorta bullcrap.
translation: 美狄亚是他们中最糟的，老是要人带小孩玩具之类的废话。

original: You'd think an old slave like her would know how to work without raising a fuss, right?
translation: 你认为像她这样的老奴隶，会知道如何工作而不大惊小怪，对吧？

original: I got folks working on it, 24/7. It'd go faster if they didn't keep fussing about not hurting the little squirt.
translation: 我手头有一群人在干这事，全天候轮班。要是他们别老嚷嚷着不能伤害小屁孩的话，会进展得更快些。

original: It hurts my heart to see a sober customer.
translation: 看见没醉的顾客伤了我的心。

original: If you walk out of here sober, I'm not doing my job.
translation: 你要是从这里走出去还不醉，我的工作不干了。

original: Oh, good! And here I thought you were planning to stay sober.
translation: 噢，得！你就是打算不醉啊。

original: You'd best not be wasting my time, newbie.
translation: 你最好别浪费我的时间，菜鸟。

original: Yeah sure, newbie.
translation: 是的，当然，菜鸟。

original: Sure thing, newbie.
translation: 当然，菜鸟。

original: You got it, Hero.
translation: 你说对了，英雄。

original: Whatever you say, Joker.
translation: 随你怎么说，小丑。

original: Whatever you say, Moneybags.
translation: 随你怎么说，大财主。

original: You got it.
translation: 你说对了。

original: Midea. She's another slave, like me. She's helping to organize them. She'll know when it's time.
translation: 美狄亚，她跟我一样也是个奴隶。她帮助组织奴隶们。时机一成熟，她就会知道。

original: He's a guy named Ashur. I don't know where he came from, but he's strong enough that he keeps all the other bosses in line.
translation: 是个叫阿舒尔的家伙。我不知道他打哪来，不过他强壮极了，他把其他的老板们安顿得井井有条。

original: The bosses, well... they're a ragtag group of vicious little fucks. But they have the guns and the power.
translation: 这些老板……他们是群贱民，邪恶的人渣。不过他们有枪有势。

original: Ashur keeps them from killing each other, and keeps them forcing us to work.
translation: 阿舒尔阻止了他们自相残杀，派他们逼我们干活。

original: Some of us are native to The Pitt, most of us are, really. People sometimes have kids before the sickness takes them.
translation: 我们一些人土生土长在匹兹堡，我们大多数都是，真的。人们有时候有小孩，直到疾病把他们带走。

original: But the need for slaves has gotten bigger. Ashur's started importing them.
translation: 不过对奴隶的需求量像滚雪球一样在增长。阿舒尔开始从外边进口。

original: Ever wonder why there are so many Slavers, but you hardly see any slaves? The Slaver operation in this area has been supplying The Pitt.
translation: 是不是想知道为什么那里有这么多的奴隶贩子，但你却几乎没有看到过什么奴隶？奴隶贩子在这个地区的运作都供给给了匹兹堡 。

original: You got it, Hero.
translation: 你说对了，英雄。

original: Whatever you say, Joker.
translation: 随你怎么说，小丑。

original: Whatever you say, Moneybags.
translation: 随你怎么说，大财主。

original: You got it.
translation: 你说对了。

original: Well, as bad as The Pitt is, it used to be worse. Much worse. It was complete chaos. Every man for himself.
translation: 就像匹兹堡一样糟，它过去更糟。一塌糊涂，彻底混乱。每个人都只为了他自己。

original: About the time I was born, those Brotherhood guys swept through the place. Killed anything that put up a fight.
translation: 大约在我出生的时代，那些兄弟会的家伙清洗了这个地方。杀掉了一切奋勇抵抗的人。

original: More'n half the place was dead by the time they were done. It was a slaughter. But they got the worst of the worst.
translation: 直到他们收手为止，这地方大半死掉了。这是一场屠杀，不过他们遭到了最惨痛的失败。

original: If it weren't for the Brotherhood sweeping the place, I doubt Ashur would have been able to get control of as much as he has.
translation: 要不是兄弟会发动了清洗，我怀疑阿舒尔现在还能不能这么得心应手的掌控这个地方。

original: It's hard to describe. It's nasty. And it affects everyone a little differently. But the longer you're there, the more it gets you.
translation: 很难描述，它很恶心。它多多少少影响了每个人。不过你在那越久，它对你的影响就越深。

original: Some just get sick and die. Others go crazy, completely psycho. They live out in the city. We call 'em "Wildmen".
translation: 一些人只是得了病就死。而另一些人则发了狂，完全成了变态。他们不住在城市，我们叫他们野蛮人。

original: And the worst... well... just hope you never have to see 'em. They turn into animals. They forget who they are. They just eat, sleep, fuck, and kill.
translation: 最坏的……嗯……希望你永远都不要见到他们。他们变成了禽兽。他们忘了他们是谁，他们只是吃、睡、操和杀。

original: But this cure, maybe it can stop all that.
translation: 不过这个解药也许可以把这一切都终结。

original: The city is built on the backs of slaves. My people. We're diseased, and suffering.
translation: 这座城市建造在我的人民，也就是这些奴隶们的脊梁骨上。我们遍体鳞伤，忍受折磨。

original: They've restarted the steel mills there. They have us breaking down metal and reforging it. No one knows why.
translation: 他们重新启动了那座轧钢厂。他们让我们把金属熔化，重新铸炼。没人知道为什么。

original: But the guy in charge, Ashur, you can damn well bet your life that he has a plan.
translation: 不过阿舒尔这个家伙掌控着一切，你可以拿你的性命赌咒，他有所图谋。

original: You're a real joker, aren't you? Whatever. Shut up and listen. I come from a place called The Pitt. It's a city far to the northwest.
translation: 你真会开玩笑，是吧？随便啦。闭嘴并听着，我来自一个叫匹兹堡的地方，那是西北方一座遥远的城市。

original: The place is a nightmare for... well, for so many reasons. But the problem I have right now is that my people are slaves.
translation: 那地方是个噩梦，因为……嗯，因为许许多多的原因。不过更大的问题是，我的人民都是奴隶。

original: No big deal, right? But I have the chance to free them. I just need an outsider's help before that chance is gone.
translation: 没什么大不了的，对吧？不过我有机会解放他们。在那个机会错失之前，我迫切需要一个外来者的帮忙。

original: You're a real joker, aren't you? Whatever. Listen, I come from a place called The Pitt.  It's a city far to the northwest.
translation: 你真会开玩笑，是吧？随便啦。听着，我来自一个叫匹兹堡的地方，那是西北方一座遥远的城市。

original: The place is a nightmare for... well, for so many reasons. But the bigger problem is that my people are slaves.
translation: 那地方是个噩梦，因为……嗯，因为许许多多的原因。不过更大的问题是，我的人民都是奴隶。

original: No big deal, right? It's a rough world. Who cares? But I have the chance to free them. I just need an outsider's help before we lose that chance.
translation: 没什么大不了的，对吧？它是个粗暴的世界，谁关心呢？不过我有机会解放他们。在那个机会错失之前，我迫切需要一个外来者的帮忙。

original: Yeah, whatever. I didn't come to DC to swap insults with Wasters. You want to flap gums, fine. But don't waste my time.
translation: 行了，随你的便。我可不是来特区找废土客对骂的。你想嚼舌头，没问题。但别浪费我的时间。

original: Now, you came about the broadcast. You want to hear what I have to say about The Pitt or not?
translation: 现在，你是为广播过来的。那你到底想不想听我说匹兹堡的事？

original: After the war, the place just turns into a shithole. The buildings start falling over and the sickness makes people just turn on each other.
translation: 战争之后，这地方正好变成了一个狗屎洞。建筑开始倒塌，疾病使得人们轮流的死去。

original: Some of them... change. They lose any sense of who they are. They just go around killing and fucking and eating. Like animals, man.
translation: 他们一些人……变了。他们对他们是谁，失去了任何知觉。他们只是四处闲逛，杀戮、交配和进食。就像畜生，伙计。

original: Some people are still okay, but just... I don't know. Anyway, about 30 years ago, those Brotherhood guys come in and wipe the place out.
translation: 另一些人仍然正常，只不过……我不知道。不管怎样，大约30年前，那些兄弟会的家伙来了，把这地方清了个干净。

original: They kill all of these sick fucks. Anything that looks like it's going to fight -- Bam! Then they take whatever they were looking for and leave.
translation: 他们杀掉了所有这些病态的人渣。任何看起来有攻击性的物体——砰！然后他们带上目之所及的一切，拍拍屁股走了。

original: Here come more of them! Watch out!
translation: 他们来了不少人！当心！

original: Hey! There's someone in the pen! Get 'em!
translation: 嗨！有人在围栏里！抓住他们！

original: You can get to the power plant from a manhole down in the Steelyard. It's near the train tracks -- you can't miss it.
translation: 你可以从钢院下方的检修孔到达发电站。就在火车道附近——你不会错过的。

original: Head down there and find the floodlight controls. Turn off Uptown's floodlights, and I'll meet you back in Downtown's Market Square.
translation: 去那里找到探照灯控制器，关掉上城区的探照灯。我们在下城区的集市广场碰头。

original: And here, take this - you'll want to stay hidden when those Trogs start swarming. Now get moving!
translation: 给，拿上这个——遇上兽化人的时候你要躲好。开始行动！

original: Sorry, doll, but I'll be busy setting everything up with the squirt, here. But for you, I guess I can spare a few supplies.
translation: 抱歉，姑娘，我要在这伺候小毛孩。不过我想我可以给你准备些点补给品。

original: You can get to the power plant from a manhole down in the Steelyard. Near the train tracks -- you can't miss it.
translation: 你可以从钢院下方的检修孔到达发电站。就在火车道附近——你不会错过的。

original: Head down there,  find the floodlight controls, and turn off Uptown's floodlights. I'll meet you back Downtown.
translation: 去那里找到探照灯控制器，关掉上城区的探照灯。之后我会在下城区跟你碰头。

original: And here, take this - you'll want to stay hidden when the Trogs come. Now get moving!
translation: 给，拿上这个——遇上兽化人的时候你要躲好。开始行动！

original: My advice? Keep running until you're in Downtown, and don't look back!
translation: 我的忠告？一直跑，直到你进入了下城区，千万别回头！

original: Now, you can get to the power plant from a manhole down in the Steelyard. Near the train tracks -- you can't miss it.
translation: 现在，你可以从钢院下方的检修孔到达发电站。就在火车道附近——你不会错过的。

original: Head down there. find the floodlight controls, and turn off Uptown's floodlights. I'll meet you back Downtown.
translation: 去那里找到探照灯控制器，关掉上城区的探照灯。之后我会在下城区跟你碰头。

original: And here, take this - you'll want to stay hidden when the Trogs come. Now get moving!
translation: 给，拿上这个——遇上兽化人的时候你要躲好。开始行动！

original: Whoa, there! Sweet as the thought is, you can't just kill 'em all yourself! You're just one man. You might miss a few!
translation: 呼，好啦！这个想法真美妙，只不过你是杀不掉他们所有人的！你只是一个人，你总会有疏漏的！

original: But there's an army of Trogs out there, hungry to get in. And the only thing holding them back are those floodlights.
translation: 不过那里有一支兽化人大军，饥肠辘辘地想进去。唯一阻止它们的是那些探照灯。

original: Shut off Uptown's lights, and the Trogs'll take care of the rest.
translation: 关掉上城区的灯，剩下的就交给兽化人。

original: Whoa, there! Sweet as the thought is, you can't just walk through and throttle each one by hand. You're just one girl. You might miss a few!
translation: 呼，好啦！这个想法真美妙，只不过你是杀不掉他们所有人的！你只是一个人，你总会有疏漏的！

original: But there's an army of Trogs out there, hungry to get in. And the only thing holding them back are those floodlights.
translation: 不过那里有一支兽化人大军，饥肠辘辘地想进去。唯一阻止它们的是那些探照灯。

original: Shut off Uptown's lights, and the Trogs'll take care of the rest.
translation: 关掉上城区的灯，剩下的就交给兽化人。

original: Simple: get someone else to do it for you. And there's a whole city full of Trogs hungry to do the job.
translation: 简单，找别人代劳。全城的兽化人都渴望做这份工作。

original: The only thing keeping them out of Uptown are those floodlights. And I know where you can shut those off.
translation: 不过上城区的那些探照灯让它们没法靠近。我知道你在哪可以关掉这些灯。

original: Shut off Uptown's lights, and the Trogs'll sweep in to take care of the rest.
translation: 关掉上城区的灯，兽化人就会来处理剩下的事情。

original: Hey! Hands off the merchandise!
translation: 嗨！别碰那些货物！

original: Bill's a friend of mine, a very dear friend.  We've worked the mill together for a long time.
translation: 比尔是我的朋友，非常亲的朋友。我们一块在轧钢厂工作了很长时间。

original: Last week we were forced to choose someone to gather ingots from the Steelyard.  Bill volunteered.
translation: 上星期我们被迫挑选一个人去钢院收集钢锭。比尔自愿去。

original: He didn't want anyone to have to die out there. But... he's a survivor. He can't be dead.
translation: 他不想看到别人白白送命。不过……他是个幸运儿，他不会死的。

original: You look like you can handle yourself.  Could you look for him and bring him back?
translation: 你看起来能保护好自己。你能找到他并带回来吗？

original: You'd best not be wasting my time, newbie.
translation: 你最好别浪费我的时间，菜鸟。

original: Yeah sure, newbie.
translation: 是的，当然，菜鸟。

original: Sure thing, newbie.
translation: 当然，菜鸟。

original: Oh. Oh? A cure? That is very interesting. I'll be sure to note that.
translation: 哦。哦？解药？非常有趣。我肯定会注意到的。

original: Here's a little something that I found. Make good use of it.
translation: 给你一些我找到的东西，好好利用。

original: From outside The Pitt? That's new. I heard there might be someone from far away showing up.
translation: 从匹兹堡外边来的？那倒新鲜。我听说有个人是从遥远的地方来的。

original: Here's a little something that I found. Make good use of it.
translation: 给你一些我找到的东西，好好利用。

original: I guess that shouldn't surprise anyone. The bosses all thought they were up to something.
translation: 我想那不足为奇。老板们都认为他们在搞什么鬼。

original: Here's a couple of things for your trouble. They should help keep you alive out here.
translation: 给你几个救急物品，它们会让你活着回来。

original: That figures. Must be why the bosses hate him so much.
translation: 有道理。这肯定是老板们为什么这么恨他的原因。

original: Here are a couple things. Thanks for your help.
translation: 给你几个东西。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I knew that bastard was up to something. Finally! After all he's done to me, I can get him!
translation: 我就知道那个杂种想要造反。终于露出马脚了！在他对我干了这一切之后，我可以抓他了！

original: Here's something for your trouble. I can't thank you enough for this one.
translation: 给你几个东西，即使那不足以表达我对你的谢意。

original: Hrm. Well, let me know if you do.
translation: 那么，你要是听到什么的话就告诉我。

original: That's a shame. Keep an eye open.
translation: 太遗憾了。睁大眼睛留点神吧。

original: Bill's a friend of mine, a very dear friend.  We've worked the mill together for a long time.
translation: “狂野比尔”是我的朋友，非常亲的朋友。我们一块在轧钢厂工作了很长时间。

original: Last week we were forced to choose someone to gather ingots from the Steelyard.  Bill volunteered.
translation: 上星期我们被迫挑选一个人去钢院收集钢锭。比尔自愿跟去。

original: He didn't want anyone to have to die out there. But... he's a survivor. He can't be dead.
translation: 他不想看到别人白白送命。不过……他是个懂得保护自己的人，他不会死的。

original: Well, okay.  I hope you'll change your mind.
translation: 那好吧。我希望你能改变主意。

original: Thank you so much. Just... be careful out there. Bill would never forgive himself if someone got hurt looking for him.
translation: 万分感谢你。只是……到那边要小心点。有人要是为找他受了伤，比尔是不会原谅自己的。

original: No?  Well, if you do see him, could you let me know?
translation: 没有吗？好吧，如果你见到他，能告诉我吗？

original: Get out of here, sellout!
translation: 滚出去，叛徒。

original: You ain't welcome here no more.
translation: 这里再也不欢迎你。

original: Stay outta Downtown, traitor.
translation: 从下城区滚出去，叛徒。

original: Thought you had the sense to stay out.
translation: 想你有感觉逃得掉。

original: Ashur's new pet is looking for a beating!
translation: 阿舒尔的新宠物正在找打！

original: You're not the boss of me!
translation: 你不是我的老板！

original: Workers of The Pitt, unite!
translation: 匹兹堡的工人们，联合起来！

original: Oh, that's it! RIOT!
translation: 哦，就是这样！暴动！

original: Oh, okay...
translation: 哦，好吧……

original: As long as I know he's okay, then that's all that matters. Thank you for your help.  I'll tell the others that Bill is alright.
translation: 只要我知道他没事，这就足够了。谢谢你的帮助 我会告诉其他人比尔没事的。

original: Here, take these stimpaks.  They're all I have. Goodbye.
translation: 给，拿着这些治疗针。我只有这些了。再见。

original: He's dead?  But he promised us he would come back... I... I have to let the others know.
translation: 他死了？但他向我们保证他会回来的……我……我要去告诉其他人。

original: Thank you for your help. Here, take these stimpaks.  They're all I have.
translation: 谢谢你帮忙。带上这些治疗针。我只有这些了。

original: Oh! That's wonderful!  Where is he now?  Did he come back with you?
translation: 噢！太棒了！他在哪？他跟你一起回来了吗？

original: He's dead?  But he promised us he would come back... I... I have to let the others know.  Thank you for your help.
translation: 他死了？但他向我们保证他会回来的……我……我要去告诉其他人。

original: Here, take these stimpaks.  They're all I have. Goodbye.
translation: 给，拿着这些治疗针。我只有这些了。再见。

original: I don't feel...  I'm going to...
translation: 我觉得不太……我要……

original: I think, I think I'm going to faint. Please stop it.
translation: 我想，我想我要晕倒了，请别说了。

original: Please, please stop.  I can't hear anymore of it.  I don't feel so well.
translation: 求你了，别说了。我听不下去了。我感觉不太好。

original: Bill, he was alive?
translation: 比尔，他当时还活着？

original: That's horrible! Poor Bill!
translation: 太可怕了！可怜的比尔！

original: Oh no!
translation: 哦，不！

original: Boo hoo, the mean boss took all of the dumbass slave's goodies! Is 'im gonna cry to Ashur?
translation: 呜呼，卑鄙的头儿把那个笨蛋奴隶的好东西都拿走了！他要向阿舒尔哭诉吗？

original: You found it, I took it. You got a problem with that?
translation: 你找到了，我拿走了。你有意见吗？

original: Tough luck, Grinder. It's mine now.
translation: 运气不好啊，磨工。现在是我的了。

original: Hey, that's my stuff. Get your fuckin' hands off of it.
translation: 嘿，那是我的东西，拿开你的臭手。

original: Yeah. I'm sure. You can hook up with her again when you get back.
translation: 是的，我确定，你可以回来后再跟她碰面。

original: Now c'mon. Let's get going.
translation: 来吧，我们走。

original: Yeah, I'm sure. You can hook up with him again when you get back.
translation: 是的，我确定，你可以回来后再跟他碰面。

original: Now c'mon. Let's get going.
translation: 来吧，我们走。

original: Yeah. That's the way it is. You can hook up with her again when you get back.
translation: 是的，就是这样，你回来后可以再跟她碰面。

original: Now c'mon. Let's get going.
translation: 来吧，我们走。

original: Yeah. That's the way it is. You can hook up with him again when you get back.
translation: 是的，就是这样，你回来后可以再跟他碰面。

original: Now c'mon. Let's get going.
translation: 来吧，我们走。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need some greaser tagging along with us. He'll only get in the way.
translation: 还有，我们不需要油腔滑调的人跟着，他只会碍手碍脚。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need a... uhm... whatever he is tagging along with us. He'll only draw attention.
translation: 还有，我们不需要……嗯……任何人跟着，他只会暴露我们的行踪。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. She's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need some diseased whore tagging along with us. She'll only get in the way.
translation: 还有，我们不需要病妓女跟着，她只会碍手碍脚。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your dog.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need come filthy mutt tagging along with us. He'll only get in the way.
translation: 还有，我们不需要恶心的笨蛋跟着，他只会碍手碍脚。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need some burnt out old loser tagging along. He'll only slow us down.
translation: 还有，我们不需要老蠢货跟着，他只会拖我们的后腿。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We won't be able to maintain him on the road.
translation: 这一路上我们照顾不了他。

original: Besides, we don't need some bucket of bolts tagging along. He'll only get in the way.
translation: 还有，我们不需要老爷车跟着，他只会碍手碍脚。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. She's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，她必须留下来。

original: Besides, this might turn ugly. We don't need some do-gooder slowing us down.
translation: 还有，话可能有点难听，我们不需要不切实际的空想家拖我们的后腿。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

original: Besides, we don't need some greaser tagging along with us. He'll only get in the way.

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... companion.
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……狗。

original: We only have enough supplies for two. He's gonna have to stay behind.
translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，他必须留下来。

translation: 还有，我们不需要一些肮脏的笨蛋跟着，他只会碍手碍脚。

original: Besides, we don't need some burnt out old loser tagging along. He'll only slow us down.
translation: 还有，我们不需要老蠢货跟着，他只会拖我们的后腿。

original: Relax. It's not about you. It's about your... robot
translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……机器人。

original: We're not going to be able to keep him maintained while we're on the road.
translation: 这一路上我们保养不了他。

original: Besides, we don't need some bucket of bolts tagging along. He'll only get in the way.
translation: 还有，我们不需要老爷车跟着，他只会碍手碍脚。

translation: 轻松点，我不是说你，我是说你的……同伴。

translation: 我们的补给只够两个人用，她必须留下来。

original: Besides, this might turn ugly. We don't need some do-gooder slowing us down.
translation: 还有，话可能有点难听，我们不需要不切实际的空想家拖我们的后腿。

original: Whatever you say, hero. Just don't take too long. We need to get started. This ain't a short trip.
translation: 随你怎么讲，大英雄。只是别耗得太久。我们该动身了，这不是去逛街。

original: Go shopping if you need to, but don't take too long, Moneybags. We need to get started. This ain't a short trip.
translation: 差什么东西赶紧去买，不过别耗得太久，大财主。我们该动身了，这不是去逛街。

original: Don't take too long, Joker. We need to get started. This ain't a short trip.
translation: 不要耗得太久。我们该动身了，这一路会很艰难。

original: Just don't take too long. We need to get started. This ain't a short trip.
translation: 不要耗得太久。我们该动身了，这一路会很艰难。

original: Oh yeah? What is it?
translation: 哦，是吗？什么事？

original: I followed you. I've gotten very good at staying out of sight when I don't want to be seen.
translation: 跟着你很久了。我很善于隐藏自己行踪。

original: No, he expects you to accept his courteous invitation. Or at least to guess what would happen if you keep him waiting.
translation: 不，他希望你接受他客气的邀请。你要是让他久等，你可以猜一猜会发生什么。

original: You'll find him in Haven, his tower in Uptown. Take the northeast exit from here and look for the tallest building in town.
translation: 你可以在避风港找到他，他的塔楼位于上城区。从这里的东北出口出去，寻找镇上最高的建筑。

original: Oh, Ashur also said that he has a few gifts for you. You'll find them in the container behind me.
translation: 噢，阿舒尔也说，他有一些礼物给你。你可以在我身后的柜子中找到。

original: Enjoy. And don't keep the man waiting.
translation: 好好享受。别让他久等。

original: He watches over the city from Haven, his tower in Uptown. Take the northeast exit from here and look for the tallest building in town.
translation: 他在上城区的避风港塔上监视着这座城市。从这走到东北边的出口，找到镇上最高的建筑。

original: Oh, Ashur also said that he has a few gifts for you. You'll find them in the container behind me.
translation: 噢，阿舒尔也说，他有一些礼物给你。你可以在我身后的柜子中找到。

original: Enjoy. And don't keep the man waiting.
translation: 好好享受。别让他久等。

original: Oh, good. It's been way too long since I killed anybody.
translation: 噢，很好。我很久没有随意杀人了。

original: Is that so? Well, since we're hirin', you can just head right on in and fill out a fuckin' application.
translation: 是那样吗？自从我们被雇后，你可以大摇大摆的进来，填一张他妈的申请表。

original: I'll let 'em know that you're comin'. They'll take good care of you once you get inside.
translation: 我会让他们知道你来了。一旦你进来，他们会好好地招呼你。

original: HAHA! I love it. Another slave wandered back here, huh? You couldn't even get over the bridge, could you? You're lucky I don't fuckin' paste you.
translation: 哈哈！我爱这样。又一个奴隶溜回来了，嗯？你连桥都过不去，对吧？算你走运，我他妈的没狠狠揍你一顿。

original: And look at all this! Where'd you get all this shit anyway? Whatever. Mine now. I hit the fuckin' jackpot today!
translation: 看看这些东西！不管咋说，你从哪搞到的这些破烂？无所谓了，都是我的了。我今天中头奖了！

original: Now get back in there and get to work, or next time I'll just stake you out there for the Trogs.
translation: 现在滚回去干活，要不然下次我会把你绑去喂兽化人。

original: Good to see a little enthusiasm, for once! Well, follow me!
translation: 头一回看到有热情的！好吧，跟我来！

original: Yup, guess you got every last one out there. You're one hell of a steeler, kid.
translation: 是的，想来你把那边搜了个遍。你真是个铁人，孩子。

original: That's your problem, ain't it? Get back out there, scab.
translation: 那是你的问题，不是吗？回到那边去，渣滓。

original: Well, there's still more out there. But I guess some other sucker can get killed looking for them.
translation: 嗯，外边还有更多的。但我想其他笨蛋会为了找它们而送命的。

original: Looks good.
translation: 看起来不错。

original: I'll just take those.
translation: 我收下了。

original: Nothing like some heavy labor, huh?
translation: 不是什么重体力活，对吧？

original: More metal for the Mill.
translation: 给轧钢厂收集更多的金属。

original: Lord Ashur will be right with you. Feel free to wait inside, champion.
translation: 阿舒尔陛下很快就会来见你。不用紧张，冠军。

original: Relax. They messed you up pretty bad.
translation: 别紧张。他们把你搞得够呛。

original: Take it easy. Don't move too quickly.
translation: 放轻松。动作别太快。

original: Come on. Sit up now.
translation: 来吧。坐起来。

original: Okay, got it. Let's go!
translation: 好了，拿了。我们走！

original: I want you to hurry.
translation: 我要你快点。

original: Right behind you! Hahahahaha!
translation: 就在你背后！哈哈哈哈哈！

original: That's enough! Get her stuff. ... C'mon, hurry! ... Hey! Put that down, that's mine! ...Okay, got everything? Let's get out of here!
translation: 行了！拿上她的东西……快！……嗨！把那放下，那是我的！……好了，拿完了吗？我们离开这！

original: That's enough! Get his stuff... C'mon, hurry! ... Hey! Put that down, that's mine! ...Okay, got everything? Let's get out of here!
translation: 行了！拿上他的东西……快！……嗨！把那放下，那是我的！……好了，拿完了吗？我们离开这！

original: Ah, talk to this! Get her, boys!
translation: 啊，和这个谈吧！兄弟们，抓住她！

original: Ah, talk to this! Get 'im, boys!
translation: 啊，和这个谈吧！兄弟们，抓住他！

original: Good luck! Get her, boys!
translation: 祝你好运！兄弟们，抓住她！

original: Good luck! Get 'im, boys!
translation: 祝你好运！兄弟们，抓住他！

original: Yeah, probably for the best. Are you clear on what you need to do?
translation: 是的，也许是出于好意。清楚你要做什么了吗？

original: Okay. Here you go. Don't take it out until you get past the gate. You clear on what you need to do?
translation: 很好，给你。没过那道门之前，别把它拿出来现。清楚你要做什么了吗？

original: Okay. Here you go. Don't take it out until you get past the gate. You clear on what you need to do?
translation: 好吧。去吧。没过那道门之前，别把它拿出来现。清楚你要做什么了吗？

original: It's a bit too late for that now, isn't it? Either way, good luck. We're counting on you.
translation: 现在不是有点太迟了，对吗？不管怎样，祝你好运。我们都指望你了。

original: That's it. Good luck. We're counting on you.
translation: 那就这样，祝你好运。我们都指望你了。

original: Well... you might be able to get a small gun or a knife past them if you conceal it just right.
translation: 其实……你可以带着一把小手枪或者一把匕首通过他们的检查，只要你藏得够好。

original: I can do that for you but I can't promise that they won't see it and just gun you down.
translation: 我可以帮你的忙，不过我不能保证他们看不出来，然后一枪把你嘣了。

original: You want the gun or the knife?
translation: 你要枪，还是要匕首？

original: Hrm. Well... that's not the best idea, but at this point, I'm pretty much out of options, so if that's how it has to be...
translation: 嗯。好吧……那不是个好主意，但此时此刻，我已别无选择，所以如果必须这样……

original: Whatever. Just get the outfit off of one of them while you're playing hero. I'll stay here and meet up with you when it's done.
translation: 随你的便。想英雄主义把伪装的外套脱了。你要是搞定了，在这里跟我碰头。

original: Then we'll head out to The Pitt.
translation: 那么我们朝匹兹堡出发吧。

original: Okay. You go get the outfit. I'll stay here and meet up with you when it's done.
translation: 很好，你去搞到这套服装。你要是搞定了，在这里跟我碰头。

original: I'll meet you up by the tunnel that leads to The Pitt. You go get whatever you'll need for the trip.
translation: 我会在通向匹兹堡的隧道附近跟你碰头。为了这趟路，你去随便搞点需要的东西。

original: You won't be coming back here for a while, so keep that in mind.
translation: 切记，你一时半会回不来了。

original: You cocky bastard. Think you killed all of Ashur's little psychos? No way! Not even close!
translation: 你这个狂妄的混蛋，你以为你可以杀光阿舒尔所有的小变态们？不可能！甚至连杀一半都做不到！

original: Any given day, most of them are out on raids, or trying to push further into the city. Now there's trouble, they'll be rushing back, guns blazing.
translation: 不管哪一天，他们中的大多数都在外面烧杀抢掠，或者在想法子推进到城市的深处。只要一有风吹草动，他们都会火速赶来，乱枪扫射。

original: No, the only way to put an end to their kind is to destroy their home and salt the fucking earth. Give uptown back to the Trogs!
translation: 不，终结他们的唯一办法是毁掉他们的家，永远的毁掉，让兽化人重新占领上城区！

original: Don't be silly! It's the best of both worlds!
translation: 别傻了！它是两全其美的！

original: As a mother, I love that I can spend all day with my daughter. And as a scientist, it's great to work on something that will benefit the city!
translation: 作为母亲，我可以整天和我的女儿在一起。作为科学家，去研究能使这座城市获益的事物又十分伟大！

original: Pull your head out of your ass, and you might realize they're one and the same, idiot.
translation: 把你的脑袋从你屁股里揪出来，你就可以明白这就是一回事，白痴。

original: Oh, I hate it when he calls her that. I swear, it's a terrible thing to call his own daughter.
translation: 哦，我可不喜欢他那样称呼她。我发誓那样称呼自己的女儿是件可怕的事。

original: Actually, it's a combination lab and nursery. Little Marie needs a lot of attention and care, if she's going to cure the city.
translation: 实际上，它既是实验室又是托儿所。小玛丽如果要治疗这座城市的话，需要不少的照顾和关心。

original: Here's the door. Get out there and grab some ingots. Don't come back without at least ten!
translation: 门在这。出去抓些钢锭来。少于十块别回来。

original: Turn them in to me and I'll see if I can't slip a little something your way.
translation: 把它们上缴给我，我会看看能不能悄悄塞给你一些你想要的东西。

original: See that fella up there? You'll be seeing lots of those.
translation: 看见那边的小伙子了吗？你会见到许多那样的人。

original: And if you survive them, you'll probably run into those crazies that live up on the blast furnace.
translation: 要是你能活下来，你可能会遇到那些住在高炉上的疯子。

original: Tell you what, why don't you do me a favor and get killed close to the door?
translation: 要我说，你何不帮我个忙，在门口边上让我杀掉？

original: That way I won't have to walk so far to loot your corpse. Heh.
translation: 那样我就不必走那么远的路去搜刮你的尸体。呵。

original: So Steelyard duty, eh? Who'd you piss off to get that death sentence?
translation: 那么说是钢院任务，嗯？谁惹得你一气之下接受那种死刑？

original: Actually, don't even tell me. It's not like you'll be alive for long anyways.
translation: 其实都不需要跟我讲。不管怎样，你总归也活不长。

original: You have what you take in with you.
translation: 你可以随身带些东西进去。

original: But, if that's not enough, there are a couple of things in that locker over there.
translation: 不过你要是嫌不够的话，那边的储物柜里有几个小玩意。

original: You head down to the hole. Talk to Faydra. She sets up the fights.
translation: 你下到洞里。跟费德拉交谈，她安排战斗事宜。

original: Well... the area is full of Trogs.
translation: 嗯……这个地区遍地都是兽化人。

original: If you need a weapon, check with Marco in the Mill. He's been making some of our tools into weapons.
translation: 你要是需要武器，跟轧钢厂的马可商量商量。他正在把我们的一些工具做成武器。

original: You might even be able to find a gun on one of the dead bosses out in the Steelyard. They- what was that?
translation: 你甚至可以在钢院的老板们的尸体上找到枪。他们——那是什么？

original: Well... the area is full of Trogs.
translation: 嗯……这个地区遍地都是兽化人。

original: Well, if you mess it up and get killed, you won't get any reward, now will you?
translation: 那么，你要是搞砸了，被杀了，你的报酬也就没了，你愿意吗？

original: Now, outside of the mill, there are a bunch of old steel ingots just lying around. Every so often, the Foreman puts out a work order to collect them.
translation: 现在，在轧钢厂外边，闲放着不少钢锭。有时候，工头会贴出工作告示找人去收集这些钢锭。

original: It's practically a death sentence and they never assign it to anyone. They make us pick who's going to do it. Bastards.
translation: 谁要是接这份工，几乎等于就判了死刑。他们从没把这份工作指派给任何人，他们让我们自己挑人。那些杂种。

original: Outside of the mill, there are a bunch of old steel ingots just lying around. Every so often, the Foreman puts out a work order to collect them.
translation: 在轧钢厂外边，闲放着不少钢锭。有时候，工头会贴出工作告示找人去收集这些钢锭。

original: It's practically a death sentence and they never assign it to anyone. They make us pick who's going to do it. Bastards.
translation: 谁要是接这份工，几乎等于就判了死刑。他们从没把这份工作指派给任何人，他们让我们自己挑人。那些杂种。

original: Someone needed to. I'm sure you noticed that the guards don't take kindly to newcomers.
translation: 总得有人去做。我想你也注意到了，守卫对新来的人并不太友好。

original: You're going to need to look busy, or they'll sniff you out pretty quickly. And if they get too close, you don't look like you belong here.
translation: 你得看起来很忙，否则他们很快就会把你揪出来。要是他们靠得近些，你看起来就会格格不入。

original: So, I'm going to send you out to do a job that will keep you away from the guards.
translation: 所以，我会派给你一项工作，让你离守卫远远的。

original: Yes. It is. I don't know what you saw on the way in.
translation: 是的，没错。我不知道你进来的时候都看到了些什么

original: You're going to need to look busy, or the bosses will sniff you out pretty quickly. And if they look too close, you don't look like you belong here.
translation: 你要看起来像是很忙碌的样子，不然的话他们很快就会盯上你。他们要是离你太近，你会看起来不像是这里的人。

original: So, I'm going to send you out to do a job that will keep you away from the guards.
translation: 所以，我会派给你一项工作，让你离守卫远远的。

original: Leave this bastard alone, boys. His fate's in Ashur's hands, now.
translation: 别管这个杂种，小子们。他的命现在抓在阿舒尔的手里。

original: Leave this bitch alone, boys. Her fate's in Ashur's hands, now.
translation: 别管这个婊子，小子们。她的命现在抓在阿舒尔的手里。

original: You're just going to be their tool right up to the bloody end, aren't you? Bye-bye, tool.
translation: 你只不过是他们的工具，你不会有好下场的，不是吗？再见，工具。

original: Ever since the city was scourged, we've done what everyone does: whatever's necessary to survive.
translation: 自从这座城市卷入灾难，我们每个人都尽一切可能地生存下去。

original: I know my city seems barbaric to you, but it's the only way we can carve out a home in this hellhole, and it's kept these people alive.
translation: 我知道你可能觉得我的城市比较野蛮残酷，不过这是我们在这片堕落之地能用劳动创造出家，让人们活下去的唯一办法。

original: But that's enough stalling for time. So, do you know Wernher?
translation: 不废话了。那么，你认识沃纳吗？

original: He's got my baby! Take him down, but be careful!
translation: 他抢了我的孩子！干掉他，不过当心点！

original: She's got my baby! Take her down, but be careful!
translation: 她抢了我的孩子！干掉她，不过当心点！

original: Hey, that's Ashur's kid! Sound the alarm!
translation: 嗨，那是阿舒尔的跟班！拉警报！

original: I wish I could, but you have to see things in the bigger picture. Without those workers, this city would fall apart.
translation: 我也希望如此，不过你得为大局着想。没有了那些工人，这座城市将分崩离析。

original: The city's disease means we can't have kids, so slaves and recruits are the only way we get new people in the city.
translation: 城市的疾病意味着我们不能有孩子，所以奴隶和新招募的人是我们获取新市民的唯一途径。

original: But some day, soon, we'll have a cure, and we won't need forced labor. The workers will be free, and the city can grow naturally.
translation: 但总有一天，很快，我们就会找到治疗方法，不再需要强制劳动。工人们将重获自由，城市也将自然发展。

original: Thanks to what you've done, that day is coming. But until then, this is the only way the city can survive.
translation: 感谢你所做的一切，那一天即将到来。但在那之前，这是这座城市唯一的生存之道。

original: Right now, nothing. Until we can reproduce a treatment from Marie, they'll have to keep working. Otherwise, this city falls apart.
translation: 目前什么都没有。直到我们可以从玛丽身上复制出疗法之前，他们必须不停地工作。不然的话，这座城市会崩溃。

original: But once we do have a cure, things will be different. We won't need to kidnap people for our city. We'll be able to grow naturally.
translation: 不过一旦我们真搞到了解药，一切将会不同。我们不再需要为了城市而绑架人口。我们会自然地成长。

original: Until then, this is the way it has to be. It's just what has to be done.
translation: 在此之前，这是必经的方式，也是必须做好的事情。

original: Test, one, two. Looks like this thing's on. Marie, if you're there, this is your father speaking: Ishmael Ashur, sometimes called Lord of The Pitt.
translation: 测试，一，二。看来这东西开着呢。玛丽，如果你在听，这是你的父亲在说话：伊斯梅尔·阿舒尔，有时也被称为匹兹堡之王。

original: Now, I hope you're hearing this ten years from now, sitting on my knee safe and sound. Right about now, I bet I'm looking pretty silly.
translation: 现在，我希望十年后的现在你能听到这段话，安然无恙地坐在我的膝盖上。就现在，我打赌我看起来一定相当滑稽。

original: But things don't always work out the way we'd like. There are a lot of risks, including what your mother would do if she heard me talking like this.
translation: 不过事情往往不遂我们所愿。有很多风险，包括如果你妈妈听到我这样说话，她会怎么做。

original: And I'm not about to risk leaving you alone without knowing where you came from. These tapes are for you, so you can know who your father really was.
translation: 而我不会冒留你独自一人的风险，连自己从哪来都不知道。这些带子留给你，这样你就知道你的老爸究竟是个什么样的人了。

original: I probably should. Hell, I still might. But you got rid of Wernher, and things are looking good, so you're welcome in my city. For now.
translation: 我也许该杀了你。该死，我应该这么做。但你除掉了沃纳，一切看起来不错，所以欢迎你进入我们的城市。不过只是暂时的。

original: As long as you stay in line, you're free to use the Mill's ammo press. But I recommend you head out of town before using the ammo itself.
translation: 只要你守规矩，就可以随意的使用轧钢厂的弹药轧制机。不过我建议你到镇子外边使用这些军火。

original: And Sandra's made some progress with the radiation studies. You're not on her good side, but I'm sure she wouldn't mind testing it out on you.
translation: 桑德拉在辐射研究方面取得了一些进展。你并不讨她的欢心，但我肯定她不会介意在你身上试试。

original: You've kept the city in one piece and put a stop to Wernher's plans. Yeah, I guess you've earned one.
translation: 你保全了这座城市，阻止了沃纳的计划。是的，我想你已经名至实归。

original: As a full citizen of The Pitt, you'll have full access to the ammo press in the Mill. It's how I keep my soldiers well armed, so make good use of it.
translation: 作为匹兹堡真正的市民，你有绝对的权利使用轧钢厂的弹药轧制机。我的士兵们之所以装备精良就是靠的它，好好使用吧。

original: And I think Sandra's made some progress with the cure. So here's a little something to help with radiation.
translation: 我想桑德拉在解药方面取得了一些进展，所以有点与辐射相关的小东西能帮上你的忙。

original: Now that Marie's back, we have a chance at curing the disease that's been ravaging The Pitt since the bombs.
translation: 现在玛丽回来了，我们就有机会治愈自核弹袭击以来，一直肆虐匹兹堡的疾病了。

original: Without it killing our kids, we can grow like a real city. No more bringing in slaves. No more forced labor. Things can get better.
translation: 没疾病杀死我们的孩子，我们就能像真正的城市一样发展。不再需要奴隶。不再强迫劳动。一切都会好起来。

original: It's taken me a lot of work to rebuild this city. With your help, it's finally going to have a chance.
translation: 我们花了大量的工夫重建这座城市。有了你的帮助，城市终于有机会了。

original: It's not that easy. This is still our home, and there's still lots of work to be done. Killing Ashur is just the first step.
translation: 没那么简单。这里仍是是我们的家，还是有许多活要干。干掉阿舒尔只是第一步。

original: But if you want, you could keep collecting steel from the Steelyard. Most folks can't handle it, and the foreman would see you get a reward.
translation: 不过你要是愿意，你可以继续从钢院收集钢锭。大多数人都干不了这活，工头会给你报酬。

original: And if you really care, Midea said she's looking for toys for the brat. I guess if you find anything, you could bring them to her.
translation: 你要真的关心，美狄亚说她正在为这个小崽子找玩具。你要是找到了，可以给她送过去。

original: But don't you worry about it all. I'll be here to take care of the getting the city back into shape. You just bask in the glory, huh?
translation: 不过你完全不用操心，我会在这里把城市打理好的。你就沉浸在荣耀中吧，嗯？

original: Whatever you want, boss. I'll be whipping folks back into shape, and Midea's keeping an eye on the brat, so you can come and go as you like.
translation: 悉听尊便，老板。我会用鞭子打理好一切，美狄亚会照料这个小兔崽子，所以这事儿完全不用你操心，想来不想来都行。

original: But if you want, you could keep collecting steel from the Steelyard. Most folks can't handle it, and the foreman would see you get a reward.
translation: 不过你要是愿意，你可以继续从钢院收集钢锭。大多数人都干不了这活，工头会给你报酬。

original: And if you really care, Midea said she's looking for toys for the brat. I guess if you find anything, you could bring them to her.
translation: 你要真的关心，美狄亚说她正在为这个调皮捣蛋的孩子找玩具。你要是找到了，可以给她送过去。

original: But that's only if you give a shit. If it were just me, I'd just keep drinking 'till the booze runs out. So live it up!
translation: 不过你要是不在乎也没关系。换作是我，我会继续喝酒，直到把酒喝光。尽情地欢乐吧。

original: Ah!
translation: 啊！

original: Ah!
translation: 啊！

original: Ah!
translation: 啊！

original: Oooh!
translation: 嚯！

original: Oooh!
translation: 嚯！

original: Oooh!
translation: 嚯！

original: As word of a new settlement got out, the city started growing, and fast. When Raiders attacked, I'd kill the leader and recruit the rest.
translation: 随着新聚居地的消息不胫而走，城市开始发展加速。当掠夺者来袭时，我会杀掉他们的头领，并招募剩余的人。

original: I had to. The city's disease meant we couldn't have children, so recruiting was the only way to grow. And as we grew, the Mill needed more workers.
translation: 我必须得这么做。这座城市的疾病意味我们不能生育，所以招募是唯一的发展途径。随着我们的发展，轧钢厂需要更多的工人。

original: And, yes, that meant recruiting workers by force. I'm not proud of it, but it's the only way to keep the city supplied and armed.
translation: 是的，这意味着我们要强行招募工人。虽然我不为此感到自豪，但这是维持城市供给和武装的唯一方法。

original: But it was always a temporary solution, until our best scientist found a way to cure the city's epidemic. Sandra and I worked on it day and night.
translation: 但这只是权宜之计，直到我们最优秀的科学家找到治疗城市传染病的方法。桑德拉和我没日没夜地研究。

original: And after one, particularly late night of work, we were blessed with a cure. It's the cure inside you, Marie.
translation: 某天工作到深夜，我们幸运的在研究上取得了进展。玛丽，治疗方法就在你的体内。

original: Even now, we're doing everything we can to figure out how to share your gift with the city - while keeping you safe, of course!
translation: 即使是现在，我们仍在竭尽所能，弄清楚怎样和这座城市分享你的礼物——当然，是在保证你安全的下！

original: So by the time you're old enough to hear this, you'll already be a hero. Congratulations, Marie. You've already saved us all. I knew you would.
translation: 所以，等你长到足够大能听到这些话的时候，你已经是一位英雄了。恭喜你，玛丽。你已经拯救了我们所有人。我就知道你可以的。

original: Marie, you know those fights in the Mill's arena? Well, its first fight was when I woke up to someone pulling me out from a pile of rubble.
translation: 玛丽，你知道在轧钢厂竞技场的那些战斗吗？嗯，第一场战斗是在我醒过来，被某人从一堆废墟中拖出来的时候。

original: At first I thought it was my brothers pulling me to safety. Instead, it was a scavenger trying to steal my armor. She didn't get it.
translation: 起初，我以为是我的兄弟们帮我脱了险。然而，却是一个拾荒人想要偷走我的装甲。她没得逞。

original: But I learned she had a whole family of scavengers. They'd make raids into the city for gear from the Mill. And that gave me an idea.
translation: 但我得知她有一个拾荒者家庭。他们突袭这座城市是为了轧钢厂的装备。这给了我一个灵感。

original: This was the only working steel mill we'd ever seen. In a world of leftovers, it was a chance to build again. And that was worth any price.
translation: 这是我们见过的仅存还在运转中的轧钢厂。在这满是残羹剩饭的世界里，这是一个重建的机会。值得付出任何代价。

original: The scavengers saw me as a god, so along with my Brotherhood know-how, it was easy to set up the basics. We started to build a city.
translation: 这些拾荒人把我视作神，因此，凭借我和我兄弟会的专业知识，基础建设易如反掌。我们开始建造一座城市。

original: Marie, the first thing you need to know is that I wasn't always the Lord of The Pitt. Long before I was a king, I was a scholar and a soldier.
translation: 玛丽，你要知道的第一件事是，我并非生来就是匹兹堡的王。在我成为国王很久以前，我是一名学者和士兵。

original: In fact, I was in the Brotherhood of Steel. You've probably heard about them. But you may not have heard what we did to this city: the Scourge.
translation: 事实上，我加入过钢铁兄弟会。你可能听说过他们。但你可能没听说过我们对这座城市所干下的事情：天谴行动。

original: When we came here, The Pitt was just a breeding ground for Trogs, cannibals, and worse. Commander had us torch the place and take what we could.
translation: 当我们来到这时，匹兹堡只是兽化人、食人者和更糟生物的滋生地。指挥官让我们把这地付之一炬，并拿走我们能带走的东西。

original: The Pitt had useful technology, but it was suicide to stay here. So when an explosion left me buried in the Mill, my brothers were sure I was dead.
translation: 匹兹堡拥有有用的科技，不过留在无这异于自杀。所以，当一场爆炸将我埋在轧钢厂时，我的兄弟们确信我已经死了。

original: I don't blame them for leaving. I probably would have. We thought nothing could live in The Pitt. We were wrong.
translation: 我不怪他们离开。换做是我，我可能会一样。我们认为没有什么能在匹兹堡存活下来。我们错了。

original: That's it! This is between me and the little shit! Nobody else!
translation: 够了！这是我和这坨屎之间的事！其他人别管。

original: I was the first thing you saw in this city, and damn if I ain't gonna be the last, too.
translation: 我是你在这座城市看到的第一个人，我也会是最后一个，见鬼去吧。

original: Then go, and be good. Remember, Lulu has got her eye on you!
translation: 走吧，乖。记住，鲁璐的眼睛在盯着你。

original: Okay. Watch yourself out there!
translation: 好吧，在外边小心点！

original: Yeah, that's right! Keep walking, little shit.
translation: 啊，那就好！继续走，小混蛋。

original: Then here... Delicious food for you! Eat, and be good.
translation: 这是……给你的美味！吃吧，乖。

original: Too bad! Lulu has given you plenty for today. Don't be a greedy pet. Lord Ashur won't like it!
translation: 太坏了！鲁璐今天已经给了你不少吃的，别做个贪心的宠物。阿舒尔陛下不会喜欢的！

original: Then say no more, friend. Can't share much, but this should do the trick. Use it in good health!
translation: 不用再说了，朋友。没有太多的东西可分享，不过这应该够了。用它来保持身体健康！

original: Wish I could help you, but I'm all out for today. Just tough it out?
translation: 希望我可以帮你，不过我今天已经没货了。忍一忍？

original: Billy.
translation: 比利。

original: <Growl>
translation: <咆哮>

original: Billy, it's me, your brother John-John. You remember me. Don't you, Billy?
translation: 比利，是我，你兄弟约翰-约翰。记得我吗？是你吗，比利？

original: <Growl>
translation: <咆哮>

original: Billy?
translation: 比利？

original: <Growl>
translation: <咆哮>

original: <Ferocious growl>
translation: <凶猛咆哮>

original: Help me!
translation: 救救我！

original: Help me!
translation: 救救我！

original: Oh, but aren't we all pets of our Lord? He built this menagerie, and chose each of us to live in his world.
translation: 哦，不过，我们所有的人不都是阿舒尔陛下的宠物吗？他建了这座小动物园，然后选了我们每个人住在他的世界中。

original: Good pets do work, find food, build weapons, and kill the unclean. Good pets get food and Lord Ashur loves them. Bad pets get drowned in the rivers.
translation: 好的宠物干活，觅食，造武器，杀掉那些肮脏的。好宠物有吃的，阿舒尔陛下爱他们。坏宠物丢到河里淹死。

original: Lulu knows all about being good. So Lulu is in charge of feeding other good pets!
translation: 鲁璐懂得变成好宠物的所有窍门，所以鲁璐负责喂养其他好宠物！

original: Well, that's one less useless mouth to feed.
translation: 很好，又少了张吃干饭的嘴。

original: I warned you.
translation: 我警告过你的。

original: What the...? <Grumble>
translation: 什么……？<咆哮>

original: You there. What are you doing?
translation: 那边的，你在做什么？

original: Get back to work!
translation: 回去干活！

original: Nap time's over.
translation: 打盹时间过了。

original: Get up! Get up, goddammit!
translation: 起来！起来，该死的！

original: Fine. Have your little break. But if you're not tossing coal when I get back, you're dead.
translation: 很好，你休息会。不过当我回来时，你要是没在筛选煤渣，你就死定了。

original: Okay.
translation: 好的。

original: First of all, they aren't "slaves." They're "workers." They can earn their freedom, like you did.
translation: 首先，他们不是“奴隶”。他们是“工人”。他们可以获得自由，就像你一样。

original: I know it's not a big difference, but it's important. And it's a lot better than they'll get from the slavers we get them from.
translation: 我知道这没什么大的不同，但这很重要。这比奴隶贩子给他们的待遇要好一些。

original: I know some of my soldiers are harsher than they need to be. Usually, it's the ones who were raiders before they signed up here.
translation: 我知道我的一些士兵比我们所希望的更冷酷。这种人在跟我们签合同前，通常都是些掠夺者。

original: The workers need to be pushed, but I don't tolerate cruelty for cruelty's sake. The soldiers who used to be workers know where to draw the line.
translation: 这些工人需要鞭策，不过我不容忍以残酷的理由对他们动粗。士兵们知道怎么把握分寸。

original: I can't stop all of the abuse, but when someone goes too far, I make sure they're strung up around town as an example.
translation: 我不能阻止城里所有的虐待行为，但是一旦有人太过分了，我会当众绞死他，杀鸡儆猴。

original: First of all, they aren't "slaves." They're "workers." They can earn their freedom, like you did.
translation: 首先，他们不是“奴隶”。他们是“工人”。他们可以获得自由，就像你一样。

original: I know it's not a big difference, but it's important. And it's a lot better than they'll get from the slavers we get them from.
translation: 我知道这没什么大的不同，但这很重要。这比奴隶贩子给他们的待遇要好一些。

original: I wish it wasn't necessary, but we need the labor to keep the city functioning. We don't have the leisure of laziness.
translation: 我也不希望这样，不过要让这座城市运转，我们需要劳力。我们没工夫偷闲。

original: Soldiers fight Trogs and get food from outside of town. Workers need to supply them with ammo and gear. Everyone has to do their part, or we all die.
translation: 士兵们同兽化人作战，还要从外面的城镇搞食物，工人们需要为他们提供军火和装备。每个人都得是颗螺丝钉，要不然我们全都得死。

original: Until we have a cure for The Pitt, the city has no children. People die, so we need new people. And sometimes, that means buying them.
translation: 在我们获得解药之前，匹兹堡这座城市是没有小孩子的。人们不断死去，所以我们要补充新人。有时候，那意味着要用钱从奴隶贩子的手中买。

original: It wasn't actually that tough. The Scourge had cleared out a lot of Trogs, so we had space to move in.
translation: 情况其实不是那么糟。天谴行动清除了不少兽化人，所以我们才有地方移居。

original: The Brotherhood had looted a lot, but they left even more behind as "damaged goods." And you can rebuild a lot out of "damaged goods."
translation: 兄弟会掠夺走了不少，不过他们留下了更多的“损坏的货物”。你可以从这些“损坏的货物”中回收一些。

original: For example, they took one survivor, a kid the called "Kodiak". But they left his big brothers behind, because they were too wild and mean.
translation: 比方说，他们带走了一个叫“科迪亚克”的生还者，却把他的哥哥们扔在了脑后，因为他们太野蛮，太卑鄙了。

original: But as it turns out, the Bear Brothers were some of my finest soldiers. At least, until they went up against you.
translation: 不过正如最后的结果那样，贝尔兄弟是我最强悍的士兵，至少在他们被你干掉之前是这样。

original: Believe it or not, it started when the Brotherhood decided to loot this hellhole and wipe it off the map. We called it the Scourge.
translation: 不管你信不信，当兄弟会打算掠夺这片堕落之地，把它从地图上彻底抹掉的时候，事情就这么发生了。我们称之为天谴行动。

original: Back then, I was "Initiate Ashur." But that ended when the Brotherhood left me behind, and I came to see The Pitt in a new light.
translation: 当时，我是新兵阿舒尔。不过当兄弟会把我独自丢下的时候，我的身份结束了，我意识到匹兹堡走进了新的光明。

original: I was found by tribals who thought I was a god. I didn't argue, and with my leadership and their divine dedication, we began rebuilding this city.
translation: 我被部落的人发现，他们把我当了成神仙。我没跟他们争辩，我只是利用我的领导能力和他们对神明的崇拜，我们开始一起重建这座城市。

original: Guess I couldn't stop you, but then you'd never find all the little bonuses I got stashed over the years.
translation: 我想我阻止不了你，但你也永远找不到我这些年珍藏起来的小奖励了。

original: How about this: you bring me ingots, like you used to, and I'll make sure you get compensated when you do. Can't be more fair than that.
translation: 这样吧，跟过去一样，你帮我找钢锭，我保证付你报酬。再公平不过了。

original: Understood, champ! But if you want to keep collecting ingots, I still got plenty of gear stashed away.
translation: 明白，冠军！不过你想继续收集钢锭的话，我还有很多装备藏着呢。

original: You bring me ingots, I'll make sure you get rewarded. Can't be more fair than that.
translation: 你帮我找钢锭，我保证付你报酬。再公平不过了。

original: Can't believe I'm saying this, but I think you cleared out the whole place!
translation: 别把我说的话当真，不过我想你将这整个地方搜刮遍了！

original: We'll get other workers to salvage metal from the buildings. You take a break!
translation: 我们会叫其他工人从这些建筑里回收金属的。你休息一下！

original: There should be plenty out in the steelyard, especially higher up and around buildings.
translation: 钢院里应该有很多，尤其是高处和建筑物周围。

original: I hear there's a supply plant in the northeast. Should be plenty of ingots in there, too.
translation: 我听说东北部有个供给厂，那里应该也有很多钢锭。

original: That you do. This ain't no union shop.
translation: 随便你。这里可不是工会商店。

original: Like it or not, this is what you're getting.
translation: 不管你喜不喜欢，这是你的所得。

original: See for yourself. If you're heading back out there, these oughta help with the Trogs.
translation: 你亲自去看吧。你要是再回到那边，这些应该可以帮你对付兽化人。

original: Well, how about metal for metal? That's gotta be a fair trade.
translation: 金属换金属怎么样？再公平不过了。

original: Here. This armor was a special order for one of the Hole fighters. Great against bullets, but didn't help him when he got pushed off the bridge.
translation: 给。这件装甲是为角斗坑的一位战士特别定做的。挡子弹很棒，不过他被推下桥时，就没能帮得了他。

original: How about something one-of-a-kind? Bit of a weird one, here - found it from some sucker out of town.
translation: 来点独一无二的怎样？给，这个有点古怪——从镇外边某个笨蛋那里搞来的。

original: Some genius got to tinkering with his laser. Polished metal barrel, a few prisms in there, and he got this lethal light show.
translation: 某个天才捣鼓了他的激光器。抛过光的金属枪管，配上几个棱镜，就有了这致命的灯光秀。

original: Is it ever! Check out this cutting edge of fashion, huh? Wear this armor, and everyone's going to want to get close to you.
translation: 当然值得！试试这最前沿的时尚，哈？穿上这身装甲，所有人都会想亲近你。

original: Which just means they'll be inside your blast radius!
translation: 也就是说他们会在你的爆炸半径内！

original: Sure is. This armor used to belong to one of those desert-crazy priests. Said wearing it made him bulletproof.
translation: 肯定值。这套护甲曾属于一位沙漠疯子祭司，说是穿上这个能让他刀枪不入。

original: Course, that didn't stand up to a little testing. But damn if it wasn't a gloriously fun time.
translation: 当然，这经不起一点考验。但该死的，那段时间真是爽极了。

original: All the metal you're bringing in, I suppose it's worth giving you something to really help with those Trogs.
translation: 我想就你带过来的那些金属，值得我给你点东西，能真正帮你对付那些兽化人。

original: Here, this thing's mauled Trogs and Ghouls from here to Monroeville. Give it a whirl.
translation: 给，这个东西曾把兽化人和尸鬼从这儿打到门罗维尔。试试看吧。

original: Kid, this is worth more than you know. But damn if you ain't earned it.
translation: 孩子，这比你想的更值得。但如果这不是你应得的，那就见鬼了。

original: Here. This is the best gun I ever had. A little slower on the trigger, but she makes up for it in power and accuracy. Use her in good health.
translation: 给。这是我用过的最好的枪。扳机稍微慢了一点，但她在威力和精确度上弥补了这一点。好好利用她。

original: Well, I'll be damned. That makes 100 ingots you found. And here I remember thinking you'd be lucky to bring back any at all.
translation: 这也太离谱了。你找到了100锭。我还记得我当时觉得你能带回来就算走运了。

original: Ain't no question, you earned the treasure of my collection. This armor goes all the way back to when the Brotherhood tried to wipe out The Pitt.
translation: 毫无疑问，你赢得了我收藏的宝藏。这套装甲可以追溯到兄弟会试图抹除匹兹堡的时候。

original: Some of the tribals who worshipped Ashur made it to look like their god. Try it on, and you'll feel a little like a god, yourself!
translation: 一些崇拜阿舒尔的部落，把它制成看起来像他们的神。你穿上试试，你也会觉得自己像个神！

original: You know the rules. Not until you bring in a few more.
translation: 你知道规矩的。除非你再搞几个来。

original: Ain't gonna happen. Not until you bring in more.
translation: 没门。除非你再搞几个来。

original: Guess I could spare this.
translation: 我想可以匀这个给你。

original: Yeah, looks like you've earned it. If you're heading back out there, these oughta help with the Trogs.
translation: 是啊，看来是你应得的。你要是回到那边，这些东西可以帮你对付那些兽化人。

original: How about I give you some metal this time?
translation: 这次我给你些金属做的怎么样？

original: Here. This armor was a special order for one of the Hole fighters. Great against bullets, but didn't help him when he got pushed off the bridge.
translation: 给。这件装甲是为角斗坑的一位战士特别定做的。挡子弹很棒，不过他被推下桥时，就没能帮得了他。

original: Sure thing. Bit of a weird one, here - found it from some sucker out of town.
translation: 当然。给，这个有点古怪——从镇外边某个笨蛋那里搞来的。

original: Some genius got to tinkering with his laser. Polished metal barrel, a few prisms in there, and he got this lethal light show.
translation: 某个天才捣鼓了他的激光器。抛过光的金属枪管，配上几个棱镜，就有了这致命的灯光秀。

original: You bet I do! Check out this cutting edge of fashion! Wear this armor, and everyone's going to want to get close to you.
translation: 当然有了！试试这最前沿的时尚！穿上这身装甲，所有人都会想亲近你。

original: Which just means they'll be inside your blast radius, huh?
translation: 也就是说他们会在你的爆炸半径内，对吧？

original: Guess you earned this. Used to belong to a desert priest. Said wearing it made him bulletproof.
translation: 我想这是你应得的。它曾属于一个沙漠祭司，说是穿上这个能让他刀枪不入。

original: Course, that didn't stand up to a little testing. But damn if it wasn't a gloriously fun time.
translation: 当然，这经不起一点考验。但该死的，那段时间真是爽极了。

original: All the metal you're bringing in, I suppose it's worth giving you something to really help with those Trogs.
translation: 我想就你带过来的那些金属，值得我给你点东西，能真正帮你对付那些兽化人。

original: Here, this thing's mauled Trogs and Ghouls from here to Monroeville. Give it a whirl.
translation: 给，这个东西曾把兽化人和尸鬼从这儿打到门罗维尔。试试看吧。

original: I probably shouldn't, but damn if you ain't earned it.
translation: 也许我不该这么做，但如果这不是你应得的，那就见鬼了。

original: Here. This is the best gun I ever had. A little slower on the trigger, but she makes up for it in power and accuracy. Use her in good health.
translation: 给。这是我用过的最好的枪。扳机稍微慢了一点，但她在威力和精确度上弥补了这一点。好好利用她。

original: Well, I'll be damned. That makes 100 ingots you found. And here I remember thinking you'd be lucky to bring back any at all.
translation: 这也太离谱了。你找到了100锭。我还记得我当时觉得你能带回来就算走运了。

original: Ain't no question, you earned the treasure of my collection. This armor goes all the way back to when the Brotherhood tried to wipe out The Pitt.
translation: 毫无疑问，你赢得了我收藏的宝藏。这套装甲可以追溯到兄弟会试图抹除匹兹堡的时候。

original: Some of the tribals who worshipped Ashur made it to look like their god. Try it on, and you'll feel a little like a god, yourself!
translation: 一些崇拜阿舒尔的部落，把它制成看起来像他们的神。你穿上试试，你也会觉得自己像个神！

original: Nope. Go grab a few more, and I'll see what I can spare for my star scavenger.
translation: 没有。再多搞几个来，我会瞧瞧能给我的拾荒明星分点什么。

original: Not right now. Bring in a few more, and maybe.
translation: 现在还不够。再带几块，也许就够了。

original: Everything's under control.
translation: 一切正常。

original: Taken care of.
translation: 小心。

original: You know me. I do good work.
translation: 你了解我，我干得很出色。

original: Nothing to worry about.
translation: 没什么好担心的。

original: Good.
translation: 不错。

original: Excellent.
translation: 太棒了！

original: All right. We're counting on you.
translation: 好吧，我们都指望你了。

original: Better not have screwed up.
translation: 最好别搞砸了。

original: Ashur's got a cure.
translation: 阿舒尔搞到了解药。

original: A cure for WHAT?
translation: 解什么的药？

original: The plague! We're talking no more Trogs! Ever!
translation: 这场瘟疫！我们不用再为兽化人操心！永远！

original: What? Really? How the hell do you know that?
translation: 什么？真的吗？你究竟是怎么知道的？

original: You're not the ONLY one with connections.
translation: 你不是唯一能得到消息的人。

original: Fine. So spill it already, or are you just gonna stand there gloating?
translation: 好了， 快点告诉我，你还要继续站在这里沾沾自喜吗？

original: That's it. He's got a cure.
translation: 就是这样。他搞到了解药。

original: That's it?: "He's got a cure." You don't know what it IS, or where he HAS it, or what he's planning to DO with it?
translation: 就这些？“他搞到了解药。”你却不知道它是个什么东西，或者他在哪搞到它的，或者他准备拿它做什么？

original: What? That's all I know. It's good intel!
translation: 什么？那就是我知道的全部。这是个有用的消息！

original: You're useless.
translation: 你这废物。

original: It's good.
translation: 很好。

original: You were gone a while. We worried.
translation: 你不在的这阵子，我们很着急。

original: Nothing to worry about.
translation: 不必着急。

original: We NEED those parts for the weapons!
translation: 我们需要那些武器的部件！

original: Shhh! Ashur's got ears everywhere.
translation: 嘘。阿舒尔的眼线到处都是。

original: I'll chop those ears off, soon enough.
translation: 我会清除那些眼线，很快。

original: Amen... The weapons are coming, relax.
translation: 阿门……武器来了，别紧张。

original: It's just... I'm so ready to DO this!
translation: 只是……我等不及这么做了！

original: We all are. Soon. It'll happen soon.
translation: 我们都是。很快，很快就会发生。

original: Not soon enough.
translation: 还不够快。

original: Okay, so what's up?
translation: 好吧，出了什么事？

original: Wehrner's back!
translation: 沃纳回来了！

original: Where'd you hear that?
translation: 你在哪听到的？

original: From a trustworthy source. Midea confirmed it.
translation: 消息来源可靠，美狄亚确认了。

original: Great! I'll spread the word.
translation: 太好了！我会散布出去。

original: Careful who you tell. Ashur's got spies everywhere looking for him.
translation: 小心散布。阿舒尔在每个地方都布置了眼线。

original: I'm not an idiot.
translation: 我不是白痴。

original: I'm just saying... look, after what happened last time...
translation: 我只是说……瞧，上次出了事之后……

original: I know. I know. Don't worry, I'll be careful.
translation: 我知道，我知道。别着急，我会小心的。

original: Good. We can't afford any more mistakes.
translation: 很好，我们不能再犯一点错。

original: Is this like when you said you'd free us slaves? Because I guess I'll be waiting a long time.
translation: 这就像，当你说你会解放了我们奴隶的时候？因为我以为我会等很久。

original: Just to find one man? You... you wouldn't dare!
translation: 只要找个人？你……你敢！

original: Don't you dare try to blame me for your actions, you bastard! I never made you turn your back on us, and I sure as hell never made you a murderer!
translation: 别想为你的所作所为责怪我，你个狗日的！我从没让你背弃我们，我非常肯定从没要你变成杀人凶手！

original: But if this is what it's coming down to, I'm not going to let you hurt any more innocent people!
translation: 不过这要是迫不得已做出来的，我不会让你伤害更多无辜的人！

original: Dammit! Dammit, you monster!
translation: 该死！该死，你这个怪物！

original: Wernher's in the steelyard! Here, take his damn message, hunt him down, whatever. Just leave my people alone, you bastard!
translation: 沃纳在钢院！给，带上他该死的便条，不管采用什么法子逮到他。离我的人远点，你个狗日的！
